description:
Modern and unique penthouse apartment over three stories. Located in the heart of Zürich West: with art, design, food, culture, shopping & architecture in the center of attention. Spacious, luxury apartment with large Terrace, whirlpool, bbq, fireplace, gourmet kitchen and much more. Perfect access to public and private transport.

The space
One of a kind, modern three story penthouse in the famous cultural and business neighborhood of Zurich.

140m2 appartement is on the two highest levels connected via internal stairs. And your private 100m2 terrace on the rooftop.
A modern, spacious and bright apartment with all comfort you could wish for.
Guestroom and 2 separate bathrooms. Modern Bulthaup kitchen, living and dining room.

Music on all floors with Sonos and Spotify Premium, Highspeed Fibre Internet 1 Gigabit and Netflix provide ample entertainment and possibilty to work.

The top floor consists of a additional spa
neighborhood_overview:
Zurich is hip-circuit with the Swiss peacefulness!

Zurich-West – From Industrial Quarter to Trendy District
The district in the west of Zurich is full of contrasts, boasting an unpolished charm. Where ships were once built and engines bolted together, art, design, food, culture shopping and architecture are now the center of attention. Factories have moved away, leaving their vast expanses of space that creative minds have taken advantage of. The coolest place to live, work, dine, go clubbing in Zurich. This was a former industrial areas that has developed in a hybrid living working cultural space

History and national heritage

name: Large Corner Room @ The Swiss Villa
description:
Are you a professional expat who is soon starting a new job in Zurich? Or are you on a temporary assignment? Then the Swiss Villa is the perfect solution for your temporary housing needs. The residence is located near the city center, on a quiet residential street in the prestigious Zurichberg neighborhood ("Kreis 7").

Three bedrooms are being rented out altogether, each of them with their own bath. Hence staying at the Swiss Villa offers you the opportunity to meet more like-minded people.

The space
The residence was built in the 1920s, has been beautifully and extensively remodeled a few years ago and comes with several unique design features and art work.

The large corner bedroom overlooking the beautiful backyard holds a king size bed, a working desk, offers plenty of storage space, and a Bose iPhone docking station. You will be sleeping in soft bedsheets. The room has its own en-suite bathroom that comes with a wonderful rain shower. <
neighborhood_overview: There are 3 grocery stores, 2 bakeries, a post office, a drug store, 2 pharmacies, a dry cleaner and a flower shop in near walking distance. The zoo with its renowned Masoala Rain Forest hall and many jogging/walking trails are just 3 tram stops away from the Swiss Villa. The campus of Zurich University is also only a 5 minutes tram ride away, therefore the house is a popular place to stay for faculty members or workshop attendants.
host_about: We are a Swiss couple who has been using airbnb many times already, as hosts as well as as guests. We love traveling the world and meeting new people and old friends. When our schedules don't allow us to travel, we enjoy hosting guests and professional expats from all nations at our place.

name: bright and great duplex in the heart of Zurich
description:
The apartment is bright, extends over two floors and offers plenty of space in a central location.

It is possible to rent both one and two rooms together with the roommate (woman from Bologna).

Located next to one of the most beautiful swimming pools in Zurich, the place offers a lot of peace and is very well developed.
The apartment has style and space!

The space
Our spacious 4 1/2 room apartment is located in the center of Zurich.
It is stylishly furnished, very bright and quiet. We have 2 practical and cozy bedrooms, each with a double bed.
The 3rd room is a smaller bedroom.
There is WiFi throughout the house.
Two large balconies offer a lot of cosiness in the outer area. Shops in the quarter: Migros and Coop, butchers and bakers, all are just around the corner.
The area is full of cafes, restaurants, bars, theaters, art and cultural centers.
The forest (Üetliberg!) Is only ten minutes away from the hou
neighborhood_overview: Very nice people around
host_about:
ENGLISH:
I'm originally from Italy. It is always fascinating to meet people and other cultures. I like the variety of the travelers. 
Hospitality is for me very important.
I'm interested in arts, architecture, theater, restaurants and in the wonderful world of children, which teaches us every day to see life from an other perspective.
When we go on vacation, we can offer our apartment. However, I'm open for exceptions of various kinds. Please contact me without hesitation.

I speak German, Spanish, Italian, English and French.

Best regards
Violetta

DEUTSCH:
Ich bin ursprünglich aus Italien. Es ist immer wieder faszinierend, Menschen und andere Kulturen kennenzulernen. Ich mag die Vielfalt der Reisenden. Gastfreundlichkeit ist mir wichtig.  
Ich interessiere mich für die Kunst, die Architektur, das Theater, die Gastronomie und zu guter Letzt für die wunderbare Kinderwelt, die uns soviel lehrt und mit anderen Augen sehen lässt. 
Wenn wir in die Ferien reisen, können wir Ihnen unsere Wohnung anbieten. Wir sind jedoch offen für Ausnahmen verschiedenster Art. Bitte kontaktiert mich ohne zu zögern.

Ich spreche Deutsch, Spanisch, Italienisch, Englisch und Französisch. 

Beste Grüsse und auf Bald!
Violetta 

ITALIANO:
Sono originaria dell'Italia. E 'sempre affascinante incontrare nuove persone e altre culture. Mi piace la vastità che i viaggiatori portano con se. Sono come dimensioni che si aprano e ci aiutano a percepire l'amplitudine di questo mondo.  L'ospitalità è fondamentale per me. 
Sono interessata all'arte, all'architettura, al teatro, alla gastronomia, ma la cosa più bella è che ci ritroviamo giorno dopo giorno ad imparare nuove lezioni sul mondo dei bambini, che ci insegna a vedere ed a percepire la vita da un'altra perspettiva. 
Quando andiamo in vacanze possiamo offrire il nostro appartamento. Ma siamo aperti per eccezioni di vario genere. 
Non esitate a mettervi in contatto con me.
Parlo tedesco, spagnolo, italiano, inglese e francese.

Ciao! E forse a presto!
Violetta

name: Top location and top apartment in Zürich
description:
The space
In English
My room has 15.m2 and is bright as it has large windows on both sides. Also, the room has its own large balcony and a private large bathroom with large bath. The kitchen can also be used by Abspache. The laundry can be washed well in the home by washing machine and tumble dryer.

My apartment is very modern.

Guests have a top apartment for with use.

Two very dear and very mensché related cats (Leonardo and Sissi = 36 months old) are also in the same household. But will not be in Gästezimmer!


Good shopping and fast connection to Zurich City. There are the same in our house near a bus stop and there are very close to a train station and a tram stop which goes to Zurich City. Nr. 14

Guest access
Gäste dürfen nach Absprache auch meine Terrasse auf der anderen Seite der Wohnung benützen.
neighborhood_overview: Mein Gästezimmer hat ganz in der Nähe einen kleinen Einkaufsladen und will man in einen grossen Einkaufsladen gehen, so kann man mit der guten Busverbindung Nr. 75 nach Seebach fahren und dann mit der Strassenbahn Nr. 14 bis Oerlikon und da finden Sie für all Ihre Einkaufswünsche einen guten Laden. Wenn Sie in die Zürich City fahren wollen, so können Sie einfach mit der Strassenbahn Nr. 14 weiter bis zum Hauptbahnhof Zürich fahren und dann sind Sie mitten in der City.
host_about:
I have lived in Zurich - Seebach for 3 years and bought a great apartment. The guest room is about 20 minutes from the city, but can be reached by the streetcar No. 14 well.

I live alone in this great property and would like to give up on tourists and nice and clean guests the chance to stay with me so that they can get to know Zurich.
I work irregularly, but always sleep at home.
Have two cats (Leonardo and Sissi 6 years old) but have nothing against new roommates have. You are very nice!
Free internet

Auf Deutsch
Ich wohne seit 3 Jahren in Zürich - Seebach und habe mir eine tolle Wohnung gekauft.  Das Gästezimmer liegt ca 20 Minuten von der City entfernt, kann aber mit der Strassenbahn Nr. 14 gut erreicht werden. 

Ich wohne solo in dieser tollen Eigentums Wohnung und möchte gerne aufgestellten  Touristen und netten und sauberen Gästen die Chance geben bei mir zu übernachten, damit sie Zürich kennen lernen. 
Ich arbeite unregelmässig, schlafe aber immer zu Hause.
Habe zwei Katzen (Leonardo und Sissi 6 Jahre alt) welche aber nichts gegen neue Mitbewohner haben. Sie sind sehr lieb! Auch ab 22.09.2017 habe ich einen Tierschutz Hund. welcher aus Spanien kommt und 2 Jahre alt ist. 
Auch dieser ist sehr lieb und macht nichts. (Er hat bei mir ein neues Leben erhalten, da er bereits mit 2 Monaten bei einer älteren Dame nur auf dem Balkon sein durfte und somit keine Lebenserfahrungen machen konnte)
Gratis Internet

name: Centrally located room in Zurich
description:
Private room in a modern and nice apartment in one of the hippest neighborboods of Zurich (Kreis 4). Close to restaurants, shops, bars, nightlife etc. Very good public transportation connections.

The space
I rent out my room in our shared apartment while I am travelling. You will be living in the apartment with my flatmate, who is very friendly and easy-going.

The room is 14 m2 and has a double bed, a mirror, a closet and a crosstrainer, if you feel like doing some exercise :-)
It can be a bit noisy from the street if you leave the window open, but if you close the window you hardly hear any noise.

Clean bed linens and towels will be provided.

The apartment is in the top floor of the building (there is an elevator!) and has a large open kitchen with a dining table. Feel free to use the kitchen, the refrigerator etc.
The bathroom is next to your room and will also be shared.

The apartment is located in the are

Despite travelling, I love photography and tv series!

The space
4.5 room flat that can accommodate up to 6 people in 3 different bedrooms. Room detail is as follow:

- Very large living room

- 1 bedroom with 1 queen size bed (1.6x2 - comfortable mattress)
- 1 bedroom with 1 sleeping couch (1.6x2 - rudimentary) + 1 baby bed (which I can remove if not used)

name: Zurich - easy, central, convenient
description: Unser Haus liegt nahe beim Zentrum von Zürich und dem Hauptbahnhof (15 Min. ) und ist trotzdem ruhig. Tram und Bus sind gleich in der Nähe. Es gibt zwei Zimmer, die je einzeln oder zu zweit bewohnt werden können, sowie  Küche und Bad.
host_about:
Ich bin Bernadette und wohne mit meinem Mann und drei erwachsenen Kindern in einem ruhigen aber belebten Quartiert in Zürich. Hier bewohnen wir ein Haus mit drei Wohnungen und haben Platz genug, Dich zu beherbergen. 
Als Familie sind wir viel gereist und haben immer wieder unkomplizierte Gastfreundschaft erlebt. Wir freuen uns, wenn die Welt zu uns kommt. 

Die ganze Familien kennt die Stadt Zürich gut. Wir  geben gerne Tipps im Bereich Ausgang, Kultur, Sport und Fun. Wer keine Tipps braucht ... auch ok.

2.5 room penthouse (68m2 +80m2 terrace) with full lake view. The space

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in Männedorf on Lake Zurich, a 17-minute train ride to Zurich City. At peak times there is a train connection every 15 minutes, otherwise every 30 minutes. From the flat it is a 3 minute walk to the lakeside where you can find many beaches with swimming spots. The neighborhood is very beautiful with forests, vineyards and many  hiking trails. Within 5 minutes walk there are grocery stores, sports facilities, banks and public transportation.

name: Private room, bright & quiet(1-3months possible)
description:
Very quiet, cozy room at the outskirts of Zürich. Buses bring you comfortably into town in 10-20 Min.Here you can relax having a view of the park and enjoy the impressions you have gathered throughout the day. Your host lives with you & speaks fluent German, English and Spanish:

The space
Sehr ruhiges und wohnliches Zimmer in einem schönen Randbezirk von Zürich. Auf dem Balkon mit Blick ins Grüne kann man nach einem erlebnisreichen Tag wunderbar entspannen. Der Zürichsee ist in wenigen Minuten zu Fuss zu erreichen und diverse Buslinien bringen dich komfortabel in 20 -30 Min. zu vielen zentralen Punkten der
Stadt. ( Hauptbahnhof, Universität, Flughafen, Altstadt etc.)

Guest access
* free Internet/WLAN
* access to washing machine, tumbler
* possibility to use my kitchen with all its
equipment
You will be provided with
* pillows, duvet, bed sheets, linen, towels
* hair dryer, hair styler
* iron & i
neighborhood_overview:
Wollishofen-Kilchberg is a very green and quiet, upscale residental area and offers nice views onto the lake and the mountains.

Some of the nicest bars and restaurants you can find along the Lake Zuerich are nearby.

IBM Research Labs, Swiss Re Centre for Global Dialogue, The GDI Institute/Think Tank and also the famous LINDT chocolate factory are located here (and you can often smell a slight fragrance of chocolate in the air...)
To have space, peace, a safe neighborhood and a lot of green around is what I love most about living here.
host_about:
“It is passion that makes man live;  reason makes one only last.” 
― Nicolas Chamfort
"Durch die Leidenschaften lebt der Mensch, durch die Vernunft existiert er bloss."

This is my motto  in life and I try to live up to it as much as I can. I have traveled extensively for work and leisure and made invaluable experiences during my trips. I am passionate about wine, food, exotic herbs and plants. But nothing beats good company and great talks! My home is my castle I love and I care about. You are welcome to share and enjoy it with me.

I am an easy going, open minded person with a lot of interests.  I love reading  and I am an "old school" newspaper addict. On a Sunday morning you will most likely find me on the sofa surrounded by newspapers and magazines and well equipped with coffee and cookies to indulge in what is going on in the world. 
*******************************************************************
Note to Guests
• I enjoy meeting people and like to know who my guests are. Write a bit about yourself and your purpose of travelling. That way I not only get a better picture of you but can come up with valuable information and ideas to make your arrival and stay pleasent, convenient and memorable.
• A novel of your life story isn't necessary; just write about what you think someone meeting you for the first time would want to know.

name: Modern Appartement with own Garden
description:
Schönes, helles 1.5-Zimmer-Appartement, mit eigener Küche, eigenem Bad, eigenem Gartensitzplatz, in schönem Wohnquartier, nah am Stadtzentrum.

Das Appartement ist modern gestaltet und möbliert. Es liegt im Erdgeschoss unseres Einfamilienhauses und hat einen eigenen Zugang. Zum Appartement gehört ein hübscher eigener Gartensitzplatz.

The space
Das Appartment ist ca. 30 m2 gross. Es handelt sich um einen offenen grossen Raum, der mit Vorhang optisch unterteilt werden kann. Er ist ideal für 2 Personen, für diese steht ein bequemes Doppelbett zur Verfügung. 1-2 weitere Personen können auf dem Bettsofa schlafen. Maximalbenutzung: 3 Erwachsene + 1 Kind, oder 2 Erwachsene + 2 Kinder. Kinder bis 12 Jahre erhalten 50% Rabatt auf den Preis einer Zusatzperson.

Die Lage ist sehr attraktiv: ruhiges Wohnquartier mit schönen Gärten, sonnig, sehr wenig Autoverkehr (Wohnstrasse, Sackgasse), kurze Distanzen zum Stadzentrum, zum Einkaufen und zu Naherholungs
host_about: Ich lebe seit meiner Geburt (1961) in Zürich. Ich bin selbstständiger Architekt. Ich bin verheiratet mit Barbara, wir haben 2 Söhne und wir leben in einem schönen Reihen-Einfamilienhaus im Quartier "Unterstrass". Wir reisen sehr gerne und haben immer gerne in Privathaushalten logiert. Wir möchten darum auch unser Haus anderen Reisenden für einen schönen Aufenthalt in Zürich anbieten. Wir können ihnen viele Tipps für einen spannenden Aufenthalt in Zürich geben und wir stehen mit Rat und Tat zur Seite.

name: Private room in center of Zurich
description:
Quite and central location, walking distance to Zurich main station, city center, trendy Zurich West, river and lake.

The space
Modern furnished room with desk and chair.
- Free WiFi.
- TV
- Bathroom with shower next to bedroom. Towels, shower gel/shampoo provided.
- Parking on the premises available upon request (CHF 25 per day payable in cash upon arrival).
- Breakfast available if requested and agreed by host (CHF 10 per night payable in cash upon arrival). Please let us know at time of booking if you wish breakfast. Not always possible.
- Kitchen is not part of our offer.

Guest access
Bathroom

Other things to note
Check in time must be agreed before arrival. Check in is possible after 6 pm, however most of the time there is flexibility to agree a suitable check in time. Please contact us to agree on the check in time.
The apartment is on the 3rd floor. There is no elevator in the
neighborhood_overview:
- Zurich airport can be reached in about 20 to 30 minutes from the apartment.
- Zurich Kreis 5 is a trendy neighbourhood in the center of the city. There are plenty of restaurants, coffee shops, bars, take aways, cinemas, night clubs, boutiques, shops, summer open air bars on the river and river swimming within easy walking distance.
- Zurich Kreis 1 (city center) and trendy Zurich West are also within a short walk.
- There are jogging and walking trails along the river 5 minutes from the apartment.
- Thanks to the proximity to Zurich main station (Zürich HB) any place in Switzerland can be easily reached: Exploring other cities, excursions to the mountains including hiking and skiing in winter within 60 minutes.
host_about: I like traveling, reading, music, movies, doing sports such as skiing. swimmimg, hiking, gym, yoga. I enjoy city life as well as being in nature and discovering new places, meeting existing and new friends.

name: A spacious space
description:
What makes Spacious Space quite distinctive, is that the host takes personal care of his guests. Among several services that Roland provides, there is definitely one that stands out: the inevitably praised morning meal. One of the specialities of the house. Neither breakfast nor brunch, not continental or English. In fact, it has been carefully developed over the years. Call it "Spacious Space's Solid Standard", generous enough to save you lunch expenses in outrageously expensive Zürich..☺

The space
Spacious Space features:
A rare urban architecture, all rooms are glazed from ceiling to floor.
Surrounded by a garden, trees, shrubs and lawns.
Located as central as possible, 2 main tram lines and 2 bus lines,
all stops are reachable within 5 minutes. You then need:
17 min to the main station, Zürich HB
14 min to the city centre
34 min to ZRH airport, by taxi 18 min.
Free parking spaces, a rare luxury in ZRH.
But ther

name: Super central & cozy! (Families with baby welcome)
description:
Are you looking for a central, yet cozy apartment for your stay in the hear of Zürich (Kreis 4)? Then welcome to our place! We accomodate 2 adults and a baby (max. 3 adults).
It's a 5min walk to downtown Zürich, a 10min walk to the train station or lake. Grocery store and restaurants just around the corner.
Our apartment is very central but with a charming feeling thanks to the common outdoor place just in from of our house. Toddlers toys available. Perfect for a week trip or longer.

The space
We live in an older building which has it's charm (with elevator, 1st floor). Very high ceilings and big windows and mostly wooden floors. If you are a fan of a more bohemian style, then you'll for sure like it.

It's a 3 room apartment. Livingroom, Bedroom and a big Kitchen. Bathroom with 1 toilet and a shower.

Guest access
Fully equipped apartment with bathroom, kitchen, dubble bed, optional bed on the sofa, a baby bed and fr
neighborhood_overview: Bohemian and very close to the city center. Surrounded by younger hipsters and alternative families it makes the area one of the most popular in town. It feels like living in a smaller town and that's the biggest and greatest quality of the neighbourhood in District 4. Enen suitable for a stay with a toddler or baby. We can point out the closest and best playgrounds;) One of them is just right outside our door.
host_about:
I am an easy going and quite calm person interested in art, photography, music, travelling, yoga and healthy food. 

I my daly life I work as an Art Consultant for photography at an international gallery. 

Whenever I am travelling I try to enjoy the place I visit as much as I can. This does not neccessairily include visiting all touristic attractions. Instead select a few highlights and enjoy them as much as possible. Anything from amazing architecture to botanical gardens keeps my eyes wide open!

From Zurich HB, get off 2 Metro stops at S4 Giesshubel, and S10 Binz station almost comes to the door my apartment from Zurich main station, so it's very convenient. S4 runs every 20 minutes. In addition there are one tram station for tram 5 and 13, and a bus stop (Manesseplatz) for bus 72 (to Escher-Wyss-Platz) station nearby. Take the S4 subway, unless you have a GPS or a map! It takes about 30 minutes to get here from the Zurich Airport according to (website hidden) maps, if you are right on train schedule. I would say 60 minutes is more realistic.

In Manesseplatz is next to Schmiede Wiedikon where locals hang out. Famous Tattoo shop, Ink Tank across the street. There is also a restaurant with a yellow sign of a fork and knife across the apartment. There are nice restaurants around to discover. However, Zurich prices are very high.

Super convenient to just hop on the S10 train nearby at Binz to go straight to the top of the mountain at Uetliberg in 15 minu
host_about:
Please send inquiry before you try to book it.

Much like Darth Vader, I decided to stop working for The Emperor and decided to side with Luke Skywalker, Yogi and his friends.  Yogi learned me martial arts, and I like to carry around my light saber, and stow my aircraft in my apartment. 

Some Quotes:
"Unthinking respect for authority is the greatest enemy of truth."
- Albert Einstein

"Peace cannot be kept by force. It can only be achieved by understanding. You cannot subjugate a nation forcibly unless you wipe out every man, woman, and child. Unless you wish to use such drastic measures, you must find a way of settling your disputes without resort to arms." 
- Albert Einstein

"All of science is nothing more than the refinement of everyday thinking."
- Albert Einstein

"Now he has departed from this strange world a little ahead of me. That means nothing. People like us, who believe in physics, know that the distinction between past, present, and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion."
- Albert Einstein

"We cannot expect to cross the rainbow bridge through a good act of contrition; that will not be sufficient. We have to understand." - Terrence McKenna

"Hastiness and superficiality are the psychic diseases of the twentieth century, and more than anywhere else this illness is reflected in the press." - Alexandr Solzhenitsyn

"My ultimate dream is to sow seeds in the desert. To revegetate the deserts is to sow seed in people's hearts." - Masanobu Fukuoka

"Men tend to have the beliefs that suit their passions. Cruel men believe in a cruel God, and use their belief to excuse their cruelty. Only kindly men believe in a kindly God, and they would be kindly in any case." - Bertrand Russell

"Live as if you were living for the second time and had acted as wrongly the first time as you are about to act now." - Viktor Frankl

"The sick individual finds himself at home with all other similarly sick individuals. The whole culture is geared to this kind of pathology. The result is that the average individual does not experience the separateness and isolation the fully schizophrenic person feels. He feels at ease among those who suffer from the same deformation; in fact, it is the fully sane person who feels isolated in the insane society — and he may suffer so much from the incapacity to communicate that it is he who may become psychotic. In the context of this study the crucial question is whether the hypothesis of a quasi-autistic or of low-grade schizophrenic disturbance would help us to explain some of the violence spreading today." - Erich Fromm

"World War III is a guerrilla information war with no division between military and civilian participation." - Marshall Mcluhan

"Reason is a harmonising, controlling force rather than a creative one. Even in the most purely logical realms, it is insight that first arrives at what is new." 
- Bertrand Russell

Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened. 
- Dr. Seuss

“It’s more important to know what sort of person has a disease than to know what sort of disease a person has.” 
― Hippocrates

- Albert Einstein

"All of science is nothing more than the refinement of everyday thinking."
- Albert Einstein

"Now he has departed from this strange world a little ahead of me. That means nothing. People like us, who believe in physics, know that the distinction between past, present, and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion."
- Albert Einstein

"We cannot expect to cross the rainbow bridge through a good act of contrition; that will not be sufficient. We have to understand." - Terrence McKenna

"Hastiness and superficiality are the psychic diseases of the twentieth century, and more than anywhere else this illness is reflected in the press." - Alexandr Solzhenitsyn

"My ultimate dream is to sow seeds in the desert. To revegetate the deserts is to sow seed in people's hearts." - Masanobu Fukuoka

"Men tend to have the beliefs that suit their passions. Cruel men believe in a cruel God, and use their belief to excuse their cruelty. Only kindly men believe in a kindly God, and they would be kindly in any case." - Bertrand Russell

"Live as if you were living for the second time and had acted as wrongly the first time as you are about to act now." - Viktor Frankl

"The sick individual finds himself at home with all other similarly sick individuals. The whole culture is geared to this kind of pathology. The result is that the average individual does not experience the separateness and isolation the fully schizophrenic person feels. He feels at ease among those who suffer from the same deformation; in fact, it is the fully sane person who feels isolated in the insane society — and he may suffer so much from the incapacity to communicate that it is he who may become psychotic. In the context of this study the crucial question is whether the hypothesis of a quasi-autistic or of low-grade schizophrenic disturbance would help us to explain some of the violence spreading today." - Erich Fromm

"World War III is a guerrilla information war with no division between military and civilian participation." - Marshall Mcluhan

"Reason is a harmonising, controlling force rather than a creative one. Even in the most purely logical realms, it is insight that first arrives at what is new." 
- Bertrand Russell

Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened. 
- Dr. Seuss

“It’s more important to know what sort of person has a disease than to know what sort of disease a person has.” 
― Hippocrates

name: cosy room in fully refurbished flat
description:
one bedroom in fully refurbished, fully equipped, old flat,
next to city center and main station but also close to Sihl river (Sihl valley);
with single bed, wardrobe etc
shared roof terrasse, public barbecue area

The space
a typical Zurich City OLD STYLE FLAT and fully RUFURBISHED, it is central but quiet:
the flat is LOCATED close to the main station HB and city center (approx. 1 km), there are also a tram stations (STAUFFACHER and Werd, in 5 min walking distance),
the street is a side street in a residential area, but restaurants and a bar are just at the square next to the building;

there are fast food stores (healthy and unhealthy) and coffee shops, supermarkets in just 5 min walk distance; and in another few hundred meters starts the night life area (Langstrasse)

...and we have a shared roof top terasse with beautiful view to Uetliberg, downstairs at the Hallwylplatz is a public Barbecue area
neighborhood_overview:
as said above Hallwylplatz is very CENTRAL and all you need is around in WALKING DISTANCE, also great connection with public transport,

just around the corner is the Sihl river - perfect for a walk or run to the SIHL VALLEY, or even uphill to UETLIBERG;

furthermore there is an indoor swimming pool nearby (50m lanes)
host_about:
I would like to share my great, spacious apartment via renting the guest room (preferably on weekdays) or sub-rent the entire flat (whilst I'm travelling) to long term guests, preferably business/ working women.

I personally love travelling, I stayed abroad in Argentina, Mexico, Peru, Ghana travelled often to Asia, in particular China, Malaysia...and speak, besides German, very well English and Spanish, little bit French.

name: Mi Casa es su Casa
description:
Our cool and comfortable two bedroom apartment with broad daylight has a true city feeling! It comfortably fits up to six guests and is centrally located in a quiet residential area served by excellent public transport connections.

The space
A two bedroom apartment with natural daylight at all times of the day. It can host up to 6 people and is fully equipped with everything you need for your stay at Zürich.

The apartment does have an unfortunate detail : the bathroom is rather unconventional as it was built in a way that no common person would think. If you look at the picture, you will see that you need to pass the sink and the toilet in order to enter the shower. Strange yes, but definitely original :-) We always keep it clean but bear in mind it is very small. We are truly sorry for this, we believe the architect might not have been a bathroom person as it is narrow and just made to do your toiletries and nothing more; but the rest of the apartment
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and very safe even at late night. You will find local supermarkets and small grocery shops, and nice bars and restaurants on the adjacent streets as well as a major shopping center (“Sihlcity”).
host_about:
I love to travel and be welcome at the places that I visit, that's how I try that you feel when stay with us. 

I'm very simple and happy person, always improving myself and my work, so any suggestions are welcome. 
I will continue travelling with my kids and from the free time in leisure take some ideas and improvements to host you even better.

name: Discover Zürich & relax comfortably
description:
Bright & sunny room (17sqm/172sqft) in 3-bedroom apartment. Situated at the outskirts of Zürich, in a very quiet & green surrounding. Convenient bus&train connection with Airport (35min), City Centre/central station/old town (25min), Gqqgle HQ (25min), University & ETH (30-45mi),Lindt & Sprüngli, IBM Search Lab, GDI (10-15min walk or bus), Lake Zürich 10 min. walk. Free private parking. Ideal for a weekend or for a long-term stay (1-3 months) if you are here on a work assignment, internship etc.

The space
(Please check all sections of the description listed below (e.g. " Other Important Things To Notice" )
* 1 single bed (90 x 210 cm), softer mattress
* pull out/sleeping sofa (160 x 220 cm), firm mattress
* small office desk & chair
* pillows, duvet, bed sheets, linen, towels included
* hair dryer, hair styler
* shared bathroom (2 sinks, shower,bath tub)
* free Internet/Wifi
* possibility to use my kitchen
* coffee, t
neighborhood_overview:
Wollishofen-Kilchberg is a very green, quiet and first of all residential area. Due to its characteristics and proximity to the center it is in high demand. It offers nice views into green gardens, panoramic views over the lake and the mountains.
You will be woken up by birdsongs and not by traffic.
Some of the nicest lakeside bars and restaurants you can find along the Lake Zürich are nearby. (lf you look at the map indication of my listing click on the icons for restaurants or point of views you will find around my place to get some ideas.)
Also the famous LINDT chocolate factory and there gorgeous outlet shop is located nearby and you can often smell a slight fragrance of chocolate in the air.
To have space, peace, a safe neighborhood and a lot of green around is what I love most living here and would like to share with you.
host_about:
“It is passion that makes man live;  reason makes one only last.” 
― Nicolas Chamfort
"Durch die Leidenschaften lebt der Mensch, durch die Vernunft existiert er bloss."

This is my motto  in life and I try to live up to it as much as I can. I have traveled extensively for work and leisure and made invaluable experiences during my trips. I am passionate about wine, food, exotic herbs and plants. But nothing beats good company and great talks! My home is my castle I love and I care about. You are welcome to share and enjoy it with me.

I am an easy going, open minded person with a lot of interests.  I love reading  and I am an "old school" newspaper addict. On a Sunday morning you will most likely find me on the sofa surrounded by newspapers and magazines and well equipped with coffee and cookies to indulge in what is going on in the world. 
*******************************************************************
Note to Guests
• I enjoy meeting people and like to know who my guests are. Write a bit about yourself and your purpose of travelling. That way I not only get a better picture of you but can come up with valuable information and ideas to make your arrival and stay pleasent, convenient and memorable.
• A novel of your life story isn't necessary; just write about what you think someone meeting you for the first time would want to know.

name: Centrally located 4-room apartment – a real gem!
description:
This spacious and bright 4-room apartment (100m2) is a true jewel in the heart of the city. It was freshly renovated in spring 2020. The well-kept parquet floors create a warm and cosy atmosphere throughout the apartment. Each room is stylishly furnished and has an individual charm. Magnificent roof terrace for shared use. High speed WIFI included.

The space
4-ROOM APARTMENT IN BOUTIQUE-STYLE
1) Living room with super comfortable lounge (for 12 people), armchair, sound system and turntable.
2) Dining room with long wooden table, benches and sideboard.
3) Dressing room / home office with make-up corner, open closet, shelves for shoes or clothes, work table.
4) Bedroom with comfortable double bed (7 zone mattress, 160 cm wide), vintage closet. Facing the quiet inner courtyard.
5) Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, coffee maker, smoothie mixer, lemon squeezer, mortar, microwave, rice stove etc.
6) Bathroom with ebony black parquet
neighborhood_overview:
Although the apartment is located in the very center of Zurich, it's quiet at night – the bedroom is facing the courtyard.

There are numerous restaurants, bars and bakeries in the same street or in the immediate neighborhood.

Everything is very close by foot:
- next restaurant: 1 min. (same building)
- next bakery: 1 min. (same building)
- ETH / University: 2 - 5 min.
- Hospital: 5 min.
- next supermarket: 5 min.
- Old Town: 10 min.
- Main Train Station: 10 min.
- Kunsthaus (Biggest art museum in Zurich): 10 min.
- Schauspielhaus (Biggest theatre in Zurich): 10 min.
- River: 10 min.
- Lake: 15 min.
- Opera House: 20 min.
host_about: What I like: All kind of Arts (Fine Arts, Music, Literature, Film …), Independent Travel, Sports (Tennis, Snowboard Touring, Windsurf, Kite), Concerts, Radiohead, dEUS, Mulholland Drive, Memento, A bout de souffle, all books from David Mitchell, people with humour …

name: Sunny room in a duplex apartment
description:
We have a big bed room available in a lovely duplex apartment. The bus/tram/train stations are minutes away and can bring you anywhere in the city. Animated Oerlikon, with its village atmosphere and its bars/restaurant/market are down the street.

The space
The apartment has a real charm. Very sunny with visible roof beams. The room for guests is comfortable. The place is spacious and located in a charming neighbourhood, with easy access to the center of the city.

Guest access
You will share the apartment with me my wife and my 14 months son who is super sociable.

You have access to basically everything in the place including obviously the living room and the kitchen. You can use the washing machine and dryer if you needs it. Wireless access is available all around if you have your own device.

Other things to note
Our son Azad has joined us. Born in June 2020 he is super sociable and love meeting new people
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is great. You have all the facilities around including shops, grocery stores, restaurants and bars. The advantage is that the apartment is on a quiet street which allow you to sleep well at night.
host_about:
I am working in IT here in Zurich and have a tendency to work long hours. 

Before moving to Switzerland I spent 3 years doing an overland journey around the world. I rode my motorcycle from London to Vietnam, then traveled across the America from Ushuaia all the way up to New York. If you want to know more about my journey check out my blog lespassengers com or my fessebouc "les passengers"

I keep traveling from time to time and am delighted to host travellers as much as I can to keep an open mind and feed my curiosity. Now I can't travel as much I love to have the travellers coming to me ;-)

name: Stadt Zürich Guesthouse (Zimmer3)
description:
Ein grosses Zimmer mit Bett und Pult in einem Häuschen mit Garten in der Stadt Zürich. Ruhig gelegen. Das ganze Haus hat 4 Zimmer nur für Airbnb Gäste. Es hat 2 WC's und 1 Bad mit Dusche, eine zweite seperate Dusche befindet sich noch in der Waschküche.
Busstation 3 min entfernt. In 15 min in der City, in 30 min am Flughafen.
10 Min zu Fuss zum Lindenplatz ( Migros, Denner , Apotheke, Bäckerei..)

The space
In der Stadt Zürich vermieten wir in einem Häuschen 4 eingerichtete Zimmer an airbnb Gäste. In Deinem Zimmer hast Du eingrosses Pult, einen Fernseher, ein 180x200 cm grosses Bett und einen Kleiderkasten.
Küche und Bad sind zur gemeinsamen Nutzung. Die Gäste benützen gemeinsam die Küche, Bäder/WCs und Waschmaschine. Jeder Gast hat seinen Platz im Kühlschrank und im Vorratskasten, Geschirrspüler ist vorhanden. Im Essraum oder in der Küche begegnest du vielleicht einmal einem airbnb Bewohner. Es hat 2 WC's und 1 Dusche im Haus. Parkplat

name: Schöner Raum am Zürichsee
description:
Schöner grosser Raum am Zürichsee im idyllischen Zürich Seefeld, in Künstlerwohnung,
Grosses Fenster, abschliessbar.auf Wunsch kann auch die ganze Wohnung mitbenutzt werden, Küche Badezimmer, Essraum, Balkon, Piano im Salon.
Tolle Atmosphäre!

The space
Die Wohnungist romantisch, liegt direkt am See und hat ein bohemienartiges künstlerisches Flair.

Guest access
Die Gäste können auf Wunsch die ganze Wohnung mitbenutzen, nach Ansprache

Other things to note
In der Wohnung gibt es auch ein Klavier und Instrumente, im Badezimmer ist eine Badewanne.
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung liegt im schönen Zürich-Seefeld, direkt am See und gleichzeitig im Stadtzentrum, nahe gelegen ist die Oper , die Schiffsanlieger, der Züriberg zum wandern, golden, Sport treiben, das Kunsthaus, Theater und Galerien,gegenüber befindet sich das gepflegte Strandbad Tiefenrinnen und die Seepromenade.
host_about:
Guten Tag und Herzlich Willkommen! Welcome everybody!
Ich bin Künstlerin und arbeite und lebe an verschiedenen Orten, vor allem in Zürich, Köln, Paris und in Italien.
Ich habe eine One-woman-show auf der Bühne , arbeite auch als Karikaturistin und als Coach für Kunst , Theater und Deutsche Sprache.
Meine beiden Kinder sind erwachsen und unsere Familie ist eine lustige Patchworkfamilie, verstreut in ganz Europa.

Meine Sprachen sind Deutsch, Englisch, Französisch, Italienisch, ein bisschen Spanisch ,
Airbnb ist eine tolle Einrichtung, mit Menschen aus allen Ländern zu kommunizieren, sich auszutauschen und Hilfe anzubieten, das bereichert das Leben, ich freue mich sehr auf viele  Gäste aus aller Welt, in allen Generationen und allen Konfessionen!
Gerne gebe ich Auskunft über die Kultur des Landes und Tips für Ausflüge, aber auch einfach, um sich in Zürich wohl zu fühlen.
Bienvenu, welcome und herzlichst willkommen in Zürich am See!

name: Studio Apartment Junior
description:
These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS. If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
Junior Studio Apartments' size: 25m² - 30m², depending on available units

This modern studio provides everything one may expect from a place to live in. The living area features a cozy sitting corner, flat screen TV and a working desk, which can also serve as a dining table. The open kitchenette is fully fitted with a glass ceramic stove, microwave with baking and grill function, coffee maker as well as cutlery and crockery. The sleeping area tempts with a snug double bed and sufficient space for relaxation. The separate bathroom with modern glass sliding door offers a shower or bathtub, as well as hand towels, a hairdryer and company-branded toiletries.

The apartment is avai
neighborhood_overview:
This flagship apartment house is located in the urban area of the 3rd district of Zurich. The city center and the lake can be reached within a few minutes by public transport. The direct vicinity offers some restaurants, bars, as well as shopping possibilities. The shopping center Shilcity with numerous shops, restaurants and a cinema is just around the corner. Moreover, local recreation areas Sihl and Allmend Brunau are situated nearby.

Visit La Lup at Wolframplatz 1 in Zurich and enjoy some international specialties and delicious Romanian food. Discover our Jar Menus with authentic dishes from East to West.

For all clients of VISIONAPARTMENTS, the restaurant is open as following:

Mon – Thu: 07:30 AM – 11:30 PM
Fri: 07:30 AM – 00:30 AM
Sat: 09:00 AM – 00:30 AM
Sun: 11:00 AM – 11:00 PM
host_about: VISIONAPARTMENTS specializes in renting out stylish and furnished serviced apartments all around the world. Established in Switzerland in 1999, the company quickly grew from a start-up to Switzerland’s market leader with a global presence. Today, VISIONAPARTMENTS offers tailored temporary living solutions in over 850 business locations worldwide.

name: Studio Penthouse Apartment, Seefeld
description:
The space
Our studio penthouse apartment offers practical and luxurious accommodation in the trendy "Seefeld" district in Zurich City. Fully furnished, tastefully decorated, centrally located, and perfectly connected to public transportation. And with our included “City Stay Services” you will enjoy classic hotel services such as a weekly cleaning of your apartment.

This penthouse apartment suite (34 m²) with a large, private terrace (totaling 16 m²) is a first-class apartment with high-quality furnishings that is suitable for one or – for brief stays – two people. The suite features a queen-sized bed (200x160 cm), large wardrobe, an integrated eat-in kitchen with booth, and a bathroom with bathtube. Here you can enjoy peace and tranquility on your private terrace. WLAN Internet access is also included in the apartment price. Additional room service is offered on site. description:
The apartment is located in the city center Seefeld Bellevue-definitely the best location in Zurich - 2 minute walk to the beautiful lake of Zurich; 5 min walk to Bellevue and Bahnhof Stadelhofen; tram 2 and 4 are just outside of the building.

The space
The building and the flat were newly renovated. It provides high-quality furniture all in the top condition. Additionally there is a balcony. The apartment is on the 1st floor and there is also an elevator in the building.
The sleeping room is separated and there is enough space to store your clothes and luggage. The kitchen is fully equipped with an oven, fridge and dishwasher. Additionally you can find toaster, coffee machine, and kettle. There is a big dining table and TV in the living area for you to have a nice meal in the flat.

balcony; elevator in the building

description:
Our apartment is located in the center of Zürich. It's a 10-minute walk to the main train station. A 2-min walk to the tram stop and grocery shops. If you're a foodie this is the hottest place in Zürich for culinary journies. Your room has a king-size bed with 3 windows. The apt has 2 balconies, wooden floors, design furniture and is decorated with much love. We are currently working from the mountains, so you'll have the APT most of the time for yourself.

The space
Its really the great energy and the perfect blend of proximity to the city centre while living in a calm area & a secluded space. A place to relax & tank up energy from an active day.

Guest access

2 minutes by foot from the farmers market (Helvetiaplatz) on Tuesday and Friday morning. 2 minutes from the flea market (Kanzlei) on Satur

description:
Enjoy a good night sleep in my modern basement studio close to Zürich City West business and night life districts. Public transport, village shops and café's within walking distance.
See you soon!
Best regards Thomas

The space
This studio is perfect for max. 2 people. Separate guest’s bathroom, WLAN, limited cooking availability, Nespresso machine included.
Excellent transport connection form the airport Zürich or from the main railway station (Zürich Hauptbahnhof).
Within walking distance, several restaurants and shopping facilities and many clubs. By a 5 minutes’ walk you enjoy a beautiful relaxing area along the riverside. A 25 min walk along the river Limmat leads you into the centre of Zurich City or to trendy quarters. Do you like to jog or bicycle along the river or have a walk in the woods close-by? A beautiful restaurant, called Die Waid, with a spectacular view over the town into the Alps serves perfect breakfast, lunch, dinner or
neighborhood_overview: The studio is located close to the trendy and booming City West area. You will experience the vibrant city life as well the calm of a river and the woods.
host_about: A warm welcome in Zürich. I have been living here now for 10 years and in my opinion the most exciting place to live in the German part of Switzerland: All amenities of a lively city, great spots at the lakes’ border, at once close to the alps/countryside and to the airport of Zürich, agitating cultural events like Theaterspektakel in August or exhibitions and fairs, restaurants, bars and clubs of all gusto, and to keep in mind inspiring shopping facilities.

description:
Wohnung mit Küche und Bad. Ca 38 qm. 2 min zu Fuss zum Albisriederplatz. Die Unterkunft ist gut für alleinreisende Abenteurer, Geschäftsreisende und Paare. Gerne vermieten wir das Appartement auch für eine längere Zeitdauer. Regelmässige Reinigung mit Bettwäsche wechseln sind inklusive. Bäckerei, Lebensmittelläden, Restaurants, Apotheke, Drogerie, Post und Bank in der Nähe.

The space
Die Unterkunft ist ideal für 1-2 Personen.Wenn Ihr zu zweit kommt, bitten wir Dich für 2 Gäste zu buchen, wir richten Dir dann das Bett für 2 Personen! Besten Dank!
Bad und Küche mit Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Kaffeemaschine, sowie Geschirr und Besteck und Pfannen sind vorhanden.
Weisse Handtücher und ein frisch bezogenes 160x200cm Bett sind für Dich/Euch bereit.
Bei längerem Aufenthalt wird die Wohnung regelmässig gereinigt.
.
Föhn, TV, Bügeleisen, Bügelbrett stehen bereit.

Apartment with kitchen and bathroom. Approximately 38 square meter
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung befindet sich in einem Business Haus neben dem Crowne Plaza Hotel. Mit dem Tram ( 2 oder 3) bist Du  in wenigen Minuten in der City, am Hauptbahnhof (ca. 15min/3 Km) und in der Altstadt ( 15 min/ 3 Km) oder am Bellevue /See ( Tram 2 ).

wohne und arbeite schon seit immer in der Stadt Zürich.

description:
Beautiful and peaceful space for 1 or 2 people near the centre of ZH. Access to four tram lines to town and major train stations. Walking distance to lake and walking/sport trails, museums, restaurants etc... Please note that the minimum stay here is three nights. Guests with longer stays will be given preference.

The space
This is a calming and beautiful space with high ceilings, natural light and views of the Uetliberg hill on the other side of the lake. It's very quiet.

Guest access
You will have the whole space to yourself. There is a very small half kitchen with two burners and a toaster oven (not a full kitchen) and a beautiful bathroom with a full tub and shower. Amenities such as shampoo, soap etc.. are provided.

Great coffee shop for breakfast, bakery, and grocery stores also restaurants for dinner (a forest restaurant and one of Zürich's best fondue places are within walking distance). I am more than happy to make suggestions on where to eat, walk etc.. while you are here.

name: Mini-Musiker-Zimmer
description:
Im Herzen von Alt-Züri, bespielen Schweizer-Volksmusiker täglich die Live-Bühne des Kult-Lokals "Aelpli-Bar". Für sie stehen einfache Übernachtungsmöglichkeiten z.B im "Stockbett" zur Verfügung, welche auch von anderen Gästen gebucht werden können.

The space
Winziges Zimmer mit Stockbett - Toilette im Gang, die Dusche ist zugänglich durch das Büro der Aelpli-Bar.
neighborhood_overview: Das legendären "Dörfli" ist Ausflugsziel für viele Touristen aus der Agglomeration, der übrigen Schweiz und natürlich auch von Gästen aus dem Ausland. Weil dem seit Generationen so ist, ist das Angebot organisch gewachsen ... es gibt es fast kein Wunsch dem die hiesige Gastronomie nicht entsprechen kann ...
host_about:
Als vielbeschäftigte Mutter, bin ich auch Wirtin der Aelpli-Bar. Dort gibt es auf der Welt einzigartig jeden Tag frische Aelpli-Milch ab 17.00 Uhr und ab 20.00 Uhr, dazu live Musik. Die Aelpli-Bar ist seit Generationen ein Treffpunkt von Schweizer Volksmusikern, die hier gerne auch ihre STUBETE abhalten. Weil diese Künstler aus der ganzen Schweiz hier auftreten gibt es ab und zu Bedarf sie für die Nacht unterzubringen. Oft blieben diese Kammern aber leer, so habe ich die Gelegenheit am Schopf gepackt und biete sie auf airbnb an. 
Sollte Du den Wunsch hegen persönlich in Kontakt mit Einheimischen zu kommen fühle Dich bitte in der Aelpli-Bar wie zu Hause.

name: Double bed room 2 Top of Zurich
description:
The place is well suited for longer stays

The room is located in a private terraced house

There is a free parking in front of the house

1 minute to the bus stop. Every 10 minutes there is a direct connection to the central train station and from the Klusplatz to the center. To the train station it takes 20 minutes

Good opportunities for shopping

Large kitchen with dining table, veranda with dining table, balcony with garden view and lounge furniture

Independent check-in is possible

The space
The room is upstairs

The bathroom is on the same floor

There is enough space to supply the toiletries

The bed measures 160 x 200 cm

Each guest receives a set of fresh toweling and extra pillows and blankets

When choosing the textiles, care was taken to ensure that they are made of natural materials

A desk and storage space for a longer stay are a
neighborhood_overview:
After a long sightseeing tour, you have the opportunity to immerse yourself in another world and relax on a walk in the nearby forest. There stands as a "sight with history" a large water-spitting elephant in Wehrenbach

Or the Loorenturm, a 30 meter high wooden structure, from which you can enjoy a view in clear weather up to the Bernese, Central Swiss and Glarus Alps

Also, a jogging round, overlooking the lake, offers along the ridge. The way leads through the old core of the aera and you suddenly feel like in the countryside

A short drive away is the Bad Fohrbach, with swimming pool, indoor pool and a heated outdoor spa pool. Also, various massages are offered

The Fifa headquarters, the zoo and the Masoala hall are also nearby

To end the day with culinary delights, there is an Indian restaurant nearby, a special steakhouse or a former cowshed for rustic food etc.

name: Modern spacious apartment
description:
We rent our spacious and cozy flat in the center of Zurich. The flat furnishing is minimal - we have more plants then furniture. The place is clean, light in colors and with direct sun in the afternoon.

The space
Our flat consist of two rooms: big one with kitchen (60m2) and a small one (20m2). They are two comfortable beds, one in small room (for 2 person) and second in the salon (for 2 person). If you want to stay in four, it is good that you feel well with each other, since the bathroom and kitchen is accessible only from salon.

Guest access
All usual stuff. Towels, hairdryer, bedsheets, etc. It is possible to use washing machine and tumbler. Kitchen is fully equipped for four person, most of things are there, but it is rather minimalistic for cooking.

Other things to note
The
host_about: I am scientist working in Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH) in Zurich. I teach Image Analysis and work on various scientific projects related to genetics and cancer treatments. I am very relaxed person and I follow only few rules in life: I do not use comb, I do not hurry and I respect everyone disregarding age, status or foot size. I do believe in surf and laugh.

name: Style&Large @Hipster-City-Center with HomeCinema.
description:
4,5 beautiful and minimalistic curated white rooms with 3 bedrooms with separate door. 3 super-large king-size-double-beds. Plus 1 Super-Large-King-Sofa. Minimum furniture you really need - for maximum space with a spice of handcrafted individual artistic decoration. Very cool designed comfortable kitchen. You will love it, if you like this style. The right place for urban nomads and open minded travelers. 2Meter-Super-Smart-TV-Screen with Netflix etc. Looking forward to hear from you !! (-:

The space
Individual style and character. Minimal furniture in the whole apartement. With 2 Meter Smart TV Screen with Soroundsound. Super-Large-King-Sofa.

Guest access
2 different Balconies. One of the south-side and one of the north-side of the house. If there is sunshine, you have sun from the morning till the evening! (-:

Other things to note
Netflix for you as much as you want (-:
neighborhood_overview: This is a very lively area in the middle of restaurants, bars and  nightlife. The media call it the Hipster-Area of Zürich. Its a paradise for people who loves culture: There are 100 Restaurants, Bars, Cafes, etc. of all kinds in walking distance from the apartement. You can get Food from Swiss. India. Thai. Türkey Greek, Spain, German, and so on. The famous vegetarian Restaurant „Hiltl“ is just around the corner. As well you will find Clubs where you can go for dancing and enjoy life. This is „Kreis4“ of Zürich. The foodstore „Coop“ is in 100 meter distance and is open till 22.00h from Monday till Saturday. Please be aware, that it can be noisy at night sometimes on friday or saturday night, when the weather is warm and people are on the way.
host_about:

huge & warm space with direct connection to the city, 1 bedroom, sofa where 1 or 2 people can sleep on, kitchen, bath tub, terrace and a cat.

there is no quarantine when entering Switzerland. So it's pretty easy to travel here at the moment.

The flat is fully furnished and has everything you need to feel at home.

The space
We have two bedrooms with a king size bed in each (160 x 200).
Ideally, the maximum occupancy is of 4 adults or 2 adults and 2 children. . If you want to book with more adults/children, please write us and we see what we can do with additional beds.

Please be aware that the second bedroom is only available if you book for 3 or 4 persons. The second bedroom is on the same floor, but with a separate entrance. It is ideal for a second couple, an additional person or teenagers, but not so for very small children as this room is situated on the same floor (no other flats on this floor and top floor, so really private) but outside the flat (a mansarde room).

host_about:
We are a small family (2 adults and one small daughter) who loves to travel, get to know other cultures, places and people.
Travelling with airbnb has opened our minds in many ways and has shown us that there are many arrangements for living that are possible and interesting. We have brought many enhancing ideas back to our home, in some way, a little souvenir of our holidays.

We habe also started offering our flat during our holidays and we hope our guests feel at home, just like we feel when staying in someone elses home.

Looking forward to the next 1000 or so stays!

Within a short walking distance, guests will find a plethora of restaurants, bars and clubs and shopping opportunities. The beautiful Sihl can be easily reached on foot. You can also enjoy a walk to the city center alongside the river.
host_about: VISIONAPARTMENTS specializes in renting out stylish and furnished serviced apartments all around the world. Established in Switzerland in 1999, the company quickly grew from a start-up to Switzerland’s market leader with a global presence. Today, VISIONAPARTMENTS offers tailored temporary living solutions in over 850 business locations worldwide.

name: Möblierte Wohnung/Zimmer
description:
Möbliertes Einzelzimmer in Zürich Oerlikon, zwischen Zürich Oerlikon und Zürich Seebach zu vermieten. Gute Lage, schnell in der City und schnell am Flughafen.

The space
Die Wohnung befindet sich an einem sehr gut gelegenen Ort, Autobahnanschluss unmittelbar in der Nähe sowie auch der öffentliche Verkehr. Direkt bei der Station Felsenrainstrasse vom Tram 14 und Bus 768. Der Bahnhof Seebach befindet sich 2 Minuten Fussweg entfernt, zum Bahnhof Oerlikon sind es 5 Minuten zu Fuss, oder 1 Minute mit Tram oder Bus. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten Sternen Oerlikon 2 Tramstationen entfernt, Seebach 1 Tramstation entfernt. Direkt gegenüber befindet sich ein Quartierladen für den kleinen Einkauf. Zum Flughafen sind es 13 Minuten mit dem Bus 768 (direkt vor der Tür), oder 4 Minuten mit der S-Bahn von Zürich Oerlikon aus.

Möbliertes Einzelzimmer ca. 22 m2, Küche ca. 5m2, Bad ca. 5m2, Eingangsbereich ca 12m2, zu vermieten. Der Mietpreis versteht sich inklusive Nebenkosten,

name: Bright and charming, in Zürich
description:
1 Bedroom Flat with a fully equiped open kitchen, luxurious bathroom, sep. toilet, big private terrace and balcony and a very comfortable king size bed.

The space
The flat is 65m2, very bright with fully glazed front and sliding doors, has an additional 40m2 terrace and a separate balcony. The flat has a separate room with washing machine / tumbler for your use only. The interior is partly furnished with antiques and design pieces, which we hope our guests will appreciate as much as we do.
The kitchen, which is open to the dining room/living room, is fully equipped with steamer, glass ceramic and gas cooker, dishwasher, fridge-freezer and is looking forward to creative cooks.

The location: a few minutes walk from Gieshübel station (4min to HB), 50m from Sihlcity Nord tram stop and shopping centre, in the middle of Zurich's Jewish quarter. Both the centre and the Uetliberg are within walking distance. The motorway access is also only a few minutes
neighborhood_overview: The house is very quiet, but also very close to the train station (4min walk) or the tram stop (1min walk). There are good shopping facilities, restaurants and cinemas in the immediate vicinity and you are immediately in the countryside. The Sihl River flows in front of the house, and a beautiful pedestrian and bicycle path leads to the centre in 10 minutes. You can walk from the house directly to Zurich's local mountain where you can enjoy a fantastic view of the city.
host_about: Soy argentina, vivo en Suiza con Oliver desde hace casi 20 años. name: Musiker-Unterkunft
description:
Im Herzen von Alt-Züri, bespielen Schweizer-Volksmusiker täglich die Live-Bühne des Kult-Lokals "Aelpli-Bar". Für sie stehen einfache Übernachtungsmöglichkeiten z.B im "Stockbett" zur Verfügung, welche auch von anderen Gästen gebucht werden können.

The space
Im Herzen von Alt-Zürich gelegen, ruhig. Leiste Dir einen Hauch Luxus.
neighborhood_overview: Das legendären "Dörfli" ist Ausflugsziel für viele Touristen aus der Agglomeration, der übrigen Schweiz und natürlich auch von Gästen aus dem Ausland. Weil dem seit Generationen so ist, ist das Angebot organisch gewachsen ... es gibt es fast kein Wunsch dem die hiesige Gastronomie nicht entsprechen kann ...
host_about:
Als vielbeschäftigte Mutter, bin ich auch Wirtin der Aelpli-Bar. Dort gibt es auf der Welt einzigartig jeden Tag frische Aelpli-Milch ab 17.00 Uhr und ab 20.00 Uhr, dazu live Musik. Die Aelpli-Bar ist seit Generationen ein Treffpunkt von Schweizer Volksmusikern, die hier gerne auch ihre STUBETE abhalten. Weil diese Künstler aus der ganzen Schweiz hier auftreten gibt es ab und zu Bedarf sie für die Nacht unterzubringen. Oft blieben diese Kammern aber leer, so habe ich die Gelegenheit am Schopf gepackt und biete sie auf airbnb an. 
Sollte Du den Wunsch hegen persönlich in Kontakt mit Einheimischen zu kommen fühle Dich bitte in der Aelpli-Bar wie zu Hause.

The most Zurich City place possible. Closed to Bahnhofstrasse and Main Station and next to the trend mile "Europa Allee", the offices of Google, where cultivated intellectuals live who sold their villas on the lake/Gold Coast, the most expensive Region of Zurich.

You must go to the lake, do some walking on Bahnhofstrasse , enjoy the cosmopolite athmosphere over here. Some steps away the best restaurants and the hipest bars and clubs.

It is amazing. And everythin in walking distance.
host_about:
tidy - cultivated - organized

We have appartments in Zurich and two hide-aways in Engadin/St.Moritz and on Lake Como in Italy. All locations are furnished in a charming way with art and antiques. We love to share them with others who have same preferencies and a cultivated life style.
As Swiss host, cleanness especially in times of COVID19 is super important to us. So that our guests feel safe and can relax.

Central and yet quiet location, a little green oasis in the heart of Zurich city. Located in an art nouveau building, totally new renovated in 2012.

if you are 3-4 ppl, then the living room turns into a 2nd bedroom with a luxury french sofa-bed with very comfortable real mattress and cosy duvet, it feels like a real bed.

neighborhood_overview:
After a long sightseeing tour, you have the opportunity to immerse yourself in another world and relax on a walk in the nearby forest. There stands as a "sight with history" a large water-spitting elephant in Wehrenbach

Or the Loorenturm, a 30 m high wooden structure, from which you can enjoy a view in clear weather up to the Bernese, Central Swiss and Glarus Alps.

Also, a jogging round, overlooking the lake, along the ridge. The way leads through the old core of the area and you suddenly feel like in the countryside.

A short drive away is the Bad Fohrbach, with swimming pool, indoor pool and a heated outdoor spa pool. Also, various massages are offered.

The Fifa headquarters, the zoo and the Masoala hall are also nearby

To end the day with culinary delights, there is an Indian restaurant nearby, a special steakhouse or a former cowshed for rustic food etc.

host_about:
Home sweet Helvetia - In Zürich zu Hause.
Unser Boutique-Hotel mit seinen 35 charmanten Zimmern und den 2 luxuriösen Business-Apartments im Dachgeschoss ist ein wahres Bijou im Herzen der Stadt. name: Studio Apartment Senior
description:
These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS. If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
Senior Studio Apartments' size: 25m² - 30m².

This modern and spacious studio ensures maximum comfort and a pleasant atmosphere. Its open living area is furnished with a comfortable sitting corner, flat screen TV, dining table and working desk. The kitchen is located in the same room and caters for all the daily needs: a glass ceramic stove, microwave with baking and grill function, coffee maker, cutlery and crockery. The sleeping area tempts with a comfortable double bed and offers sufficient space for relaxation. The separate bathroom with modern glass sliding door features a shower or bathtub, as well as hand towels, a hairdryer and company-branded toiletries.

The apartment
neighborhood_overview:
This flagship apartment house is located in the urban area of the 3rd district of Zurich. The city center and the lake can be reached within a few minutes by public transport. The direct vicinity offers some restaurants, bars, as well as shopping possibilities. The shopping center Shilcity with numerous shops, restaurants and a cinema is just around the corner. Moreover, local recreation areas Sihl and Allmend Brunau are situated nearby.

Visit La Lup at Wolframplatz 1 in Zurich and enjoy some international specialties and delicious Romanian food. Discover our Jar Menus with authentic dishes from East to West.

For all clients of VISIONAPARTMENTS, the restaurant is open as following:

Mon – Thu: 07:30 AM – 11:30 PM
Fri: 07:30 AM – 00:30 AM
Sat: 09:00 AM – 00:30 AM
Sun: 11:00 AM – 11:00 PM

description:
This charming and quiet flat in an old farmer house is located in the trendy Seefeld area, close to the city centre and the lake. It offers all amenities of a modern flat, including access to a romantic garden with lakeview.
Cat lovers only!

The space
The 120 m2 flat is part of an old farmers' house, nicely renovated and with many beautiful architectonic details.

Only cat lovers, please!

My two cats will be around, and need to be fed twice a day. Food etc. will be provided. Apart from that, they are quite independent and easy going.

Die 120 m2 grosse Altbauwohnung befindet sich in einem Winzerhaus des 16. Jahrhunderts und verfügt über viele hübsche architektonische Details und einen alten Kachelofen. Die grosse Wohnküche ist gut ausgestattet und lädt ein zum gemütlichen Kochen.

Meine beiden Katzen müssten während des Aufenthalts zwei mal täglich gefüttert werden. Ans
host_about: “For my part, I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel’s sake. The great affair is to move.” – Robert Louis Stevenson

name: Sofa bed. Quiet, Safe, Clean
description:
Longtime Airbnb host, lots of references! Comfortable sofa bed in private living room. Fast, stable Wifi. Located between airport (15 min) and city center (14 min) direct connection every 9 minutes. Walking distance to Hallenstadion, Oerlikon, Irchel. Host is fully vaccinated againt Covid-19.

The space
You will sleep on a comfortable sofa bed for 2 people (200 x 140 cm) in the private living room of my apartment. In case of 3 or more people I will provide an additional comfortable air mattress (not on the picture) for one or two people. The bed linen is washed and clean. The room has fast and stable wireless internet and enough power plugs. See pictures for more details. Since I have some of my stuff in this room I might need to access it shortly during your stay. Of course I will make sure not to disturb you in any way.

It is not possible to lock the room. Of course the appartment and the house are locked when no one is at home.

The room do
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in a quiet street with low traffic in a residential area that is inhabited by people from middle class. The next shopping place is 500 meters away from the apartment and is open till 8 pm. 2 further shops close by are open till 10 pm. There are several restaurants within the aera of 1 km.
The apartment is very close to the Hallenstadion concert hall and Bahnhof Oerlikon train station (1 km); the Irchel campus of the University of Zurich with its relaxation park and forest is 1.6 km away. Further places within 20 minutes are Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH), Escher Wyss Platz, Langstrasse, city center with old town and main train station.
host_about:
I'm an open minded person who likes to meet new people from all over the world. Having been to more than 40 countries worldwide there is still so much left to see and discover. As an Airbnb host since 2012 I very much like if my Airbnb guests give me an impression of where they are coming from and what their stories are.

With my Airbnb hosting I try to accommodate to my guests needs and wishes but also expect some flexibility from your side since I have a day job and am mostly not at home during the day. But so far we always managed to work something out.

If you make a reservation with me I will give you plenty of ideas about what to do in Zurich before you arrive and am also more than happy to tell you about some hidden spots and local specialties once we meet in person.
Or, if you just want to have a place to sleep, arrive late and leave again early in the morning, that's absolutely fine as well.

Small place of about 30sqm (300 sqf) in total plus a terrace of about 15 sqm (150sqm). My apartment is on the elevated ground floor (just 5 steps) and is facing the back court, not the street. The terrace gets sun from late morning till afternoon.
The house was fully renovated a couple of years ago. New bathroom with spacious shower, new kitchen. I have one room that is a combined living and bed room. Attached to the kichen is a corner space with a dinning table.

description:
This is one of the most popular area of Zurich. People meet here to enjoy their weekends or eating at the hunderts of restaurants around. There is a park next to, where bands play live music in summer time. Clubs, bars, stores are next to. Good for backpackers and single travelers.

Airport: 15 - 20 min by train
Mainstation: 15 min walk or 10 min by pt
Public transport: 1 min walk
Park: 1 min (walk)
Lake: 15 min walk or 10 min by pt
River: 10 min walk or 5 min by pt
Supermarket: 1 min walk

The space
It is a sweet apartment with a garden in the backyard. Nice bedroom, about 15 qm2 with king size bed. You have Wifi in the whoole apt, you can chill in the garden, use the kitchen. Bathroom is shared. TV & DVD and Stereo equipment in the big bedroom.

Guest access
Bedroom, bathroom (shared with me, 2 shrinks), kitchen, living room, backyard
neighborhood_overview: You will live in the city center where all the cultures come together. There are plenty of clubs, bars, restaurants, 24 hours shops right next to you. Young people love this area and the food is very diverse. You will have lots of restaurants and shops right next to the apartment but also the river or the lake are going to be at a walking distance to the flat.
host_about: I am an openminded person, working and studying as a sound engineer. In my spare time, i like to meet people and go for a beer, driving bike or go for a swim in the lake or river. I am also a dj & producer and spend lot of time doing music. If you are uncomplicated and like the nightlife, nature and activities you are at the right place and i can give you all the good recommendations about the city and the "secret locations". Especially during summer there are lots of small music festivals, which you would not find without any help. Looking forward to meet you :)

name: Studio Apartment Mini
description:
These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS. If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
Mini Studio Apartments' size: 17m² - 20m².

This modern studio with a sophisticated design satisfies all the needs. Its living area is furnished with a sitting corner, a table and a flat screen TV. The open and fully fitted kitchenette features a glass ceramic stove, microwave with baking and grilling options, coffee maker, as well as cutlery and crockery. The sleeping area boasts a comfortable double bed and a wardrobe. The separate bathroom with a modern glass sliding door offers a shower or bathtub, as well as hand towels, a hairdryer and company-branded toiletries.

The apartment is available in two different design versions: either classic elegance, in beige and brown tone
neighborhood_overview:
This flagship apartment house is located in the urban area of the 3rd district of Zurich. The city center and the lake can be reached within a few minutes by public transport. The direct vicinity offers some restaurants, bars, as well as shopping possibilities. The shopping center Shilcity with numerous shops, restaurants and a cinema is just around the corner. Moreover, local recreation areas Sihl and Allmend Brunau are situated nearby.

Visit La Lup at Wolframplatz 1 in Zurich and enjoy some international specialties and delicious Romanian food. Discover our Jar Menus with authentic dishes from East to West.

For all clients of VISIONAPARTMENTS, the restaurant is open as following:

Mon – Thu: 07:30 AM – 11:30 PM
Fri: 07:30 AM – 00:30 AM
Sat: 09:00 AM – 00:30 AM
Sun: 11:00 AM – 11:00 PM
host_about: VISIONAPARTMENTS specializes in renting out stylish and furnished serviced apartments all around the world. Established in Switzerland in 1999, the company quickly grew from a start-up to Switzerland’s market leader with a global presence. Today, VISIONAPARTMENTS offers tailored temporary living solutions in over 850 business locations worldwide.

description:

The space
This is a private room in an old Villa on Toblerplatz. The room has a fridge freezer, Nespresso coffee machine with coffee caps. All cooking utensils are provided and clean bedding and towels as requested. The room, house and its gardens has free wifi.

Guest access
As a guest you have access to the shared kitchen and shower as well as the garden with its seating and Bar-B-Q making facilities. There are magazines and newspapers at the reception at the main entrance with seating are.

Other things to note
All rooms are non-smoking but there is a smoking area balcony on the first floor.

No pets are allowed in the rooms or the apartments.

name: Quiet Room in Penthouse Kreis 7
description:
Cozy and sunny single bedroom in a 3-bedroom apartment with a shared kitchen, bathroom with a bathtub/shower incl. toilet and one separate guest toilet, as well as a shared living/dining room and a spacious balcony.

The apartment is situated in a quiet area where you might find a lot of nature and all of the necessary stores just minutes away.

At the same time there is a bus stop down the road that takes you straight to the city centre within 15 mins and train station within 20 mins.

The space
The apartment is shared with a maximum 2-3 other people that are usually swiss or very international. All residents are mostly professionals between 20-50 y/o, tolerant and respectful - which is what we look out for.

The space has a fully equipped kitchen, a large bathroom with a bath tub/shower, toilet and two sinks, and a small bathroom with a sink and a toilet. There is a big living/dining room, where you can sit together and enjoy a me
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a very quiet neighbourhood. It is beautiful with nature but not far away from the city centre. Ideal to calm down after a stressful day. It is on the Zurichberg which is the mountain or hill that it is on and if you take a little walk around the area you might get a view over the Zurich Lake.

Hungarian/Swiss

I am a mother of three girls, a wife and passionate host. I am in love with the idea of travelling the world. It is the most beautiful way to broaden minds. Excited and always open to meet new people from all over the world.

description:
I am French and live already a long time in Zurich. My grandmother got a pension-restaurant in France. It is the reason why I like to welcome people in my home.
I have 2 rooms with a friendly atmosphere in a quiet green and sunny area. From Zurich central railway station you take the bus 46 until terminal stop Rütihof. (20 minutes) I live 3 min. from busstation.
Many walking possibilities, river at 15 minutes walking distance, public bath also.

The space
The flat is very cosy and you can cook in the kitchen and use the living room. It's relaxed.

Guest access

Other things to note

host_about:
