name: Bed. Private, Clean, Safe, Quiet
description:
Longtime Airbnb host, lots of references! Comfortable bed in private room. Fast, stable Wifi. Located between airport (15 min) and city center (14 min) direct connection every 9 minutes. Walking distance to Hallenstadion, Oerlikon, Irchel. Host fully vaccinated against Covid-19.

The space
You will sleep on a comfortable bed for two people (200 x 140 cm) in a private room of my apartment. The bed linen is washed and clean. The room has fast and stable wireless internet as well as enough power plugs.

It is not possible to lock the room. Of course the appartment and the house are locked when no one is at home.

The room does not confirm to Swiss Covid-19 quarantine regulations.

Other than this bedroom, the kitchen and the bathroom there are two additional rooms: one is my bedroom, the other one is the living room.
The living room is also on Airbnb. It is therefore possible that there will be other Airbnb guests in other rooms dur
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in a quiet street with low traffic in a residential area that is inhabited by people from middle class. The next shopping place is 500 meters away from the apartment and is open till 8 pm. 2 further shops close by are open till 10 pm. There are several restaurants within the aera of 1 km.
The apartment is very close to the Hallenstadion concert hall and Bahnhof Oerlikon train station (1 km); the Irchel campus of the University of Zurich with its relaxation park and forest is 1.6 km away. Further places within 20 minutes are Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH), Escher Wyss Platz, Langstrasse, city center with old town and main train station.
host_about:
I'm an open minded person who likes to meet new people from all over the world. Having been to more than 40 countries worldwide there is still so much left to see and discover. As an Airbnb host since 2012 I very much like if my Airbnb guests give me an impression of where they are coming from and what their stories are.

With my Airbnb hosting I try to accommodate to my guests needs and wishes but also expect some flexibility from your side since I have a day job and am mostly not at home during the day. But so far we always managed to work something out.

If you make a reservation with me I will give you plenty of ideas about what to do in Zurich before you arrive and am also more than happy to tell you about some hidden spots and local specialties once we meet in person.
Or, if you just want to have a place to sleep, arrive late and leave again early in the morning, that's absolutely fine as well.

The space
You'll be staying in my private 2.5 rooms (66m2) apartment while I'm traveling. It is not a commercial apartment but a unique & personal space that I expect you to treat like your own home.

Get comfortable on the large couch or the danish design armchair and read a book, watch a movie via chromecast on the 55'' TV or play some videogames on the PS4. For a third guest or if you don't want to share a bed, I can provide bed sheets, cover & cushion f
neighborhood_overview:
Zurich-West – From Industrial Quarter to Trendy District

The district in the west of Zurich is full of contrasts, boasting an unpolished charm.

Where ships were once built and engines bolted together, art, design, food, culture shopping and architecture are now the center of attention. Factories have moved away, leaving their vast expanses of space that creative minds have taken advantage of.

Beneath the railway arches, design boutiques and market halls have moved in at what's know as "Im Viadukt" – and on the Gerolds-Areal you find Frau Gerolds Garten (Mrs. Gerold's Garden), a city garden and catering establishment. Besides the Freitag Flagship Store, diverse second hand furniture stores are also on the spot. On the other side of the Hardbrücke (bridge) the 126m Prime Tower reigns – boasting number-one place as Switzerland's highest building until the opening of the Roche Towers in Basel.

The main station in Zurich can be reached in about 12 minutes by tram or bus. There are Supermarkets in the direct vicinity. The “Denner” and “Coop” supermarkets are only 100m away.

neighborhood_overview: The charming and modern business apartment boasts an excellent location in Zurich. name: Le Bijou MH6 Jacuzzi Penthouse Apartment
description:
Located next to Fraumünster with direct access to Paradenplatz / Bahnhofstrasse: This offering is the epitome of exclusivity. Brand new interiors, double fridges, a big terrace and a view overlooking Zurich's #1 landmarks. You can't get it better.

The space
Our apartments are designed and built around our guests. Space, privacy, service and design are our hallmarks - whether a guest is staying in our smallest apartment or our largest.

Sleek interiors are designed and built with classic Swiss attention to detail across the Le Bijou collection.

Each apartment features beautifully appointed bedroom, living, dining, kitchen and bathroom spaces equipped with the latest modern conveniences and designed in our beautifully sleek contemporary style.

High-specification contemporary design is paired with the bespoke Le Bijou technology to provide seamless service from reservation to check-out.

Guest access
Everythin
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the heart of Zurich at the famous Münsterhof next to the Fraumünster Church and Paradeplatz, Le Bijou presents a swiss masterpiece in hospitality: The MH6 Penthouse Apartment.

MH6 is Zurich's most exclusive overnight accommodation with over 180 m2 in size, space for up to 8 people and spectecular view over the city's landmarks.

The penthouse apartment features an in-room sauna, private jacuzzi, a fully equipped kitchen and bar combined with services on demand. MH6 is discreetly hidden in one of Zurichs oldest buildings. The perfect combination of tradition and modern hospitality.

The space

Very close to everything you need (public transport, tons of restaurants, museums, famous art galleries, shops, night life, etc.).

host_about:
Ich bin eine junge Frau, wohne jetzt in Zürich und bin viel und weit gereist. Zweimal war ich während einem Jahr auf Weltreise. Das erste Mal bin ich durch Asien nach Australien, Neuseeland und Kanada gereist, das letzte Mal von Guatemala bis nach Ushuaia, weiter auf die Osterinsel und Tahiti. 
Ich mag es sehr fremde Menschen und Kulturen kennen zu lernen und mich mit ihnen auszutauschen. 

I am a young woman, living in Zurich and I am well travelled. Twice I travelled around the world for a year by myself and I have seen and met lots of interesting places and people. On one trip I went trough Asia, OZ, NZ, parts of the American West Coast and all the way from Vancouver to Toronto. My last big trip led overland from Guatemala to Ushuaia, Easter Island and Tahiti.  
I love to meet and chat to new people from all around the world.

name: Milchbar das Gaumenfreudenhaus
description:
Der Luxusdampfer unter den Hotelzimmern. The Zimmer. Die Quintessenz aller Luxushotels. Eines wie keines. The one and only.

The space
Der Künstler Max Zuber hat das Zimmer gestaltet. Entstanden ist ein Kunstwerk, in das man eintauchen und das man nicht mehr verlassen will. Wegen Max Zubers Zauberei, aber auch wegen der unvergleichlichen Ausstattung. Duvets aus sündhaft teuren Eiderdaunen legen sich sanft um den Gast und lullen ihn schwerelos in wohlige Träumereien ein. Am besten gleich jetzt ein Datum auswählen, mitbieten und hinbetten. Zum ersten, zum zweiten und ganz sicher nicht zum letzten Mal.

Other things to note
Unsere Gaumenfreuden

Ähnlich, wie das Kuratoren in Museen tun, stellen auch wir unsere Genussobjekte sorgfältig zusammen. Wir suchen jeweils sehr lange, bis wir einzigartige Spezialitäten finden, die unseren Ansprüchen genügen. So gelangen wir lustvoll an all die feinen Dinge, die uns so sehr Freude machen, dass wi

name: Nice 3.5 room Strawberry Apartment
description:
The “Zürich Oerlikon Strawberry-Apartment” is a beautiful and newly furnished 3.5-room apartment (60m2) in Zurich. Its highlight are the two balconies on two opposing sides.

The space
It offers two bedrooms with a queen size bed and a living room with an extra sofa bed. There is also a seating area with a dining table and a fully equipped kitchen. And of course the apartment is equipped with a bathroom including a shower. The washing facilities are located in the basement and included in the price. There is free WiFi access in the business apartment and also a flat screen television is available. The “Zürich Oerlikon Strawberry Apartment” is close to the centre, fully equipped and has an excellent price-performance ratio. This modern apartment leaves nothing left to be desired.
neighborhood_overview: The business apartment is located close to the Zürich Oerlikon station (10 minute walk), the Hallenstadion and Messe Zürich (5 minute walk). It is also near to the city centre of Zurich and is directly accessible by public transportation. Additionally the flat can be reached from the airport within 20 minutes. All the tourist attractions such as the Grossmünster, the Fraumünster, the old part "Niederdorf" or the lake of Zurich can be reached from the holiday apartment within 20 minutes. The main railway station is directly reachable by train in about 10 minutes. The accomodation can also be reached by car but there are no parking spaces provided. However there are some payable parking possibilities next door. Shopping possibilities are in the immediate vicinity and the major shopping streets such as the "Bahnhofstrasse" can be reached from the holiday flat in 20 minutes by train.

name: Zurich old town, exclusive
description:
Beautiful private room in the middle of the most exclusive living area in old town Zurich, only a few steps away from all major attractions and lake.

This exceptional private home was built in 1430 and has been home to some of Zurich's most famous residents.

Deluxe breakfast buffet included.

Newly, lovingly renovated.

Special part of Swiss history. Lake view, marvelous garden, fountain plunge pool. Use of conference room/office, garden and breakfast stube. Very quite, no cars.

The space
The breakfast room has original wooden panels dating back to the 15th century with a view to the lake and gardens in the back.

Guest access
Private room with ensuite bath, Conference room with refrigerator and separate bath, private fully equipped office with internet and large windows. Access to breakfast room. Use of three two, modern and first class renovated bathrooms.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview: Oberdorf is the most attractive neighborhood in the old city of Zurich. It is two blocks from the Cathedrale Gross Muenster, Bahnhofstrasse and Paradeplatz yet a cosy, quite neighborhood with young and old. Art museums, spas, sport centers, all within minutes. The hidden gardens of Zurich in our back yard are private and quite. Pedestrian zone with no cars or traffic noise.
host_about:
I am an American entrepreneur living in Europe now for 29 years. I love sports, nature, technology, our garden and most of all my love Hanspeter. 

We are very fortunate to live in this special place and it gives us pleasure to share it with our guests. 

I play the flute, make my own tinctures, and grappa from the grapes in our garden. 

We love to eat, play chess & enjoy the arts. 

I am passionate about the environment and founded and run (Website hidden by Airbnb) the largest knowledge sharing platform and business exchange for the global water sector. We have 5 companies between us and are active in security, digital asset management , knowledge management and cryptocurrencies.

Built in 2014, 56m2 apartment with 11m2 balcony, situated in a quiet cul-de-sac and equipped with wooden floors, floor heating, large windows and spacious balcony (west facing, so afternoon sun!).

Decorated to the highest standard with queensize boxspring, wifi included, chromecast for the Philips tv, balcony lounge set etc. etc.

The space
Washing machines are shared with 1 other lady, no schedule in place. So free to use whenever you want, you can do two washes in 1 go which saves quite a bit of time ;). FYI, shared washing machine facilities are common in CH.

In line with the letting agencies requirements a sublet agreement will have to be signed. However, to ensure a secure payment this will take place via Airbnb.

neighborhood_overview:
Situated near Glattzentrum, one of the largest shopping centers in CH. Short commute to downtown Zurich by train/tram or bus, to stroll down Bahnhofstrasse, yet quietly situated (no buses or trams in the street). As the apartment is near the airport you may hear a plane every now and then, however not when the windows are closed (Swiss isolation standards as well as internal centralised ventilation system).

Nearest skiing areas are reached within 1.5h by train or car.

name: Nice 2.5 room Raspberry Apartment
description:
The Zürich Oerlikon Raspberry-Apartment is a beautiful and newly furnished 2.5-room apartment (41m2) in Zurich. It offers one bedroom with a queen size bed and a living room with an extra sofa bed.

The space
There is also a seating area with a dining table and a fully equipped kitchen. And of course the apartment is equipped with a bathroom with a shower. The washing facilities are located in the basement and included in the price. There is free WiFi access in the business apartment and also a flat screen television is available. The Zürich Oerlikon Rasberry -Apartment is close to the centre, fully equipped and has an excellent price-performance ratio. This modern apartment leaves nothing left to be desired.
neighborhood_overview: The business apartment is located close to the Zürich Oerlikon station (10 minute walk), the Hallenstadion and Messe Zürich (5 minute walk). It is also near to the city centre of Zurich and is directly accessible by public transportation. Additionally the flat can be reached from the airport within 20 minutes. All the tourist attractions such as the Grossmünster, the Fraumünster, the old part "Niederdorf" or the lake of Zurich can be reached from the holiday apartment within 20 minutes. The main railway station is directly reachable by train in about 10 minutes. The accomodation can also be reached by car but there are no parking spaces provided. However there are some payable parking possibilities next door. Shopping possibilities are in the immediate vicinity and the major shopping streets such as the "Bahnhofstrasse" can be reached from the holiday flat in 20 minutes by train.

name: Charming room next to Langstrasse
description:
The apartment is on the top (4th floor/NO ELEVATOR) of the oldest cinema in Zurich City (1927) located in the heart of Zurich, the best location to enjoy a unique stay in the fun city center and surrounded by bars, cinemas, shops and restaurants.

The space
This cosy room is part of a charming 3-room, recently renovated apartment, decorated in vintage style and parquet you can find in all living and sleeping rooms. I offer free WiFi, a washmashine, a full furnished kitchen with an automatic Coffee mashine by Nespresso (what else :-)).
Your pretty big room is equipped with a double bed (queensize), dinning table with chairs, a wardrobe and a commode.
The house - only 15 min. away from the central station - is very good located, sourrounded with nice bars and restaurants. There is a nice park (Bäckeranlage) in 5 min. walking distance. The beautiful lake is also close and reachable by tram only within 15 minutes.

Guest access
Kitchen
neighborhood_overview: Wiedikon in Zurich is the city's largest gentrifying area. There are dozens of modern (hipster style) bars within a few minute walk, also cafes and restaurants. The Park Bäckeranlage is just 5 minute walk from the front door, as well as other smaller parks. In just 5 - 10 minutes walk you will find yourselves in the middle of Zurich's most popular nighlife area (Kreis 4 & 5), where you can discover all the famous nightclubs and alternative lifestyle bars, which all go hand in hand.
host_about:
Hi,
I'm a 30 years old, actually young woman originally from Eastern Europe (Bosnia), but born and grew up in Switzerland. I'm open minded and treat everybody with respect (doesn't matter from where someone is coming). I love to meet new people, that's why I also try to improve my english (thanks Air BNB for giving opportunity for even a double win :-) ).
I work as a movie operator at a cinema and in a restaurant as a waitress. I love documentary movies, music from the whole world. I like playing football and love to play music (don't worry, I take consideration whenever having guests :-) ).
My social network is quite big, I can give you many recomandations about restaurants, bars, cultural events and much more. I'm very friendly and taking care of my guests. My absolutely main priority is, that everyone feels like home during the stay in my home.

Cheers :-)

description:
Cool (small) Appartement (Studio) at perfect location. Lake arround the corner. Old town in 7 min walking distance and the center is reachable in 10 min by tram!
It features a nice living area, a small kitchen with dining space and a nice little bathroom.

The space
Notice, bed is an elevated bed. I sleep there evey night, but at first you might need to get used to that. If you do not like it, there is a fold out couch, a fold-out chair, or a double sized airbed, if you prefere to sleep knowing some solid floor under the matress.

Guest access
The flat is all yours.
neighborhood_overview:
Seefeld, the part of Zurich at the shore of the lake, close to Bellevue, the major city square is an posh part of town. Obviously the best thing here is the lake shore with recreation areas, sunbathing space, swimming opportunities and public electric barbeques. You will reach the shore with the main promenade in just 3 minutes walking.
The oldtown is accessible from Bellevue, for an evening stroll to explore some quite unique (and uniquely expensive) shops in the side streets of the cozy old town.
There is plenty of drinking and eating opportunities just outside of the door in all directions.
One of the cities' clubs is located at bellevue, featuring dancing though the whole night with view to the bellevue square and the Lake.
The botanical garden (free) is some 10minutes walking from here.

description:
Built in 1928, the 5-bedroom house with garden and pool is a perfect location for a family. Modern furniture and design classics create a welcoming and bright atmosphere for a stay in and around the house. The place is close to the city center and yet in a very quiet location.

The space
At the ground floor of the house, you will find a large living and dining room with an open kitchen. On the first floor, there are 3 (kids-)bedrooms and a bath room with bathtub. On the second floor, there is another large (parents-)bedroom, an «office» and a bath room with shower. In the attic, you will find another bedroom. At the basement, there is the washing machine, a playroom fort he kids and direct access to the garage, that you can use during your stay.

There is our cat «Malou», that will wander around the garden and is looking forward meeting people from all over the world. She is living in the basement, not in the living area of the house.

name: Ein Platz an der Sonne
description:
Absolute Top Lage in Zürich. The Top ist eine extrem sonnige Maisonette Wohnung von ca. 180m2. Die drei grossen Schlafzimmer (alle mit Box-Spring Betten) bieten bequem Platz für 6 Reisende. 1 Zimmer mit Etagenbett (80cm breit) und kl. Balkon. Mit 3 Badezimmern (2 mit Dusche/WC, 1 x Badewanne/WC) fehlt es den Gästen an nichts. Das Obergeschoss besteht aus dem Wohn/Essbereich, Bad plus einer Terrasse. Sehr grosse Küche mit allem Komfort! 2 TV's, WLAN, WM und Tumbler. 1 PP ist im Preis inbegriffen.

The space
Top Lage. Zürichsee, Bahnhofstrasse, Schiffsstation, Oper und Bahnhof und Tramstation in unmittelbarer Nähe. Direkter Zugang zum Apartment mit dem Fahrstuhl. Obergeschoss mit Cheminée, Sofagruppe für 6 Personen, Küche mit Frühstücksbar (4 Barstühle) und einem grossen Esstisch für 8 Personen. Die angrenzende Terrasse mit Barbecue lädt zum verweilen im Freien ein. Das Bad (Dusche/WC) befindet sich gleich neben der Küche.
Die Küche ist Top ausgestattet.

In Zurich (Kreis 5), the area with the highest quality of urban life, in walking distance to the train station, the Landesmuseum, Old Town and the famous shopping street.

This apartment is on the 4TH FLOOR of the house (NO ELEVATOR!).

The space

Further along the famous shopping street Bahnhofstrasse, with all exclusive shops, you get to the lake of Zurich with a stunning view of the alps.
Following the street, where the apartment is located, to the Langstrasse, (about 5min on foot) you'll find yourself in the popular Zurich's nightlife scene.

Your room is spacious and nicely decorated with own access to our terrace. Excellent public transportation around us. You are under 5min to City Center and the nightlife area "Langstrasse" is 10min bus ride away. You can also go for a hike up to "Uetliberg" nearby and enjoy the wonderful view over Lake Zurich.

Your private room is modern, bright with lots sun light and spacious. The flat itself is approx. 150m2 with our own private roof terrace (approx. 150m2). The space
Elegant apartment in very central location. The beautiful and modernly furnished apartment is equipped with flat screen tv, hi-fi system and free wireless access. Our cleaning service with two week housekeeping and linen change (towels and sheets) is included in the rental price for all apartments, including waste disposal and final cleaning.

All our apartments offer free business WiFi connectivity with 24-hour Internet access.

Other things to note
Garbage Disposal in the city of Zurich

In the city of Zurich it is required to purchase official bin bags to dispose of your household trash. In Zurich they are known as "Züri-Sacks" and can be purchased in all supermarkets (they are usually not out on the shelves so make sure to ask at the cashier's desk). These bags are NOT for recyclables.

neighborhood_overview: The charming and modern business apartment boasts an excellent location in Zurich. name: Large and bright apartment - Quiet but central
description:
We offer our apartment in a lovely, quiet and very convenient location. Direct tram connection to airport and main train station. Walking distance to ETH/University, historic center, lake, shopping. 2 bright rooms, 1.5 bathrooms, large kitchen and living room, balcony with view over Uetliberg and sunsets. You'll love it!

The space
We rent our full apartment when we are out of town. It includes 2 bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other one with a comfortable single/double pull-out bed. For groups of 5 people, we offer the option of an inflatable mattress or sleeping on the large couch in the living room. If you are traveling with a baby, we also have a baby room with a crib and a changing table.
The apartment is very bright, with a West-facing balcony to enjoy views of the city, Uetliberg mountain, and beautiful sunsets. There is a main bathroom with shower/bathtub and a smaller bathroom with a second toilet. The kitchen is large and fully equipped.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a residential area, very nice, safe and quiet, on the Zurichberg hill. There are several supermarkets just minutes away, as well as smaller stores and boutiques.
host_about:
We're a young Italian couple from Bergamo, currently living in Zurich. Pietro is an assistant professor in economics at the University of Zurich, and Cecilia works as a data analyst for an energy efficiency organization. We lived in Chicago for 6 years before moving to Zurich in September 2015. 

We love: the outdoors, cooking, cats (Cecilia) & dogs (Pietro), coffee (Cecilia) & chocolate (Pietro). We're laid back hosts and guests. We're happy to hang out when there is a chance, but we won't intrude.

Free WiFi

All our apartments offer free business WiFi connectivity with 24-hour Internet access.

Other things to note
Garbage Disposal in the city of Zurich

In the city of Zurich it is required to purchase official bin bags to dispose of your household trash. In Zurich they are known as "Züri-Sacks" and can be purchased in all supermarkets (they are usually not out on the shelves so make sure to ask at the cashier's desk). These bags are NOT for recyclables. Compost, PET bottles, glass, carton, paper, aluminium cans, batteries and other toxic waste are disposed

name: Super central, super nice :)
description:
This quiet & spirited flat is located in the heart of Zurich’s trendy neighborhood, Wipkingen. The place perfect for couples, single travelers, business people and small families as it offers a spacious living area at an affordable price :)

The space
My little flat is located super close (150m) to Wipkingen Bahnhof, where you find not only different transportation means but also bars, restaurants and shopping options.

It's in the fourth floor with a pretty bird's view over the street and the backyard.
The flat is furnished quite simply and I personally like to have some space to breathe and do yoga :) You can use the yoga equipment (blocks & mat) if you want. The space is extremely quiet and relaxing to live here.

There are only two peculiarities to the flat, both of which you can see in the images.
1) The bathroom sink is located outside of the bathroom in the flat's hallway
2) The bed lays on close to the ground but fea
neighborhood_overview:
There are so many different supermarkets, places to eat and shop just 150m away! Although I highly recommend exploring the area with a "fresh" pair of eyes, here are the things I'd vouch for:

Bar "Nordbrücke" – Open almost all days, great selection of drinks, spinning sessions by local DJs on weekends (can get crowded by then).

"The Artisan" – awesome craft beer/dinner place with very good fresh produce and great "bière blonde" as well as more freaky nuances of beer.

"Ultimo Bacio"– organic supermarket with everything your organic heart craves for. Very extensive selection of fine chocolates (in case you want to bring some home) and great bread.

Apart from that, you'll find an ice cream shop, an Italian restaurant, supermarkets, a bakery, and just about everything you need around these places in no less than 200m distance from the flat.
host_about:
I am a social globe explorer with a lot of interests! I'm working to make the world a nicer place to live. 

When I'm not in my current base, Zurich, I travel  and learn as much as possible to shape the place we call earth. Our time here is limited so why don't we just do cool, helpful stuff? 
 
The one thing I couldn't live without is
to look at my life shortly before death and realize that I did not try to pursue changing the world for the better.
Sounds stupid but I just want to spend my time intensively. 



Have a nice day!

Die Umgebung ist ruhig. Meine Nachbarn sind auch ruhig. Vom Balkon, der Küche und der Fensterseite hat man einen Blick ins Grüne in einem Wohnquartier. Man sieht von der Wohnung aus keine Strasse oder Eisenbahnlinie. Daher gibt es weder Lärm durch Autos noch durch Züge.

I would like to invite you to explore Zurich and Switzerland and I hope that you also like it.

name: Rhododendron Row—most desirable and best-appointed
description:
Set just back from the road, the 4-storey apartment block is regularly sun-soaked. Often overlooked as the gateway to the yummy-mummy-filled Zürich suburbs, Hirslanden is in fact a lively and exciting neighborhood with a lot to offer its residents, including an enviable art scene, delicious food and day-long sunshine.

In the main rooms, generous ceiling heights, full-length casement windows, substantial doors and parquet floors create a feeling of architectural grace.
host_about:
I'm an adventurous Irish fella who really likes exploring and seeing a different side of cities than I would find in a guidebook. It's pretty hard to find something I won't like doing, so whether that's grabbing a glass of wine or coffee with some people I just met, taking in a new museum or gallery or attending some immersive performance, I'll be up for pretty much anything you throw at me.

It'd be great to meet some locals in the cities I'm travelling to to get more of a feel of the real side of the place. Any insider tips, hints or knowledge are greatly appreciated to help me up my stay.

I'm clean and respectful of other people's space and belongings and would like to think my mother would be proud of the sort of houseguest I am :) Just give me a shout if you want to know anything more.

Free WiFi

All our apartments offer free business WiFi connectivity with 24-hour Internet access.

Other things to note
Garbage Disposal in the city of Zurich

In the city of Zurich it is required to purchase official bin bags to dispose of your household trash. In Zurich they are known as "Züri-Sacks" and can be purchased in all supermarkets (they are usually not out on the shelves so make sure to ask at the cashier's desk). These bags are NOT for recyclables. Compost, PET bottles, glass, carton, paper, aluminium cans, batteries and other toxic waste are di

host_about:
Ich bin Silvia, eine Schweizerin, seit über 30 Jahren in Zürich wohnhaft, in der Lebensmitte, und ein Cosmopolitan. Mein Lebensmotto ist "Balanced every day". Ein ausgeglichener Tag ist ein guter Tag. Und Zeit, freie Zeit, das kostbarste Gut.
Ruhig, gelassen und mit bewusster Achtsamkeit gehe ich durchs Leben oder versuche es täglich.  Fotografie, Yoga, Essen, Reisen, Kunst, Lesen, Filme/Kino, Musik sowieso, und vieles mehr, sind die Dinge und schönen Momente, die mein Leben bereichern. Ich bin Nichtraucherin seit über 15 Jahren und geniesse ein sauberes, gemütliches und gut riechendes zu Hause und every day the view, the sunrise and the sunset.

name: Vintage roof-apartment with two bedrooms and AC
description:
In a quiet residential area in the north of Zurich, we offer a beautiful, bright roof apartment with bathroom, kitchen, living / dining area and two bedrooms. The outside area with pergola and barbecue is open for sharing.

Oerlikon railway station is less than a ten-minute walk from the apartment and the exhibition hall and the "Hallenstadion" are a 15-minute walk away. Airport and city center can be reached comfortably within minutes by public transportation.

The space
The apartment is newly renovated and furnished with love. There is no washing machine. The host offers a laundry service if necessary.

Guest access
We live on the lower two levels of the house. You share the entry with us, but you have your own lockable door to the apartment.
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is located on a very quiet street with little one-way traffic. The Oerlikon train station is within an eight-minute walk and one of the most frequented in Switzerland with excellent connections in all directions.
The "Hallenstadion" with its big concerts and sporting events as well as the neighboring exhibition halls can be reached by bus in five minutes or on foot in fifteen minutes.
In the center of Oerlikons you will find numerous restaurants and shopping.
On the Wednesday and Saturday morning fresh products from the surrounding area can be found on the weekly market.

description:

Cleaning

Our cleaning service with two week housekeeping and linen change (towels and sheets) is included in the rental price for all apartments, including waste disposal and final cleaning.

Free WiFi

All our apartments offer free business WiFi connectivity with 24-hour Internet access.

Other things to note
Garbage Disposal in the city of Zurich

In the city of Zurich it is required to purchase official bin bags to dispose of your household trash. In Zurich they are known as "Züri-Sacks" and can be purchased in all supermarkets (they are usually not out on the shelves so make sure to ask at the cashier's desk). These bags are NOT for recyclables. Compost, PET bottles, glass, carton, paper, aluminium cans, batteries and other toxic waste are disposed

name: New Rooftop-Apartment, central and quiet
description:
Newly built (2017), bright and carefully furnished mansard apartment. With a spacious private rooftop terrace and great view of the city. The apartment is on the 4th floor of an Art Nouveau building. No elevator. It is ideal for 1 person, also for longer stays. Unfortunately, it is not suitable for children under ten. There are grocery stores, bakeries, a post office, restaurants and an ATM close to the apartment.

The space
The apartment is located at the foot of the Zürichberg, near the University and the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (ETH). It’s a 7 minutes drive by tram to the main train station, to the lake and to the old town. From/to the airport it takes you about 25 minutes by a direct tram (Line Nr. 10). The nearest tram stop is only 5 minutes away by foot. The apartment has a kitchenette (coffee machine, electric kettle, fridge and two induction hobs), but not a fully equipped kitchen.

The bed is 140 cm wide and has a high-end mattress
host_about:
Ich bin Germanistin und Kunsthistorikerin, habe in Zürich und Berlin studiert, und reise selber sehr gerne. Viele Reisen führten mich in die verschiedensten Ländern von Afrika, aber auch Amerikas und Asiens. Regelmässig sind wir auch in europäischen Städten und Ländern unterwegs, vor allem in Paris, wo ich am liebsten eine zweite Wohnung hätte... 
Ich kenne die Bedürfnisse von Reisenden und bin, falls gewünscht, gerne bereit, Tipps und Infos zu Zürich zu geben.

name: Hell, ruhig, zentral - Wohnung mit Südbalkon
description:
Während meiner Abwesenheit vermiete ein grosses Schlafzimmer und ein Wohn-/Arbeitszimmer mit direktem Ausgang zum Südbalkon, sowie die Wohnküche und das Bad. Die Wohnung ist einfach aber sehr gemütlich, mit grossem Südbalkon, 10-15 Minuten zum Hauptbahnhof. Parks, Kunst und Kultur ganz in der Nähe. Das Bett besteht aus zwei Tatamis mit einem neuen weichen Futon. Die Lage ist ruhig und doch zentral, die Umgebung grün. Ich vermiete nur an eine Person, gerne auch für länger bis Frühling 2022.

The space
Helles, grosses Schlafzimmer und ein Wohn-/Arbeitszimmer, beide mit Ausgang zum Südbalkon. Auf Wunsch ist im Schlafzimmer ein Tisch oder viel Platz für Yoga.
Achtung! Kein WLAN, da ich nur mobilen Hotspot verwende. Kann bei einem längeren Aufenthalt selber beantragt und installiert werden. Vermiete gerne auch länger bis Frühling, wer bereit ist, zeitweise zu teilen. KEIN HOMEOFFICE.

Guest access
Wohnzimmer, Schlafzimmer, Küche, Bad, Was
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung liegt in einer Sackgasse und ist daher sehr ruhig. Da es schöne Bäume in der Umgebung gibt, zwitschern auch viele Vögel.

name: 9 Min. von City/HB, kl. Zimmer in romant. Haus.
description:
Schönes Zimmer unter dem Dach, mit wunderbarer Aussicht auf Zürich in einem alten romantischen Hause für unkomplizierte Gäste. Eine grosse Küche für Dich mit Esstisch und Aussicht auf die Stadt! Sehr praktisch gelegen, es befindet sich 1 Minute von der Bahnstation, 9 Minuten bis zum Hauptbahnhof und 15 Minuten hinauf zum Uetliberg, dem schönsten Aussichtsplatz von Zürich. 5 Min. bis zum Tram 14, Bus 33 und 80.

The space
Wohnraum

Vor unserem Haus liegt die Stadt zu unseren Füssen und hinter dem Haus befindet sich eine Wiese, gleich anschliessend der Wald. Wichtig: Die Räumlichkeiten sind sehr einfach im alten Baustiel belassen. Du musst alte, einfache Häuser lieben, darum der günstige Preis!!! Unterhalb Deines Zimmers befindet sich die hübsche Küche auch ganz einfach eingerichtet, Herd mit Ofen, Kühlschrank, Kaffeemaschine und Teekocher sowie Geschirr (Mikrowelle vorhanden) mit wunderbarer Aussicht auf die Stadt. Der Badebereich ist gross und befind

host_about: Ich bin spontan, geduldig und unkompliziert sowie hilfsbereit und freue mich immer neue Leute kennen zu lernen.

name: Precious apartment by the lake in central Zurich
description:
Central apartment in the exclusive Zurich Seefeld area, just minutes away from the beautiful Zurichhorn park and the lake.

The flat has one double (160cm) bed and a sofa that can easily be made into another 140cm bed. There is a big wardrobe area, plenty of storage space and large windows facing the street. The kitchen now has fold-out dining table for up to three people (not shown on the pictures).

If you have any individual requests I'll do my best to accommodate.

Any questions just ask!

Guest access
The entire apartment is available for the guest(s). There are laundry facilities in the building free of charge. The building also has a bicycle storage room.
neighborhood_overview: Seefeld is one of the most beautiful and "posh" areas in central Zurich with lots of restaurants & bars, yet it is still very safe and tranquil, with the best access to the lake where you can swim and enjoy the adjacent park. There are plenty of supermarkets nearby.

There is one private bedroom with a private toilet, and one living room, an open kitchen with a dining room and a bathroom to share. name: Above the roofs and in the middle of everything!
description:
My cosy little attic apartment sits right above the roofs of Zurich – with a view of the Üetliberg! – and yet right in the middle of everything. The hotspot of Zurich nightlife (Langstrasse) with many bars, restaurants, clubs and cinemas is literally around the corner. There are two bus stops in front of the building, the main train station as well as the historic center are within walking distance. There’s hardly a better location to experience the different aspects of this little big city!

The space
As I live and work here, I set up my rooms for multifunctional use: the large bed serves as a sofa as well, the dining room is also a study.

Guest access
The apartment is fully equipped with washing machine, dish washer, big flatscreen television, sound system, Wifi, Netflix, E-Piano, many DVDs and even more books in German, English, French and Italian – yet there is no elevator!

Bei dieser Wohnung handelt es sich um eine sehr gepflegte 1.5 Zimmer Studio. Aufgrund der zentralen Wohnlage gelangen Sie innerhalb von wenigen Minuten mit der Tram 4 in die Innenstadt bzw. zu nahegelegen Restaurant, Bars oder zum See. Die Wohnung ist Hell und ausgestattet mit einem komfortablen Bett sowie einer grossen & geräumigen Küche. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für paare, alleinreisende abenteurer und geschäftsreisende.

name: Room for rent in trendy District 4
description:
The apartment is located in the vibrant district 4 (near Hardplatz). In just 600m you can walk on the Langstrasse. There are many clubs, bars and restaurants to linger. The largest building in Zurich, the Swiss Prime Tower, is just 150 meters away and offers a beautiful view of the industrial quarter, the city center and the lake from the rooftop bar / lounge.

From the airport the apartment is best reached via the SBB station Hardbrücke (about 150m on foot).

The space
The rented room (living room) has a bed 160 x 200, a coach and is equipped with TV and DVD. Next you also have a balcony with lounge for sole use available.

Guest access
Guests have free access to the kitchen and bathroom. If required and availability, the washing machine / dryer used by all parties in the house can also be used in the drying room.
host_about:
I have a Bachelor Degree in Business Administration with specialization in Banking and Finance. After finishing my studies I strengthened my knowledge in Finance and Tax by attending the Swiss CPA Education. 

During and after my studies I used to work for international consulting and auditing firms all over Switzerland and abroad. 

I am Swiss and grew up in the Region of Berne, but moved to Zurich in 2008 and really like to live here.

I would describe myself as open minded, friendly and trustworthy. I like to meet people from all over the world. Travelling is one of my passions. One of my favorite places is Berlin, where I often go. (there I got ideas for new businesses). Another passion is my own real-estate-business (I like to renovate and decorate flats).

In my spare time I like doing sports (in Summer mostly jogging / tennis and in winter skiing/snowboarding). In 2012 I started with cooking on a bit higher level.

I am looking forward to meeting new people and giving them an opportunity to stay in my apartment and visit wonderful Zurich.

I'm open for all kind of questions! Don't hesitate to ask.

name: Central apartment close to lake Zurich, Seefeld
description:
The apartment has one bedroom and one living room, a newly renovated kitchen, two balconies and one bathroom (bathtub). It is located on the second floor with an elevator. It is in the center of Zurich`s liveliest location - Seefeld.

The space
The apartment has one bedroom and one living room, a newly renovated kitchen, two balconies and one bathroom (bathtub). It is on the second floor with an elevator.

The apartment is only a couple minutes walk from the lake and about a 10min from Bahnhof Stadelhofen and Bellevueplatz.

The apartment has recently been furnished (minimalist décor) with all modern conveniences including: high speed wifi, dishwasher and full kitchen.

The bedroom contains a double size boxspring bed (160cm x 200cm). There is beamer in the living room and you can also use it in the bedroom.
neighborhood_overview:
Seefeld is an incredibly popular area to live in - it`s teeming with restaurants, bars, supermarkets, small stores, yoga & fitness studios ect. But of course the major attraction here is the lake: On the lake side there is a promenade with boat rentals, two swimming spots, China Garten and the Blatterwiese, where you can sunbathe on the grass, barbecue on two electric grills or dine in one of the outdoor restaurants.

There is a dry cleaner just next door and plenty of restaurants in 1min walking distance (see guide).

name: New, spacious & charming Flat in central Zurich
description:
The charming apartment is newly renovated, light-flooded and perfectly located in the middle of friendly and hip Zürich:
- 5min by tram to the station Bellevue and the lake
- 10min to the old town of Zurich
The apartment consists of a spacious bedroom, a bright living room (if necessary as a second bedroom) and a tastefully furnished dining room. Additionally, there are a newly renovated kitchen and bathroom as well as a sunny balcony with a perfect view to the Uetliberg.

The space
The apartment has three rooms in total:

In the spacious bedroom there are a double bed (160cm), two hall stands with free hangers for your clothes and a cupboard to store your belongings. If necessary I can provide you with an additional mattress for more than 4 people.

Furthermore, there is a living room that can also be used as a second bedroom, since the couch can be used as bed as well (160cm). Additionally, the room is equipped with a huge TV
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is really well located in the calm and friendly part of Zurich.
A smaller supermarket is reachable in 2min walking distance and bigger stores are located within 5min tram distance. From the by foot accessible Hegibachplatz you can take the Bus 31 to reach the vibrant night life of Langstrasse within 15min.
After a long night you can recover in the nearby forests just across the streets. There you can enjoy Zürich's nature.
host_about: I’m a student at the University of St. Gallen. I was born in Zürich and lived for a while in Buenos Aires, London and Milan. I love to travel, meet new people and discover the world.

Bathroom shared with host (1 person). Use of kitchen permitted to make a cup of tea or heat something up. No full cooking please.

Other things to note
Taxis are expensive in Zurich and drivers do not always know the route, especially the ones waiting at the train station. I wouldn't be surprised if they charge CHF40 or 50 from the central station to get here. I recommend public transport as it is very reliable and safe. Ticket machines are in English, German, French and Italian.

name: Room: 2★Your downtown base for tourism + business★
description:
Your private bedroom is located in a old beautiful and cozy apartment in the center of Zurich on one of the most famous streets in Switzerland: Langstrasse. You are just minutes from central station and just a few meters from the city's nightlife in the midst of clubs, bars, restaurants, shops and also relaxing green areas. Zürich international airport can be reached in half an hour with public transport. There is often the opportunity to check in earlier or later. Just send me an inquiry.

The space
A compliment which I always hear from guests, that the accommodation is very well located. It is located just a few minutes from Zurich main train station (Zürich HB), from which you can easily reach Zurich International Airport ZRH. My accommodation is ideal for tourists who want to visit our beautiful city of Zurich as you can reach many attractions and the old town on foot very quickly. Even party people who only come to Zurich for the weekend or for a concert are
neighborhood_overview:
Langstrasse is Zurich's most colorful and varied district. You can savor international specialties and enjoy multi-cultural shopping options during the day here, while the street converts into Zurich's nightlife district at night. One bar after another, popular clubs and if you get hungry from partying a lot, there's plenty of food available from the many take-aways and 24-hour shops. Langstrasse never sleeps and has progressed from a former red-light district into one of the most popular districts in the city. This is also thanks to the many young designers and restaurant owners, who have upgraded the district over the past years. (Source: Website Zurich tourism)

The apartment is located in one of the city's most popular locations: the so called Langstrassenquartier. The Langstrasse (which means long street) is one of the most colorful addresses here in Zurich. The Swiss Army used to be stationed here in large barracks which still exists today and are only minutes from the

host_about: hello i am vincenzo,i come from italy and i live in zurich with my wife Antonietta,she is a really nice person,we are both serious,trustworthy,friendly,openmind and we will be available for you for any suggest or questions.we both work in zurich,i am a cook,so i offer also meal service for my gust if required for a reasonable price,my wife is a professional cleaner,and she also take care of our house,so you will be sure to find a very clean place.we love travel infact we have traveled in many places worldwide.we also love spend time with friends or make new friends and find interesting people.for me airbnb is not only a way to make some money but is also a way to meet new people,help them to get the best from their travel and maybe make new friends.i think people are loosing confidence towards the next,but is just because we are doing a more asocial life,that way we don t trust anyone,that s why we should start to meet as much people possible in our life,we will discover that there are so many good persons in the world,the bad guy are only a small part of the world but only  by socializing we can discover that.

The space
Mini Duplex Apartments' size: 29 m² - 36 m², depending on available units

This duplex apartment is decorated in urban chalet style. Natural materials like wood and stone combined with designer furniture and understated earthy tones fill the apartment with a sense of elegance. The lower features an open living and dining area with a fully fitted kitchenette, dining corner and a snug lounge with flat screen TV. A separate bathroom with a shower, hand towels, a hairdryer and company-branded toiletries is also available. A staircase leads to the upper gallery, where an open sleeping area is situated, featuring a comfortable double bed, wardrobe, flat screen TV and working desk.
neighborhood_overview:
This flagship apartment house is located in the urban area of the 3rd district of Zurich. The city center and the lake can be reached within a few minutes by public transport. The direct vicinity offers some restaurants, bars, as well as shopping possibilities. The shopping center Shilcity with numerous shops, restaurants and a cinema is just around the corner. Moreover, local recreation areas Sihl and Allmend Brunau are situated nearby.

Visit La Lup at Wolframplatz 1 in Zurich and enjoy some international specialties and delicious Romanian food. Discover our Jar Menus with authentic dishes from East to West.

For all clients of VISIONAPARTMENTS, the restaurant is open as following:

Mon – Thu: 07:30 AM – 11:30 PM

A cozy and trendy studio apartment with lake and Mountain views and only 9 minutes bus ride to Bürkliplatz city center. The lake is a 5 minute walk and nearest bus stop is also 5 minutes walking distance.

The space

name: Relax and enjoy "Little big city Zürich".
description:
Share & enjoy the cozy, peaceful atmosphere of my home after you have explored the city.
Bright, sunny room (17sqm/172sqft) room in a 3-bedroom apartment. Located in a residential area, very quiet surrounding. Well connected by bus & train: Airport (35min direct train), City Centre/central station/Old town(25min), Lake Zürich 15min. walk. Free private parking on the premises.
If you come for a new job/internship & need my address to register, contact me in advance for availability&procedures!
neighborhood_overview:
Wollishofen-Kilchberg is a very green, quiet and first of all residential area. Due to its characteristics and proximity to the center it is in high demand. It offers nice views into green gardens, panoramic views over the lake and the mountains.
You will be woken up by birdsongs and not by traffic.
Some of the nicest lakeside bars and restaurants you can find along the Lake Zürich are nearby. (lf you look at the map indication of my listing click on the icons for restaurants or point of views you will find around my place to get some ideas.)
Also the famous LINDT chocolate factory and there gorgeous outlet shop is located nearby and you can often smell a slight fragrance of chocolate in the air.
To have space, peace, a safe neighborhood and a lot of green around is what I love most living here and would like to share with you.
host_about:
“It is passion that makes man live;  reason makes one only last.” 
― Nicolas Chamfort
"Durch die Leidenschaften lebt der Mensch, durch die Vernunft existiert er bloss."

This is my motto  in life and I try to live up to it as much as I can. I have traveled extensively for work and leisure and made invaluable experiences during my trips. I am passionate about wine, food, exotic herbs and plants. But nothing beats good company and great talks! My home is my castle I love and I care about. You are welcome to share and enjoy it with me.

I am an easy going, open minded person with a lot of interests.  I love reading  and I am an "old school" newspaper addict. On a Sunday morning you will most likely find me on the sofa surrounded by newspapers and magazines and well equipped with coffee and cookies to indulge in what is going on in the world. 
*******************************************************************
Note to Guests
• I enjoy meeting people and like to know who my guests are. Write a bit about yourself and your purpose of travelling. That way I not only get a better picture of you but can come up with valuable information and ideas to make your arrival and stay pleasent, convenient and memorable.
• A novel of your life story isn't necessary; just write about what you think someone meeting you for the first time would want to know.

neighborhood_overview:
The district 12, Schwamendingen, comprises the three quarters:
- Saatlen,
- Schwamendingen-Center and
- Hirzenbach.

Typical of our city district is, compared to the rest of the city, the particularly large green areas, the extremely active club life, and the large number of co-operative appartements.
The latter were created especially in the 1950s and offer increasingly sought-after low-cost housing. Because of their age, many cooperatives are in the process of modernizing their housing stock during these years. Not only because of building replacements or renovations, but also through new developments such as the Hunziker Areal. The owners along the highway expect the upcoming motorway housing an additional increase in attractiveness for their properties. The motorway separating today the district will connect the two quarters Saatlen and Schwamendingen center after completion of the enclosure and offer the population with the Ueberlandpark an attractive

name: Stylish apartment in trendy Kreis 5
description:
In the heart of Kreis 5, the trendiest neighborhood of Zurich.
Next to the hippest restaurants, bars and design shops and at the same time very calm. The apartment is in a walking distance to the train station (walk: 10 min/tram: 2 min), Old Town and Viadukt. Supermarket 100m away.
The Limmatriver is 100m distance, perfect for running or for a walk.
Beautiful apartment, comfortable and very bright, it is on the 4th floor, without lift.
We will be very happy to welcome you in our cozy apartment!

The space
Our apartment is in the fourth floor so it is really bright. From the sleeping room you can see the Prime Tower of Zürich. The apartment has two sites, one to the street and the other one to the Courtyard, so it´s really bright during the whole day. Even if we are so central located, the apartment is really calm and in spring and summer you can enjoy the sound of the birds.
neighborhood_overview: We love our Neighborhood!! Specially in Summer you feel like on holidays since you are next to the Limmatriver. We love to go swimming after work and drinking some beers in the bars close to the river. Being so well located is a great advantage to enjoy the city, there are great cafes, where you can have breakfast, very nice restaurants with terraces and shops.
host_about:
I am a spanish architect living in Zürich for the last 4 years. I grow up in San Sebastian, Spain and I lived in different cities in Europe. I travelled all over the world and for me is important to feel at home when I am back.
Now my home is in Zürich and I love this city, specially in Summer!
I enjoy having guests in my apartment and making them feeling happy! If you have any questions regarding the apartment, the city or maybe about architecture in Zürich don't hesitate to contact me.

description:
Spacious Business Room (18sqm) with 140cm bed, partly with small balcony, Shower/WC, hair dryer
fully equipped kitchenette (without hob), fridge, Nespresso machine including initial equipment of coffee and tea capsules, kettle
small seating area, safe, flatscreen TV, ironing station

Guest access
free access to fitness room and public terrace

Choose from: croissants or corn flakes, rolls with 3 different cold cuts or spreads, a fruit of your choice, yoghurt and a juice.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to the Zurich West business district. Many larger companies and bank office buildings are in the immediate vicinity. Altstetten train station can be reached on foot in six minutes. Various tram and bus lines connect the apartment house with the city center of Zurich in 10 minutes. Zurich Airport can be reached by car in 20 minutes via the Zurich-Altstetten motorway junction. The Letzipark shopping center is 500 meters away, and the Letzigrund football stadium is right next to it. Bars and art galleries are within walking distance of our hotel in Zurich West and the local recreation area of ​​the Uetliberg is ideal for long walks.

Our guests enjoy 48 special conditions in the nearby david gym fitness center. Letzigrund, the home stadium of the FC Zürich and GC Zürich football clubs, hosts many interesting matches. The stadium is also used as the annual venue for the world-class athletics meeting in Zurich, as well as regularly for large open-air concert
host_about:
Lieber Gast,

herzlichen Dank für Ihr Interesse an unserem Unternehmen THE FLAG Zürich. Damit Sie sich auch in Zeiten von Corona sicher und wohl während Ihres Aufenthalts bei uns fühlen, möchten wir Ihnen im Folgenden einige Hinweise geben.
Wir möchten Sie darauf aufmerksam machen, dass aufgrund der aktuellen Coronapandemie in unserem Hotel eine strenge Maskenpflicht gilt. Bitte Tragen Sie eine Maske, sobald Sie Ihr Hotelzimmer verlassen und sich in öffentlichen Bereichen (Lobby, Flur, Aufzug, Tiefgarage etc.) aufhalten. Die Maske muss immer die Nase und den Mund bedecken.

Darüber hinaus möchten wir Sie darauf hinweisen, dass sich stets nur die bei der Buchung angegebene Anzahl an Personen in den Hotelzimmern aufhalten darf. Der Aufenthalt von weiteren Personen, Besuch oder Ähnlichem ist nicht gestattet. Wir behalten uns vor, unser Hausrecht bei Zuwiderhandlung (notfalls polizeilich) geltend zu machen. Feiern, Partys oder ähnliche Ansammlungen in den Hotelzimmern sind strengstens verboten. 

Sicherheitskaution:
Bei Check-In benötigen wir eine Garantie über die Summe Ihres Aufenthaltes sowie CHF 200.00 für mögliche Extras als Sicherheitskaution. Diese kann bei Anreise in Form von Bargeld, EC- oder Kreditkarte hinterlegt werden. Eine Rückerstattung erfolgt unmittelbar nach Ihrer Abreise. Das Hotel kann zudem eine Kopie Ihres Ausweises anfertigen.

Nichtraucherhotel:
Das Rauchen ist in all unseren Hotelzimmern sowie in den öffentlichen Bereichen von THE FLAG Zürich strengstens untersagt. THE FLAG ist ein reines Nichtraucherhotel. Bei Verstoß gegen das Rauchverbot behalten wir uns vor, die Reinigungskosten (bis zu CHF 500.00) in Rechnung zu stellen bzw. mit der Sicherheitskaution zu verrechnen. Das Rauchen ist nur auf Balkonen und Terrassen erlaubt.

Sachbeschädigung und Haftung:
Hotel- und Übernachtungsgäste haften für Schäden oder übermäßige Verschmutzung, welche sie am Eigentum von THE FLAG verursachen. Schadensersatzzahlungen werden mit der Sicherheitskaution verrechnet bzw. gesondert in Rechnung gestellt. 

Nachtruhe:
Zwischen 22.00 und 07.00 Uhr bitten wir Sie, die Nachtruhe zu respektieren und andere Gäste nicht zu stören. Personen, die gegen die Hausruhe verstoßen, kann ein weiterer Aufenthalt im THE FLAG Zürich verweigert werden. Ebenfalls kann ein Hausverbot ausgesprochen werden.


Zuwiderhandlungen gegen die vorgenannten Regeln werden mit bis zu CHF 500.00 geahndet.

Vielen Dank für die Beachtung der Regeln. Sollten Sie Fragen zu Ihrem Aufenthalt haben, stehen wir Ihnen jederzeit gerne zur Verfügung.

Wir würden uns freuen, Sie bald als Gast begrüßen zu dürfen und wünschen Ihnen bis dahin noch eine schöne Zeit!  

Herzlichst,
Ihr THE FLAG Zürich Team

description: Wir wohnen in unserm Haus in einer ruhigen Umgebung und doch nur 2 Minuten von einer Bus/Tram-Haltestelle entfernt. Stadtzentrum, Hauptbahnhof (15 Min), Flughafen (30 Min.) und ETH Hönggerberg (8 Min)  sind sehr einfach zu erreichen.
host_about:
Ich bin Bernadette und wohne mit meinem Mann und drei erwachsenen Kindern in einem ruhigen aber belebten Quartiert in Zürich. Hier bewohnen wir ein Haus mit drei Wohnungen und haben Platz genug, Dich zu beherbergen. 
Als Familie sind wir viel gereist und haben immer wieder unkomplizierte Gastfreundschaft erlebt. Wir freuen uns, wenn die Welt zu uns kommt. 

Die ganze Familien kennt die Stadt Zürich gut. Wir  geben gerne Tipps im Bereich Ausgang, Kultur, Sport und Fun. Wer keine Tipps braucht ... auch ok.
amenities: ["Essentials", "Wifi", "Hangers", "TV", "Long term stays allowed", "Washer", "Dryer", "Kitchen"]

name: Nika's white paradise 🌸
description:
Die Wohnung ist ruhig, man hört ab und zu die Kinder im Hof spielen. Der Parketboden ist neu gemacht. Das Wohnzimmer ist sehr hell, den ganzen Tag sonnig. Schlafzimmer 1 kriegt die Abendsonne, die Fenster neu Zweifachverglast. Die Küche und das Bad sind eher antik, aber sauber. Zum Kochen beim Herd den Knopf an der Wand nach unten drehen. Denner, Coop, Zug, Bus 5 Min zu Fuss. Praktisch alles vor der Haustür. HB mit dem Zug in 10 min, zum See mit dem Tram 30 min.

The space
Zu vermieten steht Zimmer 1-"Gästezimmer" ausgestattet mit einem IKEA weissen 2Ps-Bett, Arbeitstisch und einem Schrank und Sessel. Im Wohnzimmer kann man auf dem roten grossen Sofa für 2 Ps schlafen oder einflach chillen und TV schauen, wenn es gerade niemand benutzt.

Guest access
WLAN, Balkon mit Balkonsitz, Küche zum selber kochen ausgestattet. Bügelbrett, Bügeleisen, Finken für Gäste.

Other things to note
Lange Haare in der Badewanne können das Ab
neighborhood_overview: Die Nachbar sind ruhig und nett. Kein Lärm. Das Haus ist sauber, regelmässig geputzt. Meine Wohnung befindet sich im 3. Stock rechts.
host_about:
Hallo, 

my name is Veronika, i am living and working in Switzerland since 2007 as Kindergarden teacher.

In my free time i like to dance, travel, hike...or do some sport activities. I prefere healthy self made food and like to discover myself by travelling to foreign countries. Positive open minded people are always welcome in my life/Flat.

The Best thing about Switzerland is chocolate, cheese and hiking. I hope you will enjoy your stay in this lovely small city.

name: Superb Suite “POCKET WIFI” 10´to Zürich Centre
description:
The apartment is in a top district! Is just 290 meters away from the public transport & the grocery, 1.5km from Swiss National Museum.
Käferberg 1.7km It is a picturesque location, and the upper southwestern side is also the location of restaurants overlooking the city of Zürich and the Limmat valley. 2.6km to Zurich main station, and 2.7km from ETH Zurich.
Bahnhofstrasse is 2.9km from the apartment, and Paradeplatz is 3.1km. The nearest airport is Kloten Airport, 6.9km from the property.

The space
The property is ideal for friends , couples and families!
It offers one big bedroom with a double Queen size bed and a big living area with a leather sofa and one single bed.
Fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and a beautiful balcony!
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is in a very residential area in quiet surroundings.
500 meters to Zurich Limmat River, Zürich's oldest river bath from 1909. It is partly a swimming pool and partly a showcase for Zürich's hottest beach bodies!

From our property you can walk along of the one most beautiful areas of Limmat River and reach Zurich city in 30 minutes!

Supermarket Migros - Coop are two minutes walk from the apartment.

name: Design Rooms in Zurich
description:
The Placid Hotel in Zurich: perfect for cosmopolites, business travellers and leisure seekers. A hub for countless threads that converge and separate again. Urban lifestyle, modern design, authentic encounters. Though deeply rooted in the Altstetten quarter, it is still open to the world.

The space
A place of encounters - either in the lobby, lounge or garden restaurant: you'll meet people all over the hotel, all looking for something different. Hotel guests, professionals and local residents. An urban blend - our vision of modern co-existence.

Guest access
Guests can use all hotel facilities like lounge with business corner, fitness room, coworking-spaces, restaurant, garage.
neighborhood_overview: The Placid Hotel Zurich is located in the Altstetten district, a stone's throw from the Zurich West business quarter. Visit the Letzipark shopping centre or the Letzigrund stadium, both just 700 m away. Zurich city centre is just a 10-minute tram or bus ride away, as is Altstetten station on foot.

description:
Brand new 1 bedroom apartment, fully furnished, perfect for 3 guests. The flat has a bedroom with double bed and a bedsofa in the living room. In the bathroom there is a bath tub. From the balcony you can see the Zürich lake. The flat is in the city center, the next tram station is Fröhlichstrasse. Grocery shops, bars and restaurants are just around the corner. In few steps you can reach the lake.
WASHER AND DRYER ARE IN THE FLAT FOR YOUR OWN USE.

Other things to note
If you need the bed sofa done, please make sure you inform me in advance, thanks.

name: Bright & Stylish 1BR - Near Google HQ & Center
description:
This comfortable 1 Bedroom apartment is on the 2nd floor of newly renovated building located in a central, residential area of Zürich.
Wether you are travelling alone, for business or for vacations, this apartment will be perfect for a maximum group of 4 people.
Located in Wiedikon, Zürich. It is just 10 minutes to the vibrant city centre of Zürich and Google HQ. Packed with lots of restaurants and shops, the lake is just a few minutes away!
Feel free to contact us if you have any questions :)

The space
When you enter the apartment, you will find a fully equipped kitchen and a dinning table for you to share a nice meal after a day discovering the city.
On your left, you will find a bedroom with a comfortable double bed and an attached bathroom.
On your right, you will find a bright living room with a comfortable sofa bed and flat screen TV.
Cleaning service can be provided during your stay.
Hairdryer, TV, iron, ironing board
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and very safe even at late night. You will find local supermarkets and small grocery shops, and nice bars and restaurants on the adjacent streets as well as a major shopping center (“Sihlcity”).

As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us.

name: Rotes Bed-Sofa
description:
Es ist eine 3 Zimmer Wohnung, in welcher ich im Wohnzimmer ein rotes ausklappbares Sofa zum Übernachten anbiete und 2 Schlafzimmer. Die Lage ist ruhig, mit einem Balkon (Balkonsitz) - Ausblick in ein Hof, nahe am Bahnhof Altstetten (4min zu Fuss). Mit dem Buss 31 in 25 min am HB, oder Nr. 80 in 8 min über die Europabrücke in Höngg. Mit Tram 2 vom Lindenplatz in 30 min beim Zürichsee. Die Nachbarn sind ruhig und liebevoll. Wald etwa 15 min zu Fuss erreichbar. Shops: Denner, Coop, Migros 5-8min.

The space
In Sommer: Posibility to rent a bike by train station Altstetten for deposit 20 CHF & ride along the river Limmat to Kloster for nice lunch, coffee.

Swimming pool Altstetten: 15 CHF with outdoor Whirlpool & Sauna.

Shopping centre "Letzipark".

Other things to note
IMPORTANT: In the kitchen there is a botton on the wall by the stove. Only for cooking, turn it down to position 6h. Straight after cooking please put it bac

Neighbours are calm, nice. 2 Families with small children. One old woman using buggy for walking which used to be parked behind the entrance door.

No parties or loud music is allowed in the house.

description:
Liebe Gäste
In einer komplett renovierten Liegenschaft, halten wir für Sie zwei Zimmer mit hohen Ausbaustandard frei. Das weitere finden Sie in einem separaten Inserat. Gerne heissen wir Feriengäste und Kurzaufenthalter willkommen. Die Liegenschaft liegt im Stadtkern von Zürich und befindet sich in nur fünf Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt. name: Watch Sunrises From an Apartment in a Century-Old Mansion
description: Admire messages written in chalk in a room of black-painted walls and leather furniture to match. Eclectic art and decor create a richly textured interior that's fascinating to explore. Step onto a terrace for views of the city and distant hills.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in an urban residential area, with a public transportation stop right in front of the house. Within walking distance are a few shops, lovely Werd Island in the River Limmat, and some vineyards—ideal for dog-walking and sports.
host_about: Having travelled the entire world both privately and professionally, I have an idea how I would love to stay far from home. This is reflected in our apartment - just the pool is missing...

In einer komplett renovierten Liegenschaft, halten wir für Sie mehrere Zimmer mit hohen Ausbaustandard frei. Die weiteren finden Sie in einem separaten Inserat. name: Zurich apartment with gorgeous view
description:
Great two room apartment with modern kitchen. Bathroom includes a bathtub. Beautiful view over the city. There is lots of light in the whole appartment. The neighbourhood is calm yet central; 10 min from main train station, direct trams to Central (old town, Niederdorf, Limmat etc.) and Bellevue (Opera, theatre, lake etc).

The space
The apartment includes a bedroom, dining/living room with balcony and fantastic view over the city, bathroom with bathtub, kitchen with all the necessary things (yes, of course : a real Italian style coffee machine and a dishwasher! 😊) and a hallway connecting all of the rooms.
host_about: Ich bin Choreographin und mein Beruf führt mich and die verschiedensten Orte auf der Welt. Ich liebe Musik, gute Filme und exotisches Essen.

name: Room 2 Double room with a balcony
description:
This is a private room in a Villa which is over 100 years old with a private balcony and use of the garden below which has seating and BarBQ making facilities. The room can become a suite with a door leading to a second room for families or just for more space.

Guest access
All Guests can use the garden.
neighborhood_overview:
The Villa is at Toblerplatz Zuriberg a sort after area with tram and bus links into the city centre in one direction and the FIFA headquarters and Zurich Zoo in the other direction with lush woodlands to take long walks in.

There are supermarkets, restaurants and a bistro in walking distance. The tram takes you into the City centre and the famous bahnhofstrasse in 10 minutes.

name: Very spacious studio with balcony (Parkview 2)
description:
Spacious and bright studio apartment (35 sqm) with high standard furnishing including box spring bed, a separate kitchen and balcony. The apartment is just around the corner from Kreuzplatz with shopping and public transport. The train station Bahnhof Stadelhofen is just a short walk away .

The space
The apartment is fully equipped including flat screen TV and WiFi. Household appliances such as microwave, coffee machine, kettle, toaster, iron, vacuum cleaner and hairdryer are available.
The kitchen is equipped with the usual utensils such as pots, pans, dishes and cutlery.

Guest access
The whole flat is for your own use.
Towels and linen are provided for the amount of guests.
There is no shampoo nor shower gel, only soap.

If you need the bed sofa done, please make sure you inform me in advance, thanks.

name: Schlafzimmer in kleiner Wohnung nah am See.
description:
Kleine Wohnung, insgesamt 41 Quadratmeter, mit Aussicht auf Garten; in 3 Gehminuten zum Bahnhof Stadelhofen und zum Zürichersee. Das Schlafzimmer gehört allein dem Gast und hat seine eigene Türe.

The space
Gäste haben ein privates Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett für sich.

Ein schönes Café steht direkt nebenan. Eine Tramstation zur Oper. Blick auf Garten. Ruhiger Ort, man hört die Vögel singen. Die Wohnung ist klein und ordentlich mit einem modernen Bad. Küche sehr klein. Ich bin tagsüber nicht hier, komme in der Regel zwischen 18:00 und 20:00 heim, d.h. die Wohnung ist ruhig und ein Gast hat Privatsphäre.

Guest access
Zugang zum Garten und allen Zimmern in der Wohnung. Bei Bedarf können Kleider gewaschen werden.
neighborhood_overview: Ruhig und dennoch extrem zentral
host_about:
Music journalist and teacher who enjoys traveling as a way to meet new people.

Currently listening to opera, exploring Switzerland, keeping my French in good shape, and taking long slow walks.

Featuring 2.5 rooms + balcony, it’s open plan, spacious and bright.

name: Feel at home in this beautiful apartment + balcony
description:
Beautiful, quiet and comfortable 2 room apartment with balcony and own kitchen. The house has 8 parties and a shared washing machine with a washing schedule. Around the corner is a shopping area (Letzipark). Also the Stadion (Stadion Letzigrund) is just a quick walk far away.
The apartment is located in Altstetten. Public transport (Tram 2) or Bus (31, 89, 81) are close by. Airport reachable in 40 minutes, main station 25 minutes, station altstetten 10 minutes.

The space
The living room has everything you need. A comfortable convertible couch, a television, a big dining table etc.
Its perfect for spending a cosy night with a movie or talking a night long with a glass of wine.

Guest access
You have access to every part of the apartment except of the basement.
As the apartment is only available when I am on holiday some of my personal stuff remains in the apartment. This personal belongings are not part of the booking.
<
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is great. A lot of families and young people live there. Especially, as the rents are ok for Zurich. As it has a lot of people from different cultures, it has a welcoming atmosphere.
host_about:
My name is Larissa and I am 33 years old. Since the end of 2016 I live in the beautiful city of Zurich, which I am able to call my home. I am working in academia, which means I am mostly teaching and researching in the fields of non-profit management and marketing.
I love to travel and to get to know new people as I think that everyone you meet has an influence on who you become.

name: Calm city house, 20 min. from city centre & lake
description:
City house, 20 min. from city centre & lake, ideal for families. 4 bedrooms: 6 persons can sleep in real beds.

Our house is extremely well situated, in a calm area of Zurich but still close to the city (20 minutes by tram-way or bike and even less by car). 5 minutes walk to the forest, fields and farm areas and perfect start for a hike up to the mountain Uetliberg.

We're travelling a lot and like to rent our beautiful home while we're away so that other families can enjoy it!

The space
It is a city house, 135 cm2, 5 ½ rooms, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms + 1 additional toilet downstairs. It is organized on 4 different levels:

- Downstairs: living room, dining room, kitchen & toilet

+ 2 little terraces on each side of the house allowing to enjoy sun or shade depending on preferences.

- 1st floor: main bedroom with its bathroom + separate toilet, little office corner + reading corner in front of the room. The bed i
neighborhood_overview: The surroundings are amazing for families with children! We have a total of 4 playgrounds in less then 5 minutes walking distance – one is right in front of the house and has it’s own soccer and basketball fields + table tennis. An indoor pool (with wellness area) at 5 minutes walking distance and an outdoor pool as well as a river swim area (“Werdinsel – Badi Höngg”) within 10 minutes.

name: Privates Zimmer mit eigenes Bad und Balkon
description:
Das Zimmer ist herrlich mit Sicht auf grüne Terrasse mit eigener Dusche. Wir haben eine liebevolle Katze. Wir freuen uns euch willkommen zu heissen. Vom Flughafen nehmen Sie Zug Richtung Hauptbahnhof und steigen aus bei Bahnhof Oerlikon. Von dort Bus 61 Richtung Mühlacker nehmen und beim Station Aspholz aussteigen. Die Haltestelle befindet sich direkt neben unserem Haus. Es gibt Sportplatz und regelmässige Verbindung zum Zentrum Zürichs. 10 min zu Fuss vom uns können Sie baden im Katzensee.

The space
Es ist ein grosses Wohnraum mit offener Küche und grosszügiger zweiter Terrasse

Guest access
Terrasse, Wohnraum, Küche, Dusche

Other things to note
Wir haben eine ältere Katzedame
neighborhood_overview: Neu gebaute Wohnüberbauung, sehr international, jung und cool
host_about:
Moreno und ich sind Familienmenschen. Wir freuen uns euch ein warmes Aufenthalt zu bitten: eigenes Zimmer und eigenes Bad. Wir sind jung und weltoffen, sehr hilfsbereich und respektieren jede Kultur und euere Privatsphäre.
Wir sehen euch als Freunde und freuen uns euch Tips zu geben wenn ihr braucht über Zürich und Schweiz. Da wir sehr gerne kochen gibt es in unsere Küche alles was ein Koch sich erträumen kann an Utensilien. Wir arbeiten beide und kommen am Abend Nachause. Ja, es freut uns euch begrüssen zu dürfen und euch als Gäste bei uns zu haben!

Supermarket Migros - Coop are two minutes walk from the apartment.

name: Suite in Private Apartment near Zurich Bellevue
description:
In meiner Wohnung biete ich zwei Zimmer an, die mit einer Schiebetüre verbunden sind, mit Balkon. Ein diskreter Zugang zum eigenen Bad ist gewährleistet. Die Zimmer befinden sich im 4. Geschoss eines kleinen Mehrfamilienhauses mit Lift. Das Haus befindet sich nahe des Zentrums der Stadt und ist bestens mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erreichbar. Zum Seeufer sind es etwa drei Minuten zu Fuss. Lebensmittelläden und Restaurants sind im Umkreis von 100 Metern zu finden.

The space
Die Zimmer sind Teil meiner dreistöckigen Wohnung in den obersten Etagen eines kleinen Mehrfamilienhauses. Alle Etagen sind mit dem Lift erreichbar, nur vom Hauseingang zum Lift führt die Treppe über eine halbe Etage. Küche und Terrasse befinden sich auf den oberen Etagen, sie sind leicht über die Treppe in der Wohnung zu erreichen. Auf der gleichen Etage wie die Zimmer befindet sich mein Arbeitszimmer. Die Gästezimmer sind auf den ruhigen Hof gegen Süden ausgerichtet. Im Hof steht ein gros
neighborhood_overview: Das Haus liegt in einer flachen und dichtbesiedelten Gegend der Stadt. Trotzdem bietet die Unterkunft einen ruhigen Ort, sich aufzuhalten. Gleichzeitig ist der Ort ein kleines Zentrum im Quartier mit Läden, Restaurants und öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln im Umkreis von ein paar Metern. Der See mit Parks ist zu Fuss in drei Minuten erreichbar.
host_about:
Ich bin aus Zürich, selbstständig, reiseerfahren, mehrsprachig, Vater und noch eine Weile lang noch nicht pensioniert, abenteuerlustig. 
Seit über 20 Jahren wohne ich im selben Quartier in Zürich, der Stadt, wo ich Architektur studiert habe. Aufgewachsen bin ich weiter oben am Zürichsee. Gereist bin ich schon auf alle Kontinente, ausser der Antarktis. Interessiert bin ich an Wissenschaften und Kultur. Sport ist nicht mein Antrieb, mach ich ab und zu aber doch.
