name: Zurich Old Town, Studio - exclusive
description:
Beautiful apartment in the most exclusive living area in old town Zurich, only a few steps away from all major attractions and the lake.

This exceptional private home was built in 1430 and has been home to some of Zurich's most famous residents.

Deluxe breakfast buffet included.

Newly, lovingly renovated. Special part of Swiss history. Lake view, marvelous garden, fountain plunge pool in front of house. Private apartment & use of office, garden, and breakfast stube. Very quite, no cars.

The space
Exclusive and rare, this beautiful apartment is inside a family home on the ground floor with private entrance and garden access. Includes a closet and storage area, kitchen and ensuite bathroom and shower. Home theater with beamer including netflix (extra cost) and firestick tv with full surround sound stereo.

The breakfast room has original wooden panels dating back to the 15th century with a view to the gardens in the ba
neighborhood_overview: Oberdorf is the most attractive neighborhood in the old city of Zurich. It is two blocks from the Cathedrale Gross Muenster, Bahnhofstrasse and Paradeplatz yet a cosy, quite neighborhood with young and old. Art museums, spas, sport centers, all within minutes. The hidden gardens of Zurich in our back yard are private and quite. Pedestrian zone with no cars or traffic noise.
host_about:
I am an American entrepreneur living in Europe now for 29 years. I love sports, nature, technology, our garden and most of all my love Hanspeter. 

We are very fortunate to live in this special place and it gives us pleasure to share it with our guests. 

I play the flute, make my own tinctures, and grappa from the grapes in our garden. 

We love to eat, play chess & enjoy the arts. 

I am passionate about the environment and founded and run (Website hidden by Airbnb) the largest knowledge sharing platform and business exchange for the global water sector. We have 5 companies between us and are active in security, digital asset management , knowledge management and cryptocurrencies.

The apartment has 3 bedrooms and a living room. I am living with my brother (Medicine Student) and my girlfriend (same room)!

If you want to explore and see the city, this will be the perfect location for you !

host_about:
My name is Francesco. 
MBA grad from California working in New York City and born in Switzerland.
It is a very exciting city to be in as it has a lot to offer. I like to travel, food and sports. My hobby are cars and watches. 

I am a very welcoming host, I like to meet my guests and make sure they are confortable and most importantly I do like to make my guests feel they are at home. 

As a host on Airbnb and traveller I have learned the beauty of hosting people from different parts of the world and provide them with excellent services and very comfortable stay. 

My promise to my guests is: YOU will always have a friend and a good assistant in me if you ever need while you are in New York and after you leave . 

I would like to tell my guest you are welcome to your home away from home. 

Hosting is what I do best, I offer comfort and relaxation, to all our guests and I like to say I have met so many wonderful people during my years of hosting and I am always looking forward to meet more wonderful people and get the pleasure of hosting them. 

My new friendships are one of the biggest reasons why I love to host!

Cheers,
Francesco

name: Villa Kunterbunt
description:
Das Zimmer ist in der untersten unbewohnten Wohnung. Das Haus wurde 1906 gebaut . Zentralheizung / neu gestrichen.
Ventilator
Zur Zeit hat es kein WLAN, kein TV
Grosses neues Doppelbett mit 2 neuen EInzelmatratzen ( 2m x 90cm ) = 1.80m auf 2m
eine Zusatzmatratze kann auf Wunsch zusätzlich auf den Boden gelegt werde

The space
Man ist ungestört.

Guest access
Schlafzimmer , Badezimmer, Küche nur mit Microwellen
( die Wohnung steht Euch alleine zur Verfügung )

Other things to note
Das Haus liegt an der Hofwiesenstrasse in welcher das Tram Nr. 11 fährt bis 0.30 h
Ansonsten gibt es keine Lärmimission.
neighborhood_overview:
Das Haus steht 400m oberhalb von Oerlikon/ Bahnhof Oerlikon. Gegenüber dem Haus hat es ein kleiner Wald mit Feuerstelle und eine TatarRennbahn zugehörig zu einem Schulhaus.
Der Waidberg ist in 5 Min. zu Fuss erreichtbar, für Vitaparcoure, Waldspaziergänge, Picknick
Das Restaurant Waid mit toller Aussicht über ganz Zürich ist bei Touristen besonders beliebt. ( Erreichbar auch per Auto oder Bus Richtung Stadtspital Waid )
Mit dem Tram Nr. 11 ( 50m vor der Tür ) kann man direkt an den Hauptbahnhof Zürich fahren, in die Züricher Bahnhofstrasse fahren, oder bis ans Bellevue bis zum Seebecken fahren ( Zürich Bürkliplatz Schiffsstation )
oder man steigt am Bucheggplatz um ( 3. Station ) und fährt mit dem Tram Nr. 15 direkt durchs schöne Limmatquai ( parallel zum Niederdorf ) bis zum See.
Wer nur ein paar Schritte gehen möchte, dem wird das öffentliche Bad Allenmoos sehr gefallen. Eines der schönsten und grössten Bäder Zürichs. ( 100m entfernt ) oder an kalten Tage

Shopping Mall
Glatt
Only a few minutes away from our apartment is one of the largest shopping malls in Switzerland. If it is cold and rainy and you don't want to go far, head there to see all the stores, eat in the food court and walk around!


Flussbad Oberer Letten
River pool. Go there for meeting young people, music, and drinks.

Kontakt hätte man eventuell mit den Nachbarn auf der anderen Seite in der Attikawohnung ,da sie jedenfalls eine Katze haben. Falls sie Haustiere mitbringen kurze Info dazu dann werde ich den Zugangs zu den Nachbarn schließen .

name: Room Klaudia
description:
Falls du gerne Piano oder Gitarre spielst, oder einfach nur auf dem Balkon chillst, ... dann bist du hier richtig. Ich begrüsse dich gerne persönlich und zeige dir die Stadt oder ein Paar guten Resdtaurants auch in Corona Zeiten.

The space
Meine Wohnung ist sauber, ich mag weisse IKEA Möbel und das Wohnzimmer ist lüftig, ... der Boden würde renoviert (Parketboden). Die Küche und das Bad sind eher antik 😉 aber sauber. Wir legen Grossen Wert auf Sauberkeit und Abfalltrenung.

Guest access
Es gibt einen gemeinsam genutzten Waschraum. Ich wünsche mir aber nicht, dass meine Gäaste die Waschmachinen benutzen. Dies kann ich für Sie erledigen.

Other things to note
Ich teile mrine Wohnung mit meinem netten Mitbewohner Haben. Auch den wirst du kennen lernen. Er hat ein separates Schlafzimmer und spricht nur Deutsch.
neighborhood_overview: Es ist ein ruhiges Ort, obwohl der Bus und Autos direkt vor dem Haus auf der Hohlstrasse fahren. Der Balkon gibt die Möglichkeit in aller Ruhe den Frühstück oder Dinner zu geniessen.
host_about:
Hallo, 

my name is Veronika, i am living and working in Switzerland since 2007 as Kindergarden teacher.

In my free time i like to dance, travel, hike...or do some sport activities. I prefere healthy self made food and like to discover myself by travelling to foreign countries. Positive open minded people are always welcome in my life/Flat.

The Best thing about Switzerland is chocolate, cheese and hiking. I hope you will enjoy your stay in this lovely small city.

name: Sunny, central and peaceful home at the river
description:
Think of it as your peaceful oasis just a short walk from the most bustling areas of Zurich with a little Japanese touch.

Our apartment is located just on the other side of the river from Limmatplatz, only 3 min by tram to the main station. The 60 m2 flat has a living room with an open kitchen, a separate bedroom, a bathroom with a hot tub as well as two balconies.

The space
As the apartment building is brand new, it offers all of the following amenities:
- Elevator
- Floor heating
- Perfect noise insulation
- Gigabit internet via Wifi or ethernet
- Projector with Apple TV and Netflix
- Vintage sound system accessible via Airplay

In case you want to stay with more than 3 people, please tell us in advance, so that we can arrange an air mattress (there is more than enough space in the apartment).

Feel free to use any kitchen appliances, spices as well as tea and coffee.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: In the immediate vicinity (2 min walk) you can find bars and restaurants next to the beautiful Limmat river, which is perfect for a refreshing swim in the summer,  as well as a bakery and a cafe for a relaxing breakfast or brunch before you hit the city. Closeby you'll find a wide range of restaurants, cafes, bars, ice cream shops, etc.
host_about:
Hey, I'm Emre and I recently started hosting on airbnb!

I'm a pretty easygoing, helpful and open guy, like meeting new people, especially from different cultures, since I have a diverse background as well (Turkish, but born in Germany, lived in Japan and currently living in Switzerland) and I would definitely appreciate having a beer or two with my future hosts :).

name: Heart Old Town 2min to river/lake -Downtown Zürich
description:
At the very heart of Zurich old town and city center, right by the iconic river banks and main tram lines, 4min walk from the lake and 10min walk to Paradeplatz and the main train station (Zurich Hauptbahnhof - HB), lies the apartment with a balcony on the courtyard, a large bedroom and a living space that can host a total of 1 to 4 people.

The space
Very center of the picturesque old town, at the center of the city with all public transportations, 4min walk to the lake and 10min walk to Paradeplatz and the main train station.

Sleeping arrangements for 1 to 4 people:
- 1 Double bed in the bedroom for 2 people
- 1 Brand new sofa bed in the living room for 2 people that can either be transformed into a comfortable double bed or 2 independent single beds.

All windows have shutters, allowing to have 100% dark in the room if needed.

Guest access
The entire apartment is available to the guest.
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to the most beautiful area of Zurich: the historical old town at the center of the city and right next to Zurich lake and the business center.
host_about: Lived, studied & worked in France, the USA, Korea, UK and Singapore! Now based in Zurich, Switzerland working in digital strategy while skiing, kite-surfing and traveling the world as much as possible. Can't wait for the next trip!

name: Zimmer mit eigenem Bad / room with own bath
description:
In meiner 200 m2 grossen Altbauwohnung mit hohen Räumen und schönen Parkettböden vermiete ich 2 Doppel mit je einem eigenen Bad .In 10 min zu Fuss erreichbar sind: See,Wald, Oper, das Kunst- und Schauspielhaus, die Uni/ETH, das Unispital.

The space
Die Groesse der Wohnung erlaubt viel Privacy . Ich lebe in alten vintage Möbeln und liebe Stimmungsvolles. Gerne serviere ich gegen Aufpreis ein Frühstück und richte mich auch nach speziellen Wünschen . Es kann auch mit Morgensonne auf dem Balkon genossen werden . Mein Hund freut sich auf Euch . Rauchen ist in der Wohnung und auf dem Balkon nicht gestattet . Ich esse gern vegan und freue mich auf Gleichgesinnte.

Guest access
Mahlzeiten die ich für Euch zubereite werden in meinem grossen Essbereich serviert . Ansonsten sind das meine Privaträume und ich bitte Euch um Respekt . Freies WLAN in der ganzen Wohnung . Jedes Gastzimmer hat ein eigenes Bad. Im Ausnahmefall kann ich 4 schlafzimmer an
neighborhood_overview: In unmittelbarer Naehe gibts nette Cafés und Restaurants, feine Lebensmittellaeden und einen huebschen Park. Das Englischviertel ist ein Quartier von gehobenen Lebensstandart.aber nicht versnobt.
host_about:
Sachensucherin und  viel Dingefinderin . Ich liebe die Natur und alles Naturbelassene , Kraftvolle und Energiespendende.. koche gerne und für viele ...mag Menschen und ihre Geschichten ..und die Situationskomik im Alltag .. und Visionen und deren Umsetzung ... 
Zu Eurer Info :   Ich antworte nur noch auf aussagekräftige Profile....bitte ausfüllen   
Mein Haus ist sehr beseelt und darum möchte ich Euch auch kennenlernen .  Danke für Euer Verständnis. 

I am an textildesigner and getting feldenkraispractitioner with an own shop and like things and stories around. i live vegan and most time ecologic . Please send me a fully profil... i like to know more about you before i host you . Thanks alot.

name: Duplex Apartment Senior
description:
These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS. If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
Senior Duplex Apartment size: 70 m²

This duplex apartment in urban chalet style creates a unique living experience on two floors. Natural materials like wood and stone combined with designer furniture and understated earthy tones give the apartment an elegant touch. On the lower floor the guests can enjoy an open living and dining area with a fully fitted kitchen, dining corner and a cozy lounge with flat screen TV. A modern bathroom with shower and double sink and a separate toilet and a cloakroom are also available. A staircase leads to the upper gallery with an open and spacious sleeping area, equipped with a comfortable double bed, flat screen TV and working desk. It also features a
neighborhood_overview:
This flagship apartment house is located in the urban area of the 3rd district of Zurich. The city center and the lake can be reached within a few minutes by public transport. The direct vicinity offers some restaurants, bars, as well as shopping possibilities. The shopping center Shilcity with numerous shops, restaurants and a cinema is just around the corner. Moreover, local recreation areas Sihl and Allmend Brunau are situated nearby.

Visit La Lup at Wolframplatz 1 in Zurich and enjoy some international specialties and delicious Romanian food. Discover our Jar Menus with authentic dishes from East to West.

For all clients of VISIONAPARTMENTS, the restaurant is open as following:

Mon – Thu: 07:30 AM – 11:30 PM
Fri: 07:30 AM – 00:30 AM
Sat: 09:00 AM – 00:30 AM
Sun: 11:00 AM – 11:00 PM
host_about: VISIONAPARTMENTS specializes in renting out stylish and furnished serviced apartments all around the world. Established in Switzerland in 1999, the company quickly grew from a start-up to Switzerland’s market leader with a global presence. Today, VISIONAPARTMENTS offers tailored temporary living solutions in over 850 business locations worldwide.

name: Idyllic country-house loft flat right in the city.
description:
Serene, charming getaway feels countryside because it's at the foot of a vineyard, beside a creek, and flanked by lush gardens. Perfect for a couple or adult with a child. 15min walk to Lake Zürich. Bus on street corner (15-min downtown.) 15min walk to trains to A/P or to the alps to ski. For Drs and medical students, close to major Swiss hospitals (conferences).

The space
Abundant nature surrounds, wonderful views form every window. Gracious upstairs flat of maisonette is light, airy and spacious, yet cosy. Queen size bed on separate platform, lounge area, desk area, ensuite bathroom with shower, TV, Netflix and wifi. Nespresso machine, if wished.

Guest access
You climb the covered wooden stairway to the entrance, then climb the spiral staircase to the flat. You can use the host's downstairs kitchen upon request, and the garden as wished. There's a washing machine and dryer in the cellar.

Other things to note
Ad
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is exclusive and elegant and with quick access to city life. Wonderful vistas overlooking entire lake to alps within 5-10min walks. Picturesque artists' studios across the creek at the foot of the beautiful vineyard - these buildings were built in the 1600's! You can walk down to the lake, stroll to Bellevue where the lake meets the river and the old town, with all its charms, rests on both sides. Take the tram/bus home. It stops virtually at the doorstep.
host_about: Originally an east coast American educated in Fine Arts at Columbia and Carnegie Mellon Universities. I've lived in Zurich for 33 years - because it's wonderful here. I've worked as an art director in design agencies for years, but instead of a cold modern interior, I've created a warm, relaxed ambiance. I love leaving work in city life to nest in this special "country house" right by a vineyard. I also wanted to create a gentle ambiance for raising my 2 children, now adult. I grew up with a creek in my PA garden. The trees and creek, birds and creatures outside my place harken back to those pastoral childhood days. People feel instantly at home, safe and relaxed here. It's especially cozy in winter. You will find a lot of good books in English and have great Netflix TV programs to watch in your preferred language.

description:
Nice & big flat in the heart of the trendy Zurich-Wiedikon area.
A tram stop is in front of the house takes you to Zurich HB (main station) and the business center within 10 and to the lake within 15 minutes. Zurich-Wiedikon train station is 200m away (direct connection to Zurich HB and Zurich-Airport).
Close to all main Highways accesses.
Very close to shopping, restaurants and bars.
One comfortable bedroom, bathroom, balcony, living room, kitchen, internet, TV. Ideal for leisure or business.

The space
You will have one big bed in the bedroom that suits two people and one comfortable inflatable airbed (140x200) with an integrated pump that inflates itself within 5min.
neighborhood_overview: There are several grocery stores right next to the apartment as well as many nice and trendy restaurants and bars. A train that takes you to the top of Uetliberg (the local Zurich mountain) is about 5min away by bus that is departing opposite the apartment.

name: Central Loft w. sauna, garden and private parking
description:
Beautiful, open plan luxury apartment, in a newly reconstructed building that once acted as a showroom, warehouse and repair site for the legendary Citroen model DS - the goddess La Déesse.

The apartment is fully fitted and has everything you need to have a relaxed stay in Zurich.

It is easy to reach by public transport, with two tram and bus stops only a 5 minute walk away. For those coming by car, a dedicated parking spot is available in the garage.

The space
The apartment is top-modern, with free 1 Gbps Wifi, Sonos speaker, a Samsung "The Frame" TV, with Apple TV, Netflix App (so you can use your own settings) and Zattoo Premium installed, a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable beds (the 200x90 cm bunk beds are also suited for adults) and a travel crib as well as a Stokke Tripp-Trapp and children's chair (Ikea Antilop).

Guests have free access to coffee and tea - a Nespresso machine and milk foam maker are at your disposal.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Zurich's third district ("Kreis 3, Alt-Wiedikon).

Kreis 3 lies to the south west of the city centre and is bordered by the river Sihl and parts of the Albis mountain range. It comprises Sihlfeld, Alt-Wiedikon and Friesenberg and is overlooked by Bühlkirche and behind this, Zurich’s “very own mountain” Uetliberg. Wiedikon became part of the city of Zürich in 1893 and it is now home to around 47,000 people.

Today, the district is mostly residential. If you wander through the streets of Kreis 3 (which I highly recommend) you’ll find numerous green spaces filled with picnicking families and school children, as well as a large number of antique stores, with some vintage clothing shops thrown in as well.

Wiedikon is home to a number of authentic and very satisfying Asian restaurants. You can find Vietnamese, Thai, Chinese, Indian and Japanese food. Mexican and Spanish cuisine is also available, as well as perennial Swiss, Italian
host_about: Hi, my name is Harm. I am a father of three wonderful kids, love to travel, love technology, love architecture, love art and design,  love fine food and wine, love skiing, hiking and other outdoor activities, love meeting interesting people across the globe.

name: Old rose Studio with a lovely view over Zurich
description:
Exklusive möbliertes Studio
Das Studio wurde 2018 vollständig saniert. Es liegt am Fusse des Uetlibergs, mit einer Traumaussicht auf die Stadt Zürich und ist gut erreichbar.

-komplett möbliert
-voll ausgestattete Kochnische mit Glaskeramik, Mikrowelle, kompl. Geschirr etc.
-eigenes Bad (Dusche/WC)
-Bettwäsche und Frottéewäsche
-Internetzugang inkl.
-Eigener Briefkasten
-Waschmaschine und Tumbler (Cash Card) im Tiefparterre
-Lift vorhanden
-Kostenloser Parkplatz vorhanden

The space
Die Einrichtung ist mit viel Liebe zum Detail gestaltet. Der Eingangsbereich ist mit einer Garderobe und Einbauschränken ausgestattet – wer gerne Ordnung hat, ist hier gut bedient. Kochnische, Essbereich und Wohnraum sind gegeneinander offen und vermitteln grosszügige Gastlichkeit.

Zusätzlicher Komfort der Studios / Appartements:

Küchenzeile: voll ausgerüstete Kochnische mit Essecke, Glaskeramikherd, Arbeitspl
neighborhood_overview:
Das Studio befindet sich am Fusse des Uetlibergs in einem Naturerholungsgebiet. Ideal um nach der Arbeit oder der Stadterkundung ab zu schalten. Joggen, Wandern, Reiten - alles ist möglich. In Gehdistanz befindet sich eine Wellnessoase. Das Spa Center verfügt über Massagen, Innen- wie auch Aussenpool, Kosmetikangebote wie auch Fitness.

Ebenfalls in der Nähe ist ein Freibad bzw. Im Winter eine grosse Eislaufanlage.

Mit der Nahegelegenen S-Bahn kann man auf den Uetliberg, den Hausberg von Zürich, fahren. Von dort oben sehen Sie über die ganze Stadt und den Zürichsee. Ein Muss für jeden Zürichaufenthalt.
host_about:
Wir sind auf die Vermietung von möblierten Wohnungen in Zürich spezialisiert. Personen und Firmen die eine möblierte Wohnung zwecks Geschäftsreise, Urlaub oder Übersiedlung suchen sind bei uns an der richtigen Adresse. 
Auf Wunsch bieten wir Ihnen auch einen Taxiservice von und zum Flughafen an. 

We are specialises in the rental of furnished apartments in Zurich. Our company is specialised in clients making businesstrips, holidays or relocating.  On request we offer a pickup service from and to the Airport.

name: moderne Unterkunft im lebhaften Stadtzentrum
description:
Meine Unterkunft ist mitten im Zentrum zwischen der Tramstation Stauffacher und Bhf. Wiedikon. Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben weil der Hauptbahnhof, die Innenstadt, der See sowie die Shoppingstrasse (Bahnhofstrasse) in Gehdistanz von rund 10min liegen. Sie ist für Paare, Freunde und Geschäftsreisende sehr gut geeignet.

The space
Wir haben zwei Katzen daher wünschen wir uns auch Tierliebende Besucher. Du wirst dich schnell in der Wohnung wohlfühlen, alles vorfinden was Sie für den alltäglichen Gebrauch benötigen sowie eine sehr gut ausgestattete Küche für schnelle Gerichte bis aufwändige Kochexperimente vorfinden. Das Bett lässt sich zu einem Doppelbett als auch als zwei Einzelbetten herrichten. Wir helfen gerne weiter mit Tipps und Tricks für einen tollen Aufenthalt!

Guest access
Wir wohnen selbst in dieser Wohnung. Das Wohnzimmer, Küche, 2 Balkone und Bad stehen einem selbstverständlich zur Mitbenutzung zur Verfügung.

Other
neighborhood_overview: Meine Nachbarschaft ist ruhig und lebhaft zu gleich. Es hat zahlreiche Restaurants und Cafes in Fussnähe. Mit den Nachbarn im Haus herrscht ein gutes Klima, welches auf gegenseitiger Toleranz aber auch Rücksicht basiert. Ein gemeinschaftliches Denken wünschen wir auch von dir =)
host_about:
Personal Description
Beny and I are peacefully, open minded, uncomplicated persons. We like the adventure and to explore the world, love traveling and to face up with new culture and make friends. We have a lot of energy that we like to share with people. Oh and one of us is pretty sarcastic but I can stop it if someone doesn't like it ;)

Interests
Love to try new food all over the world. 
Love to improve languages and learn new things. 
Love having parties and long nights, make friends and try new drinks especially beer.

description:
Located only 200 mt from the Lake, a great location for Summer, and about 12 minutes of walking distance to Bellevue.
It has a lobby in the entrance with a closet, a shiny living room with 3 big windows and a big very comfy sofa-bed, and separate kitchen and bathroom.
It's also very good communicated with different trams and buses, supermarkets are at 4 min of walking distance.

The space
The building is not modern but everything works perfectly and has a lift. Wash machine and dryer (works with coins) for common use in the cellar.

name: Lovely room in the most charming flat in Zürich :)
description:
You are renting my bedroom in our charming big, bright apartment, where I live with my flat mate Janine (31 years old). We are very easygoing and happy to host people. The lovely apartment is located very central and public transport as tram, bus or train are just right there. We have several grocery stores nearby and also nightlife is happening just next door. With public transport, we are about 10min away from Zurich main station, 8min from Zurich airport by train.

The space
Our apartment is a place where everyone just should feel welcome and at home.

For people who are sensitive to noise: Please be aware that there‘s a street right next to the house, so it might be a bit noisy sleeping with the window open.
neighborhood_overview: There are a few awesome things to do right nearby. Go for a cafe at Viadukt, you will find nice little shops there too. Some local brands of clothing, food and drinks. Have dinner at "Les Halles". It has an awesome atmosphere. If you are into live music, you should definitely check out Helsinki Club. It's my favourite place in Zurich. Great people & Music. If you are generally into live music, let us know, we have some great tipps. (You might get a discount at our place, if you are a musician ;))

Illustrator and graphic designer from Zurich, Switzerland.

name: A Jewel! Countryside vineyard setting in the city.
description:
In host's maisonette, cosy bedroom with private bath/shower downstairs. Host has upstairs loft separated by door. Beautiful 60sqm living space (full of light, high ceilings, parquet floors, ) may be shared with host who's out most of the day – living room and full kitchen. Easy public transportation at doorstep to downtown and A/P. 15min walk to the lake, train stations. Close to ZH hospitals for patient family member, or Drs and med students attending conferences. Near Arena for yoga workshops.

The space
Private, quiet, tasteful. Country house groove right in city. Trees, gardens and vineyard views surround. Originally built in the 1700s, full of character and charm, tastefully renovated, all modern conveniences. Small bedroom with single bed, private bathroom. Host has separate loft on second floor. Door separates floors for privacy. Gracious garden shared. Downstairs living area happily shared too.

Guest access
Stairs lead up to maisonet
neighborhood_overview: This is an exclusive but friendly neighborhood full of amazing 5min walks to astonishing views over the lake and the alps. The bus stopping on the corner is a dream transportation-wise. Locally famous classic Swiss restaurant at corner,  best fondue restaurant 10-minute uber-ride away. So proximity to the lake means lovely summer days. So close to trains means interesting travel. Close to many hospitals, being in a beautiful environment means a nice place to be when concerned about a patient.
host_about: Originally an east coast American educated in Fine Arts at Columbia and Carnegie Mellon Universities. I've lived in Zurich for 33 years - because it's wonderful here. I've worked as an art director in design agencies for years, but instead of a cold modern interior, I've created a warm, relaxed ambiance. I love leaving work in city life to nest in this special "country house" right by a vineyard. I also wanted to create a gentle ambiance for raising my 2 children, now adult. I grew up with a creek in my PA garden. The trees and creek, birds and creatures outside my place harken back to those pastoral childhood days. People feel instantly at home, safe and relaxed here. It's especially cozy in winter. You will find a lot of good books in English and have great Netflix TV programs to watch in your preferred language.

Comfortable 2 bedroom apartment, in the city of Zurich, just for you! Only 5 minutes walk to the Albisriederplatz, station for tram / bus, grocery stores, restaurants, bars and bakeries. With the tram no. 3. it is 15 minutes to the central station or city / old town.

host_about:
Keys'n'Fly - Airbnb Management Solution That Suits You
My name is Marc with Keys'n'Fly Vacation Rentals, a full service property management company based out of Geneva, Switzerland. My team and I strive to make every experience a seamless one, no matter where your trip may take you. As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us. 
Our beloved hosts trust us in managing their properties on their behalf and we hope you will trust us with your stay.
Please let us know how we may help you with your next trip.

name: Modern city flat next to the Botanical Garden
description:
Quiet, modern 3 rooms apartment in middle of trendy Seefeld and only 5min walk to the lake and 5min tram drive to the old town and Bellvue. The apartment is located next to a little creek, that flows between the house and the botanical garden. If you like to walk or to run in nature, you're right here - and still in the middle of Zurich. Follow the creek and end up at Grand Hotel Dolder with a stunning view.

The space
the flat has been completely renovated 3 years ago. The sleeping room (with one queensize bed) and the living room are rooms with doors and can be closed. kitchen and dining room are open and great to hang out in. there's also a little balcony that is accessable from the dining room towards the botanical garden. you can use the garden that is equipped with a grill and table.

Guest access
the apartement is yours during your stay. Only washing machine and tumbler are in the basement, but can be used almost everytime.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighbourhood with plenty of paths to walk or run in the nature - just in front of the house. The Höschgasse (Tram stop 2 and 4), where you find restaurants and bars is only 5 min walk. But it's also very close to the lake or to Bellvue, where the old town of Zurich begins and where you find the Opera house, Shopping, Bars and great restaurants..
host_about: Im from Zurich/Switzerland and live/ work part-time in Sarnen. I obviously love to travel. I have my own little communication agency (Website hidden by Airbnb) that allows me to travel or go to my house in Sarnen anytime I want. I like to leave my apartment to guests who appreciate a fully equipped (also with some cool plants) home and a perfect base to explore Zurich.

description:

The apartment is equipped with high speed fiber internet.

Public transport connections are great - there's a tram stop 50 meters from the apartment. From there, it's 15 minutes to the central train station or lake, and 30 to the airport.

name: Private Room + Bath  - 10min to Zurich Mainstation
description:
I am offering a clean, spacious and bright private room with a comfortable queen size bed (160 cm) to 1 - 2 guests.

Our home is in a quiet area with an excellent link to the bus and train system. Right behind the apartment lies the train and bus station with direct connection to:
- Zurich Mainstation (10 minutes)
- Shopping Center / Cinema (3 minutes)
- Lake Zurich (7 minutes)

Guest car park available (payable).

The space
The appartment is brand new and lies in the newest and upcoming city district called "Greencity". Therefore, you are very close to nature with river and romantic walks.

The room is spacious (ca. 15m2), quiet (towards inner courtyard side) and furnished.

Non-smoking apartment.

The large glass desk offers two LCD screens to extend your laptop display, just plug in the USB cable of the docking station. This particularly comes in handy for people who are on a business trip and
neighborhood_overview:
In the immediate vicinity of the local recreation areas along the Sihl, perfectly connected to public and private transport, with its own S-Bahn station and only a few minutes by train from the city centre: in Greencity, the city, nature and quality of life merge into a completely new neighbourhood concept.

Greencity is the first area in Switzerland to be consistently aligned with the goals of the 2000-watt society. The new quarter not only sets standards in terms of energy efficiency and environmental awareness. Greencity is also fully committed to the principles of sustainability with regard to coexistence and mobility.

A vital, urban mix of residential buildings and offices, shops, restaurants and public facilities is crucial. Greencity lies like an island between the surrounding nature and urban areas - and at the same time is always in the middle of modern life.

description:
A modern, colorful 1-bedroom apartment.
There is everything you need.

I‘m offering my apartment as I‘m not very much at home. So you will find some of my private stuff in the apartment, but don’t mind;-)

The space
There is one bedroom with a 160/200m (Boxspring) bed with a night table and a clothing rail. The room has direct access to the beautiful 30m2 balcony.

There is a fully equipped kitchen with a storage room, where you can find a washing machine.

The spacious living room with a 6 chair dining table and a huge comfortable sofa.
You’re gonna find a Sony 3-D Bravia TV with Apple TV and Bose sound system in the living room and high speed WiFi in the entire apartment.

There is a 6m2 modern bathroom with shower to share for all guests.

The apartment (Attika) is located on the 6th floor with elevator

Guest access
You will have the whole apartment and the balcony for your

Welcome and thank you for stopping by!
I have been in Zürich for 10 years (originally from Cologne, Germany).
I love being a host and enjoy going out of the way to make guests feel at home. I treat everyone like they are my friends or family. I enjoy meeting people from all walks of life and from all over the world and when guests want to hang out whether for 5min for a quick chat or cozy meal on one of their free nights, makes the airbnb experience so much fun.
Whether I host you or you host me, I`ll do my best to make sure we both come out happy;-)

Comfortable 1 bedroom apartment, in the city of Zurich, just for you! Only 5 minutes walk to the Albisriederplatz, station for tram / bus, grocery stores, restaurants, bars and bakeries. With the tram no. 3. it is 15 minutes to the central station or city / old town.

name: charming centrally located apartment
description:
a very bright and charming old building (fully renovated) apartment in the heart of bustling Zurich (close by Helvetiaplatz and a lovely Park)
The apartment ist bright and we like to keep the interior rather minimalistic.

The space
The view from the balcony (to the park) is probably one of the highlights. Also it's within walking distance to a lot of places in the city. A lot of great restaurants, bars and coffee shops are close by our home. It's a newly renovated old building apartment, with a lot of charm.

Guest access
access to one big bedroom, a spacious living room with balcony (park view), a bathroom and the kitchen
neighborhood_overview: Two blocks away from the parc, the night life quarter Langstrasse, the farmers market and a lot of great places. Very easy access to public transportation.
host_about:
That’s us- the Kernens.
A Swiss family of four (David, Michelle, Lee and Jim). 
We love our tiny apartment in the heart of Zurich, but also appreciate our mountain home in Laax a lot. 
When not working you can find us at a coffee shop, being active outside (we love sports). We are also interested in interior design and visiting other cities (such as Barçelona, which is one of our favorites). 

Our homes are kept minimalistic and eco friendly. 

David runs his own heating and sanitary company.
Michelle works part time as social media manager for a local coffee roastery, runs her own blog (since 2014) and keeps the boys busy and entertained.

We have hosted a lot of people before having kids (in Zurich and Los Angeles) and now would love to share both of our apartments again with interesting people from around the globe. Look it

Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Apotheke sowie eine öffentliche kostenpflichtige Tiefgarage befinden sich im gleichen Gebäude. host_about: Ich bin aus Zürich, aufgeschlossen, unkompliziert und freue mich auf Deinen Besuch. Arbeite als Maschineningenieur in der Nähe des Flughafens Kloten. Abgesehen von der Arbeit  beschäftige ich mich viel und gerne mit meinen beiden Töchtern (3, 6), welche 50% der Zeit bei mir sind. Ich mag Boote, Musizieren, Musik, Bands, Gleitschirmfliegen, Basteln, Zeichnen, Kochen, Programmieren, Bauen, Tauchen uvm.

* iron & i
neighborhood_overview:
Wollishofen-Kilchberg is a very green and quiet, upscale residental area and offers nice views onto the lake and the mountains.

Some of the nicest bars and restaurants you can find along the Lake Zuerich are nearby.

IBM Research Labs, Swiss Re Centre for Global Dialogue, The GDI Institute/Think Tank and also the famous LINDT chocolate factory are located here (and you can often smell a slight fragrance of chocolate in the air...)
To have space, peace, a safe neighborhood and a lot of green around is what I love most about living here.
host_about:
“It is passion that makes man live;  reason makes one only last.” 
― Nicolas Chamfort
"Durch die Leidenschaften lebt der Mensch, durch die Vernunft existiert er bloss."

This is my motto  in life and I try to live up to it as much as I can. I have traveled extensively for work and leisure and made invaluable experiences during my trips. I am passionate about wine, food, exotic herbs and plants. But nothing beats good company and great talks! My home is my castle I love and I care about. You are welcome to share and enjoy it with me.

I am an easy going, open minded person with a lot of interests.  I love reading  and I am an "old school" newspaper addict. On a Sunday morning you will most likely find me on the sofa surrounded by newspapers and magazines and well equipped with coffee and cookies to indulge in what is going on in the world. 
*******************************************************************
Note to Guests
• I enjoy meeting people and like to know who my guests are. Write a bit about yourself and your purpose of travelling. That way I not only get a better picture of you but can come up with valuable information and ideas to make your arrival and stay pleasent, convenient and memorable.
• A novel of your life story isn't necessary; just write about what you think someone meeting you for the first time would want to know.

name: Studio Premium (9912)with Zurich views
description:
Die Stadt Zürich liegt Ihnen zu Füssen. Mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln ist die Innenstadt in max 20 Minuten erreichbar. Die Busstation Zielweg liegt direkt vor der Wohnung. Unsere neuen möblierten Studios (Dezember 2018 gebaut) bestechen durch die funktionale einfache und moderne Einrichtung. WIFI Internet, TV, Nespresso Maschine werden Ihnen einen angenehmen Aufenthalt garantieren.

The space
Die neu renovierte Liegenschaft mit ihren neuen Studios (Eröffnung ende Jahr 2018) liegen am Fusse des Uetlibergs mit herrlicher Sicht über die Stadt Zürich. Die Studios verfügen über gemeinsame Waschmaschine und Tumbler (Dryer) die in einem separaten Waschraum stehen. Das Studio hat 1 grosses Bett 160/200

Guest access
Wohnung, Waschraum

Other things to note
Es gibt einen Hausabwart Vorort der während den Arbeitszeiten (08:00-17:00) für dringende Fragen zur Verfügung steht. Der Bus von Busstation Zielweg fährt ab 09:08 -
neighborhood_overview: Die Lage der Liegenschaft zeichnet sich vor allem durch seine Ruhe und ländliche Umgebung am Stadtrand von Zürich aus, dies ist ein Naherholungsgebiet auf Stadtgrund und doch hat man eine herrliche Sicht auf das Zentrum von Zürich und ist dank des öffentlichen Zürcher Verkehrsnetzes schnell in der Innenstadt.

Personen die eine möblierte Wohnung zwecks Geschäftsreise, Urlaub oder Übersiedlung suchen sind bei uns an der richtigen Adresse. 


Founded in Switzerland in 2007, “Premium Partners” specialises in the rental of furnished apartments in Switzerland.
Our company is specialised in clients making businesstrips, holidays or relocating.

name: modern studio; large terrace; quiet location
description:
A bright, modern studio in a new building (Nov 2018), with a large terrace and a great view over Zurich. Located in a quiet residential area (dead end).
In walking distance (about 5 minutes) to public transport with direct connection to the city.
A super market in 5 min. walking distance.
In summer time you will find various bathing possibilities in the area. In every season numerous hiking and jogging trails in the immediate vicinity.
host_about:
Christen verschiedener Kirchen in Zürich hatten die Vision, den Lebensabschnitt 50+gemeinsam zu gestalten. Vor diesem Hintergrund wurde 2011 die Gemeinnützige Baugenossenschaft InVia (unterwegs)  gegründet. In den folgenden Jahren wurde eine passende Liegenschaften gesucht und schliesslich war es möglich, am Neeserweg 10 in Zürich, einen Neubau zu erstellen. Im November 2018 bezogen wir unsere Wohnungen. In unserer Genossenschaft haben Menschen in verschiedenen Lebenslagen Platz. Grundwerte, Inspiration und Kraft bezieht die Kerngruppe aus dem persönlich und gemeinschaftlich gelebten christlichen Glauben. In unserer Genossenschaft sind Mitglieder willkommen, welche diese Spiritualität respektieren, ohne sie aber persönlich teilen zu müssen. Ein Studio im Haus haben wir eingeplant, damit wir sowohl eigene als auch fremde Gäste empfangen können. 

English
A few years ago people of different Christian denominations came up with the idea (some would call it a vision) to shape our lives after fifty, i.e. age 50+, together. In the light of this dream the non-profit cooperative building association "InVia" (=on the way) was founded in 2011. In the following years we looked for a suitable piece of property and we finally found one on Neeserweg in Zurich.
In November 2018 we were able to move into the apartments).
In our cooperative association there is room for different life conceptions. Our core group finds its basic values, inspiration and strength from Christian faith, lived both personally and communally. People are welcome as members as long as they respect this brand of spirituality, but they do not necessarily have to share it. We have planned a studio in the house, so that we can receive both our own and foreign guests.

Français
Il y a quelque temps, des membres de différents courants chrétiens à Zürich ont eu la vision de former ensemble leur période de vie après l’âge de cinquante ans (50+). Sur cette trame la coopérative de construction d’utilité publique à but non lucratif «InVia » (= en bonne voie) fut fondée en 2011. Dans les années suivantes nous avons cherché un bien foncier convenable et nous l’avons trouvé au Neeserweg à Zürich, où finalement l’immeuble  finit par être construit. En 2018 il nous fut possible de nous installer dans les différents appartements. Dans notre société coopérative il y a de la place pour différents styles de vie. Notre groupe nucléaire trouve ses valeurs primordiales, son inspiration et sa force dans la foi chrétienne vécue au niveau personnel aussi bien que communautaire. Dans notre coopérative de nouveaux membres sont bienvenus tant qu’ils respectent cette forme de spiritualité, sans qu’ils soient cependant forcés de la partager. 
Dans notre immeuble il y a un studio, afin que nous puissions loger des personnes, qu’ils soient connues ou inconnues.

Das Appartement ist zentral & ruhig gelegen, mit sehr guter öffentlicher Verkehrsanbindung zum Zürich HB (10 Min), Zürich Airport (24 Min), Messe (16 Min) und Fussball/ Konzert Stadion (3 Min) und Zürichsee ca.15 Min.
Das beliebte Quartier bietet vieles, unter anderem tolle Restraunts und Cafes, sowie Einkaufsmöglichkeiten.

The space
Sehr schöner heller Wohnraum mit Samsung TV mit Apple TV mit über 250 Sendern in 5 verschiedenen Sprachen und 7 Tage replay Funktion sowie 24h WLAN. Tisch zum Arbeiten oder Essen mit Freunden oder Familie. Gemütliches Sofa mit Couchtisch.

Guest access

Other things to note
Kein Lift da Haus aus Jahr 1897
neighborhood_overview: Wunderschönes Quartier mit vielen Restaurants und Cafés. Fussläufig gibt es einige Parks und Spielplätze. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten gibt es auch diverse ( Bio Markt 2 min und Coop 5 min zu Fuss zu erreichen). Das tolle im Kreis 3 ist, dass es einem nicht langweilig wird und man Orte zum entspannen findet. Es ist ruhig und belebt zu gleich.
host_about: Hej ich bin Anna und lebe seit 7 Jahren in Zürich. Mittlerweile nicht mehr alleine sondern mit meinem Mann und meinen 2 Kindern. Wir lieben es zu an neue Orte zu reisen, dabei vieles zu entdecken ob kulinarisch oder kulturell sind wir interessiert. Ich liebe es Gastgeber zu sein, meine Freunde und Familie zu bekochen und Zeit zusammen zu verbringen. Draussen sind wir viel unterwegs, am See oder zu Berg oder einfach auf einer der vielen nahegelegenen Wiesen.

name: Cosy, centrally located Room
description:
The cosy room is part of a 4,5 room apartment where my partner and I live.
Your room is furnished with a comfortable 1.40 m size bed, a small table with office chair and a place to hang your clothes.
You have an own toilet, but the shower is shared with us. There is a possibility to wash and dry your clothes and you can use our kitchen if you like.
The apartment is very centrally located but in a very quiet neighborhood. With public transport it takes only 15 minutes to the Zürich main station.

The space
I will offer a small breakfast and you can use my coffeemachine or take tea for free.

Guest access
You will have your own room and your own toilet , but share the bathroom, kitchen and living room with us.

Other things to note
The place is quiet but close to Escher-Wyss place, Hardbrücke and the city center.

There is a Publibike bike rental station 190 m away from the apartment.
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is based on the first floor in a quiet neighbourhood, but very close to bus/tram stops, small convenience shops and 15 mins away from the mainstation.
The river limmat is only 10 minutes walk away and perfect to go jogging. For more sports you can go up the hill for 20 minutes where you find a Vitaparcours (sports parcours) in the forest.

Wipkingen is a part of Zürich that changes more and more into a hip place. I recommend a typical Swiss brunch at "Kafi Schnaps" or "Restaurant Nordbrücke".

Just on the other side of the river you find the new emerging "Zürich West" with many bars, clubs, restaurants and the Prime Tower (tallest building of Zürich with restaurant/lounge on the top).
host_about:
In a previous job I was called 'The Holiday-Queen' because before holidays was after holidays. I love planning for travelling and exploring - mainly Asian countries.

At home, I just started a company and am interested in Co-Working Spaces and the Zurich startup scene.

name: small single room / kleines Einzelzimmer
description:
Schön möblierte Zimmer, Bett 90x200 cm, Bettinhalt, Kleiderschrank, Tisch, Stuhl, Tag-/Nachtvorhänge, Lavabo mit Kalt-/Warmwasser, Spiegel, Beleuchtung, Seifenspender, Abfallkorb, Kühlschrank, Rauchmelder, 2 Frottiertücher.
Zimmerreinigung mit Bettwäsche-Wechsel
Wi-Fi kostenlos
Auf jeder Etage Duschen, Toiletten, Kitchenette mit Dunstabzugshaube, Spülbecken, Mikrowelle, Wasserkocher (keine Kochutensilien), Schrankfächer, Tischen + Stühle
Waschautomat + Wäschetrockner (Münzautomat 7/24 h)
neighborhood_overview: Sehr gute, zentrale Lage in Zürich-Altstetten. Die beiden Einkaufszentren "Letzipark" und "Neumarkt Altstetten" sind in wenigen Minuten erreichbar. Viele verschiedene Ladengeschäfte sowie Restaurants in der nahen Umgebung!
host_about:
Residence Hotel Swiss - low cost housing for short or extended stays in Zurich-Altstetten.
2017 renovated and new furnished private bedrooms with 1 or 2 beds (for 1 or 2 guests only).  A neat, quiet non-smoking property. We host travelers, business people,  guests from allover the world. Any nationality, any gender (LGBT) are welcome.  A brand of MWR Holidays AG

name: Private room in luxury duplex loft with great view
description:
Luxury duplex loft for 4 people at central location in Zurich with 2 sunny balconies (one with BBQ), morning & evening sun, a double bed & inflatable luxury matress. The 70m2 loft area has an open kitchen (incl dishwasher, steamer, microwave), a toilet & an amazing view. The 2nd floor comes with a gallery space with great view, a sleeping room a projector, a shower/toilet, open bath tub & washing machine.

The loft is has 1Gbit internet, Spotify sound system in every room and a movie projector.

The space
Luxury duplex loft with 70m3 loft area (kitchen, living/dining room & toilet) and 2nd floor with gallery to work, sleeping room with projector and bathroom with shower, toilet and open bath tub. The flat has an amazing view and morning and evening sun.

Guest access

name: Schlafsofa
description: Es ist eine kleine Wohnung mit 3 Zimmern. Das Wohnzimmer ist mit einem bequemen Schlafsofa für eine oder 2 Personen eingerichtet, dort würdest du schlafen. Das dritte Zimmer ist ein Büro mit viel Platz um Yoga zu praktizieren. Das steht dir selbstverständlich auch für Sport oder Arbeit zur Verfügung. Falls die ein eigenes Zimmer wichtig ist, könnte das Bett auch in diesen Raum gestellt werden. Ein Zimmer ist mein Schlafzimmer.
neighborhood_overview: Das beste ist, dass Hallenstadion Messe nur 3 Minuten Fussmarsch entfernt liegt.  Der zweitgrösste Bahnhof Oerlikon ist 10 Minuten entfernt und bringt einem in wenigen Minuten in die Innenstadt.
host_about: After finishing my apprentaship and another business school next to my work I did 2 season in the mountains and worked in the wintertime as a sales assistant in a snowboard shop. I am active and love to do all kind of sports outside. In my first summer I visited a language school in san diego to improve my english.  Since Oktober 2015 I am working fulltime in a office in zuerich and try to make my 5weeks of vacation per year as special as possible. At least I am on a good way to safe money for my future travel goals!

name: Zimmer in Idyll. altem Haus 9. Min. vom Zentrum
description:
Kleines süsses Zimmer im Erdgeschoss des romantischen alten Hauses. Das Haus befindet sich 1 Minute von der Bahnstation, 9 Minuten bis zum Hauptbahnhof und 15 Minuten hinauf zum Uetliberg, dem schönsten Aussichtsplatz von Zürich. 5 Min. bis zum Tram 14, Bus 33 und 80.

The space
Wohnraum

Vor unserem Haus liegt die Stadt zu unseren Füssen und hinter dem Haus befindet sich eine Wiese, gleich anschliessend der Wald. Wichtig: Die Räumlichkeiten sind sehr einfach und im Vorraum und Badebereich hat es einen Betonboden. Du musst alte, einfache Häuser lieben, darum der günstige Preis!!! Neben dem Zimmer befindet sich das Badezimmer (mit Bad und Dusche sowie Waschmaschine), welches wir im Haus alle gemeinsam benutzen. Da wir in den oberen Räumen leben, sieht man sich höchstens auf dem Weg zum Badezimmer oder zur Toilette :-) . Im Zimmer gibt es eine Kaffeemaschine und in der grossen Waschküche hat es für dich einen Wasserkocher, eine Mikrowelle, einen eigenen
neighborhood_overview: Wir haben sehr nette Nachbarn.....die im Notfall sicher euch Auskunft geben können.
host_about: Ich bin spontan, geduldig und unkompliziert sowie hilfsbereit und freue mich immer neue Leute kennen zu lernen.

description:
Meine schöne Wohnung liegt mitten im Seefeld, nur wenige Gehminuten vom See entfernt und auch eine Tramhaltestelle sowie Einkaufsmöglichkeiten befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe.
Ich, André (m, 28), bin unkompliziert, offen, kommunikationsfreudig und freue mich sehr, neue Menschen aus aller Welt kennenzulernen.

The space
Das Zimmer, welches ich zur Verfügung stelle, ist ca. 15m2 gross. Die Küche, Ess-/Wohnzimmer, Bad, Toilette sowie der Balkon stehen zur Mitbenutzung zur Verfügung.

Es befinden sich zudem verschiedene Lebensmittelladen mit unterschiedlich grossem Sortiment in der Nachbarschaft (Coop, Migros) . Die Tramhaltestelle Kreuzstrasse befindet sich 1 Gehminute von der Wohnung entfernt und der Bahnhof Stadelhofen/Bellevue ist in ca. 5 Gehminuten zu erreichen.

name: Spacious apartment in Zurich's District 4
description:
Lovely and bright apartment in the heart of Zurich. Perfect for business travelers or city visitors as it is located right in the city center in the famous area of Kreis 4 directly behind the main station. 70sqm give you the opportunity to stay in a nice and modern place with many of the best restaurants and bars Zurich has to offer around.

The space
Not only is the apartment perfectly located, lovely and modern decorated it is also prepared with love and attention to detail to insure every guest feels welcome and right at home!

It includes the following
- Elevator
- double bed
- couch and TV (Netflix)
- working area with desk, chair and laptop holder
- dining table for up to 4 people
- fully equipped kitchen
- breakfast table for two
- small bathroom with shower, toilette and towels
neighborhood_overview:
District 4 it’s Zurich’s most cosmopolitan and multi-cultural district, perfect for bar-hopping and with options for partying. It offers a great variety of posh to low key bars and restaurants and the most known Langestrasse around the corner.

Even though the district is very lively, the apartment ensures a cozy and quiet environment as it is located offside the buzz.
host_about: Living in beautiful Zurich, working in fashion and travelling a lot.

name: Cosy and convenient
description: Unser Haus liegt nahe beim Zentrum von Zürich und dem Hauptbahnhof (15 Min. ) und ist trotzdem ruhig. Tram und Bus sind gleich in der Nähe. Es gibt zwei Zimmer, die je einzeln oder zu zweit bewohnt werden können, sowie  Küche und Bad.
host_about:
Ich bin Bernadette und wohne mit meinem Mann und drei erwachsenen Kindern in einem ruhigen aber belebten Quartiert in Zürich. Hier bewohnen wir ein Haus mit drei Wohnungen und haben Platz genug, Dich zu beherbergen. 
Als Familie sind wir viel gereist und haben immer wieder unkomplizierte Gastfreundschaft erlebt. Wir freuen uns, wenn die Welt zu uns kommt. 

Die ganze Familien kennt die Stadt Zürich gut. Wir  geben gerne Tipps im Bereich Ausgang, Kultur, Sport und Fun. Wer keine Tipps braucht ... auch ok.

name: ♥ Zurich City - Modern room with private Bathroom
description:
Im renting out a room in Zurich City. The modern appartment is very spacious 110m2 and you will have your own room and your own bathroom too.

The room is good for 1-2 peopole. Also you will have Access to WIFI, if you like you can wash clothes or use the kitchen.. also I have two balconys.

There is a Supermarket right next to the building which is useful. And if you want to explore the City you have a tram Station right outside. Or just go by foot or by bike as Zurich is not a big town.

The space
The Apartment is a shared flat with myself. The Living is quite big and spacious. I have 2 balconys, a TV etc..

If you like to cook feel free to use the kitchen. There should be everything you need.

Guest access
You are able to have access to everything :-)

Other things to note
Me I am 33 (male), very open-minded, flexible and social. I would be happy to meet you at my home.

name: Charming private room in Seefeld
description:
Charming and well lit room in the heart of Seefeld. 10 mins walking from Tiefenbrunnen station and 2 mins walking to trams 2 and 4 which can take you to the city center in about 10 minutes.

The China Garden and the Lake are 5 minutes away walking from the property.

Seefeld is a great and easy going place in Zürich. Many small bars and restaurants are along the area, and the main city attractions are only 10 minutes away by tram.

The space
The room is modern, cozy and well lit. At the same time you will have access to the bathroom, living room and kitchen so that you can feel right at home.

Guest access
All the areas of the flat are for you to use. Including the washing machine and dryer!

Other things to note
We have a beautiful English Bulldog, extremely friendly and playful yet quiet and independent.

name: Schöne Ferienwohnung im Grünen, unweit vom Zentrum
description:
Wir bieten Euch eine gemütliche, ruhige und gut gelegene Ferienwohnung - ideal eingerichtet, ob für Reisen mit Kind oder einem romantischen Urlaub zu zweit. Die schnelle Anbindung an den Flughafen, öffentlichen Verkehr und die unmittelbare Nähe zur Natur am Züriberg machen die Lage unschlagbar! Ihr bewohnt die gesamte Wohnung mit grossem Bad allein. Die Wohnung ist ausgelegt für 1 bis max. 4 Personen (1 Doppelbett, 1 Schlafcouch). Waschmaschine und Trockenraum stehen gegen Aufpreis zur Verfügung

The space
Wir bewohnen selbst mit Kleinkind die obersten Etagen, falls Kindergeräusche euch nicht stören, freuen wir uns auf nette Gäste. Die gesamte Wohnung ist rauchfrei, WLAN ist frei zugänglich. Die Ferienwohnung befindet sich im Erdgeschoss und das Bad mit grossem Fenster im Souterrain.
neighborhood_overview: Die unmittelbare Nähe zum Schwamendingerplatz bietet perfekte Anbindung zum Central, in die Altstadt oder ins urbane Oerlikon. Fussläufig befindet sich der Wald am Züriberg und die Gaststätte Ziegelhütte.

name: A 2 paradas del centro+Wifi+cerca Aeropuerto
description:
Un entorno verde y muy bien comunicado, cerca tenemos para de tranvías y de trenes y estamos cerca del centro de Zurich y muy bien comunicados con el aeropuerto. Es una zona residencial tranquila, apto para trabajadores y familias. Me considero afortunada de vivir aquí :)

The space
La habitación es muy tranquila, de noche no se oye ningún ruido y te permite descansar.
El baño es amplio y está prácticamente a tu disposición, cuando tenemos invitados nosotros usamos el otro baño.
Somos una familia con 3 niños (menores de 10 años). Nos gusta hacer actividades fuera de casa cuando el tiempo es bueno, sobre todo jugar al fútbol y patinar. En casa jugamos mucho con el lego, los coches y pintamos. Hablamos varios idiomas y estamos habituados a viajar. :)

Guest access
Terraza

host_about:
Hello, I am Cristina from Seville - Spain, I am around 40 and I have 3 kids, currently I live in Switzerland but I've been living in lots of different countries. Love reading, traveling, meeting people, making photos.... Everything has to do with traveling really.
And here I am, ready for my next trip and offering some amazing apartments in great cities. 
See you around!?

description:
Cosy, contemporary furnished private room full of karma in a spacious apartment right at the heart of the bustling city of Zurich. Situated less than 10 minutes walk to the lake, the Bahnhofstrasse shopping district. It comes with a private bathroom and a shared kitchen with complimentary Nespresso. Parking upon request.

The space
I usually live there together with my son (4 years old). He's curious but far from being intrusive...;)

The entire apartment is around 160sqm / 1770sqft - besides their bedroom / bathroom, guests are welcome to use the common areas, such as living room, dining room, the spacious balcony with BBQ grill as well as the washing machine / dryer in the pantry.

description:

Our cleaning service with two week housekeeping and linen change (towels and sheets) is included in the rental price for all apartments, including waste disposal and final cleaning. Free WiFi All our apartments offer free business WiFi connectivity with 24-hour Internet access.

Other things to note
Garbage Disposal in the city of Zurich

In the city of Zurich it is required to purchase official bin bags to dispose of your household trash. In Zurich they are known as "Züri-Sacks" and can be purchased in all supermarkets (they are usually not out on the shelves so make sure to ask at the cashier's desk). These bags are NOT for recyclables. Compost, PET bottles, glass, carton, paper, aluminium cans, batteries and other toxic waste are disposed of separately to hous

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is close to basically everything you need in Zurich: Main station (10 minute walk), airport (25 minutes by public transport), the lake (2.5km) and the trendy Zurich West, also known as Kreis 5/Langstrasse. The Apartment is in Zurich-Hongg, an upscale neighborhood, 12 Min from city center by tram (number 13) or bus (number 46) [frequency every 6 to 12 minutes depending on time of day]. Great city view from balcony. Tram / Bus stop is within 100 feet (30m). Simple elegant furnishings. Dishwasher / Oven / Microwave / Toaster in kitchen. Broadband internet: Wifi and wired. Monitor/USBKeyboard available on request to connect laptop. [Reserved underground parking available for CHF 10 per day]

Guest access
Laundry room on ground floor with washers and dryers.
neighborhood_overview: Shopping/Groceries/DrugStore at Meierhofplatz about 250m.
host_about:
Scientist (PhD theoretical Physics)
Citizen of Switzerland and USA & Overseas Citizen of India

name: Am Puls von Zürich, Apart. 06
description:
Liebe Gäste
In einer komplett renovierten Liegenschaft, halten wir für Sie zwei Zimmer mit hohen Ausbaustandard frei. Das weitere finden Sie in einem separaten Inserat. Gerne heissen wir Feriengäste und Kurzaufenthalter willkommen. Die Liegenschaft liegt im Stadtkern von Zürich und befindet sich in nur fünf Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt. Jedes Apartment verfügt über einen Zentralen Wifi Zugang, so das Sie während Ihres Aufenthaltes Online sein können.

Wir freuen uns auf Ihren Besuch

The space
Der Wohnraum bietet alles was es brauch. Sie verfügen über ein Bett eine Kochnische und ein Badezimmer zur alleinigen Benutzung. Im Untergeschoss stehen bei Bedarf eine Waschmaschine und ein Trockner für Ihre Wäsche zu Verfügung.

Other things to note
Kein lift Treppenlaufen erforderlich
neighborhood_overview: Bei uns bist du genau richtig um Zürich in all seinen Fassten zu erleben. Im Erdgeschoss befindet sich eine Bar gegenüber ist ein Kino. Restaurants in der nähe lassen keine wünsche offen. Die Ausgangsmeile ist in fünf Minuten erreichbar.

name: Beautiful City Home
description:
A beautiful fully equipped city home with garden and terrace (!) as well as high quality fitout and furniture - fast wifi is ideal for your business and leisure trips

The space
Our beautiful home was recently renovated completely with a high end fit out and beautiful, high quality furnishing. The terrace is furnished with a dining table and chairs, a parasol and ambience lighting for the summer evenings. There is even a gas bbq to make your evenings perfect!

On the ground floor, you will find the wardrobe and toilet, open dining area and living room, as well as the kitchen that is fully equipped with
- dish washer
- oven
- microwave
- induction stove
- coffee machine etc etc.

On the first floor, you will find the first bedroom as well as the bathroom with bathtub/shower & rainshower). Upon request, a fully equipped baby's bedroom can be opened (baby bed, changing table).

On the last floor, you will
neighborhood_overview: This beautiful corner in Zurich is quiet, but in a short distance to all conveniences and the city center. A lot of families live around here and it is very safe. There are a number of recommended restaurants in the area that we can give you. There is a convenience store (Denner) within 200meters and larger supermarkets in proximity as well. if you walk up a little, there is a beautiful viewpoint (ideal for aperos) and a park close by as well.
host_about:
We are a young family with a French and Swiss background, who are often travelling for work and leisure. We both have a hotel management background and enjoy beautiful spots around the world. 

We are very clean and look after rental spaces as though it was our own, and do expect guests to do the same at our house. 

We love food and cooking as well as many other activities.

name: Lovely 1 bedroom flat (10 min from Zurich HB)
description:
Hi everyone! Welcome to my cozy and light flushed apartment! Every detail is supposed to make you feel at home! There is enough space for working from home or for a nice dinner. The kitchen is fully equipped and happy if you use it to make yummy meals! The apartment is located close to the tram stop Berninaplatz (2 min). Public transport connections are great. You reach the city centre including the main train station within 10 min. and the train station Oerlikon within 2-3 min. See you soon!

The space
Feel free to chill out, spend a cozy evening in the apartment, or if you're here for business, I'm sure you'll feel comfortable working from home. Enjoy the afternoon sun from the balcony or taking a bubbly bath. Whatever you do, feel at home!

Guest access
The whole apartment is accessible to you! Also feel free to do your laundry in the common washing area.
neighborhood_overview: You have everything close by: grocery stores, pharmacy, post office just 1-2 tram/bus stops away, they also can be reached by foot (max. 10 min.). There is a public outdoor swimming pool just 5-10 walking minutes away, it's open throughout the summer months and the adult entry fee costs 8 Fr.  You can reach the night life scene within 10-15 minutes by tram. There are also several nice cafés and restaurants in both tram directions, also all in walking distance. You'll find a small shopping centre (restaurants, grocery store, atm) and a bakery just around the corner and down the street (at the Berninaplatz tram station). Down the street you'll find an asian restaurant. There are also several parks in the area, the biggest (and probably nicest) one being at "Irchel", where the university is also located. The airport is just 15 minutes away from Berninaplatz (tram 10) or 4 minutes away from the Oerlikon train station (several trains). If you need any specific info, feel free to ask me.
host_about: Hi, I'm Rosie, a student living in Zurich.. I like travelling a lot, meaning that I rent my apartment when I'm gone and book other airbnb apartments when travelling! :-)

name: ColorStreet Cosy Flat
description:
Super bright one bedroom flat in the heart of the nicest area of Zurich: Seefeld is on the Gold Coast, the sunniest area. The flat is located in a beautiful building, 2min walk from the lake, 5min from the Bellevue opera and 15min from the famous Bahnhofstrasse and Paradeplatz (city center and shopping central)

The space
The flat has a lot of light thanks to the huge windows. It is very quiet and perfect to rest. The bed is super comfy (matress from 'Dreams' in London) and will let you have a wonderful sleep. The HD TV is great for a stay at home and has a lot of programs available for you to use

Guest access
Everything

Other things to note
My belongings are in the flat, you can use the toilettries at your best convenience but please leave the rest in place. Ideally please remove the bedsheet and the leave the used towels on the floor :)
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and extremely nice.  The lake and its amneties (the famous Badi) are located very nearby (yes you can swim in the lake!!)

name: Sunny bright apartment at Zurich Niederdorf
description:
The bright apartment is located in the middle of the beautiful Niederdorf, 10 minutes walk from the main train station. All shops for daily needs and numerous restaurants and bars are in the immediate vicinity.

The studio is furnished to a high standard and has an Internet-enabled TV, Apple TV and Wi-Fi.
There is a fully equipped kitchenette which allows you to spend the evening at home and cook a good dinner after a long day of work or shopping.

The space
The place is perfect for a stay in Zurich. It’s directly in the old part of Zurich‘s city center and all sights are in walking distance.
In summertime you could walk to the lake and swim or just lay in the sun at the river close by.

Guest access
If you want to do laundry during your stay, please let me know before your check-in.
In the basement there is a shared laundry room, which can be used with a special cash card. I like to provide this money card. Currently
neighborhood_overview:
If you go out the front door you are already in the action.
On the narrow shopping street, which leads with the winding streets directly at the house, you can stroll to the Opera House and it’s beautiful square and from there to the lake.
Maybe you’ll go on a boat there and take a little round trip on the lake, or just walk the river on the other side and enjoy the view of the surrounding sights.

name: Zürich: Zimmer in Atelierwohnung im Grünen
description:
Das Nichtraucher!!-Zimmer (Baujahr 2018) ist Bestandteil meiner schönen neuen 4-Zimmer-Atelierwohnung im Minergie-Standard. Es verfügt über eigenen TV, Kühlschrank, Kaffeemaschine, Wasserkocher, Internet-Anschluss (Kabel und WI-FI), . Eigene Dusche mit Lavabo, separates WC. Bett 120 x 210 cm.
Schöner Gartensitzplatz. Bett-/Frottéewäsche und Reinigung im Preis inbegriffen.
Einstellplatz in Tiefgarage CHF 8.00/Tag wenn frei.

The space
Das Nichtraucherzimmer ist hell, neutral und modern eingerichtet. Zwar nicht sehr gross aber 3.55 m hoch (Atelierteil). Dusche/Lavabo gleich nebenan. Das Bett ist 120/210 cm. Für zierliche Personen ev. Platz für Zwei, vorher anfragen.
neighborhood_overview:
Herrliches Naturerholungsgebiet Katzensee. Alter, historischer Dorfkern 2 Gehminuten. Zum Katzensee 10 Gehminuten. Bademöglichkeit. Unweit von ETH Hönggerberg.
Wanderwege vor dem Haus. Migros und Coop ca 5 Gehminuten entfernt. Tolle Gegend zum Velofahren. Gute Zug/Bus-Verbindung ins Stadtzentrum.
host_about: Ich lebe sehr gerne in Zürich.  Ascona und Umgebung ist meine zweite Heimat und ist wunderbar zum Relaxen und Wandern. Gerne bin ich auch in Arosa, das auch im Sommer viel zu bieten hat. In Ascona und Arosa habe ich seit über 20 Jahren  kleine Pied-à-terres, welche ich neu versuchsweise ebenfalls vermiete.

name: Homeoffice Stadtwohnung mit Parkplatz und Balkon
description:
Charmante Wohnung "TURICUM" - mit Balkon und inklusive Parkplatz auf Privatgrundstück! Sie ist für Ferienreisende, wie aber auch Geschäftsleute bestens geeignet. In 8 Minuten sind Sie im Stadtzentrum oder in 20 Minuten am Flughafen Zürich Kloten. Dennoch liegt die Wohnung an einer sehr ruhigen Lage, nahe bei diversen Erholungsgebieten.
Bitte beachten Sie auch meine zweite Wohnung "Helvetia" im selben Haus.

The space
Diese charmante Wohnung haben Sie für sich allein und ist der perfekte Host um Zürich; sogar die gesamte Schweiz zu erkunden. Die Unterkunft liegt im trendigen Quartier Wipkingen, an einer sehr ruhigen Strasse. Bus- sowie Tramstationen sind in 2 Minuten zu Fuss zu erreichen. Von dort sind es nur ein paar weitere Minuten bis ins Stadtzentrum. Vom Flughafen kommend sind es 7 Minuten Fahrzeit mit der S-Bahn und nur zwei Haltestellen bis zum Bahnhof Wipkingen. Nicht nur das Nachtleben, Konzerte und Veranstaltungen jeglicher Art sind schnell zu erreic
neighborhood_overview: Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind in ein paar Minuten zu Fuss zu erreichen. Verschiedene Restaurants sind in der Nähe und die beste Aussicht auf Zürich geniesst man vom Restaurant "DIE WAID", das in ein paar Gehminuten erreichbar ist. Diverse Unterlagen,  Reiseführer und Vorschläge liegen in der Wohnung auf. Sehr gerne helfe ich auch persönlich bei der Ausflugsplanung.
host_about:
Das Reisen und das damit verbundene Kennenlernen von Menschen unterschiedlichster Kulturen ist eine meiner Leidenschaften.
Mein Credo fürs Leben: Die Bereitschaft jeden Tag dazu zu lernen, Ehre und Respekt. Genau so versuche ich als Gast und als Gastgeber zu sein.

name: Vegan friendly PR close lake and 10min mainstation
description:
Welcome to my listing! If you are looking for a location that is in a lovely area but still central (tram stops right in front of the house) and 3 minutes from the lake - this is the perfect spot for you!

My place can offer you great add-ons, if you are:
- vegan -> I have all basics/spices to cook
- yoga/meditation -> can provide mat and cushions
- triathlon -> I have an indoor bike roll

The space
I am Martina, I work in IT, I am vegan and I do triathlon (70.3 Ironman).
For a limited time I have a spare room that I want to offer to interesting guests from around the world.
I love travelling and learning about new cultures & things - that's why I am excited to be a host for national & international guests.

The flat:
2 bedroom flat + living room/bath/kitchen and a small balcony (for smokers) in an old beautiful jugendstil building 3 mins walk from the lake.
As the building is old, it is not as sound-proof
neighborhood_overview:
The area has grocery shops nearby and a bakery in the same building. As I do not have a coffee machine, that's the place to get one.
On the opposite side you will find a greek restaurant and around the corner there's a mexican and an italian restaurant.
I can give you more recommendations upon your arrival.

name: Wohlfühlen mit Seeblick
description:
Schlafen, Aufwachen und Wohnen bei gigantischen Zürich Seeblick. Ich selbst wohne in der Wohnung und meine Gäste teilen sich mit mir meine Wohnung. Das riesige Wohnzimmer mit Seeblick ist das Schlafzimmer für die Gäste. Dort liegen zwei hochwertige Matratzen zum Schlafen bereit. Badezimmer, Küche werden gemeinsam genutzt.

Die Wohnung befindet sich im oberen OG und ist nur über das Treppenhaus erreichbar.

Alle die bisher hier waren, haben die Zeit genossen und sich wohlgefühlt.

Guest access
Meine Gäste haben zu allen Bereichen/ Räumen in der Wohnung Zugang.

Other things to note
Please take off your shoes before you enter.

name: Fairy-Tale Apartment next to the Opera & Bellevue
description:
Cosy apartment with wooden roof elements. An oasis of tranquility in the middle of the city. Walking distance to the lake of Zurich and the Opera.
Caution: Although the site is free of traffic noise, the nearby church bells might be an annoyance. Please read details beneath (section “Other things to note”)

The space
The entire apartment is at your disposal. It’s charm is due to the self made renovation it has gone through 2016.

Most of the interiors are either handmade originals (especially the 2.60 meter long pear wood table as well as the paintings and the sculptures) or catches at second hand stores.

The Japanese made classical guitar may be used for playing music. Please handle with care.

Guest access
You may take the small tables and the small stools (one round, one rectangular, both with bamboo or yarn) in front of the house. Please, take them in again when leaving.

If needed, you may use the wash
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is not as busy as other parts of Zurich but is as near as it gets to the city and many sightseeing highlights.

Being situated in a courtyard, the house is surrounded almost entirely by taller buildings which keep you safe of any traffic noise coming from the streets. Nevertheless, daylight is never short because the west front of the house is facing an open space that separates the house from the St. Anton Church.
host_about: Teacher, olive oil producer and music lover trying to keep the work-life balance in good shape all over the year while cooking for friends, travelling to distant and near places and having interesting discussions with people.

name: Sunny & Quiet Apartment, 20min from City center
description:
We offer a very nice, sunny and modern apartment in Zurich, inside a 3 family house recently renovated. It's on a very quiet location in a blind street at the golden coast of Zurich (Witikon). The bus stop that leads from and to the main station (Zurich HB) is 250m away. ALDI, Denner & Migros supermarkets are 280m away in a shopping mall and if you like jogging or nature, the forest it's at the end of the street.

The space
The apartment was recently renovated, we have a modern induction kitchen and a bathroom with a Geberit toiled/bidet plus a jacuzzi type bathtub for your enjoinment. There are two balconies, one looking forward to the lake and the other at the back of the kitchen. We have king beds(180x200cm) in all rooms and one of them can be split to become two single beds according to your requirements (please ask beforehand). There is a fully equipped kitchen at your disposal. The living room has a smart TV, also a dining table for 6 persons.
neighborhood_overview:
We are in Witikon one of the most exclusive neighbourhoods in Zurich at the east side of the Lake, better known as the Golden Coast, because the sun reaches all year long. Close we have the Zurich Zoo and the Dolder Bath & Ice Skating. The woods are just at the end of the street and three supermarkets (ALDI, Migros and Denner) are on a shopping mall 280 meters away from the house.

The east side of the lake offers several distractions if you like art and culture, close is The Kunsthaus (Art Museum), The Bellerive Museum, The Tram Museum, The Corbusier House, The China Garden, the Opera House and of course many spots at the lake where you can take a swim or go for a picnic in summer.
host_about: We are Jürg and Valeria, we like to travel a around the world and know very well what are the amenities everybody seeks on vacation rental. We like to pay attention to details and try our best to keep the apartments clean and tidy for our guests. We are looking forward to be your host and give you a pleasant stay.

host_about: Hi, ich bin Christa, Mutter 3er Kinder und 3er Enkelkinder. Ich vermiete 3 WG-Zimmer in einer EG-Wohnung im Herzen ZH Örlikon. Mi t2 Badezimmern (1 mit Dusche/WC, 1 x Badewanne/WC) fehlt es den Gästen an nichts. Das Obergeschoss besteht aus dem Wohn/Essbereich, Bad plus einer Terrasse. Independent dormitory for a good deep sleep with a double bed a

- Italian: cheap and good pizza in Etna at HardPlatz 5min walk and amazing pizza and Italian food in Mama Leone 12 min walk
- Kebab in New Point in Albisrieder Platz 10 min walk
- Eu/swiss, Schlachthof Altstetten, 3min walk
