name: Room: 1★Your downtown base for tourism + business★
description:
Your private bedroom is located in a old beautiful and cozy apartment in the center of Zurich on one of the most famous streets in Switzerland: Langstrasse. You are just minutes from central station and just a few meters from the city's nightlife in the midst of clubs, bars, restaurants, shops and also relaxing green areas. Zürich international airport can be reached in half an hour with public transport. There is often the opportunity to check in earlier or later. Just send me an inquiry.

The space
A compliment which I always hear from guests, that the accommodation is very well located. It is located just a few minutes from Zurich main train station (Zürich HB), from which you can easily reach Zurich International Airport ZRH. My accommodation is ideal for tourists who want to visit our beautiful city of Zurich as you can reach many attractions and the old town on foot very quickly. Even party people who only come to Zurich for the weekend or for a concert are
neighborhood_overview:
Langstrasse is Zurich's most colorful and varied district. You can savor international specialties and enjoy multi-cultural shopping options during the day here, while the street converts into Zurich's nightlife district at night. One bar after another, popular clubs and if you get hungry from partying a lot, there's plenty of food available from the many take-aways and 24-hour shops. Langstrasse never sleeps and has progressed from a former red-light district into one of the most popular districts in the city. This is also thanks to the many young designers and restaurant owners, who have upgraded the district over the past years. (Source: Website Zurich tourism)

The apartment is located in one of the city's most popular locations: the so called Langstrassenquartier. The Langstrasse (which means long street) is one of the most colorful addresses here in Zurich. The Swiss Army used to be stationed here in large barracks which still exists today and are only minutes from the

name: Villa Allegra Studio - Bohemian chic in Zurich
description:
Located half way above Zurich in the mansions district, Villa Allegra is an old lady build in 1907 in a typical Swiss mountain chalet style. It’s situated, not far from the city center by foot, public transport or taxi and yet set in beautiful natural green surroundings with open views. The studio with about 30 sqm of space is available to you with a kitchenette, that can host up to 2 adults. The house is divided in 3 units and 2 are offered in AirBnB.

The space
This villa has its own charm and definitely is one of a kind. Living in almost the heart of the city but still be in a chalet-like home is pure luxury.

The studio apartment with small cooking facility and a big bathroom is on the garden level. It has its own patio outside with a table to enjoy your meals. It fits two persons on 30 sqm

Guest access
The garden area in front of the house and the pergola are private and not shared with guests of the Airbnb.

Othe
neighborhood_overview: My personal tips and guide is set up for you to see in my profile. Many known places for sure some secrets coming from me as a local Zurich habitant. But nevertheless this location is very close to the lake and Bellevue, as it is a jump away from the university campus and ETH. Zurich is a little big city, but for main sightseeing you are quite fast everywhere in town. My favorite around the corner the Bohemia Restaurant at the Kreuzplatz!
host_about:
We are are a young family of four, two school-girls, my husband, me and three bunnies named Frida, Sugar & Armstrong .

We love to travel ourselves and enjoy being adventures and learning about new things, cultures and habits while we are abroad. Biggest love is Paris and New York; Tel Aviv has been a regular and can't be missed at least once a year, the food is divine! Actually bohemian-chic and boutique hotels are the places you would find us most. We appreciate the special gems around the globe.

At our home we are happy to share any inside tips with our guests, but of course are respecting the privacy of your stay. For that reason we're also expecting the privat area of ours to be valued.

My husband and I own a film production company and work with our team from the villa. Our big passion is film, has been always and still fascinates us every day. 

Cooking and hosting is another big love of mine, but the biggest is my family, for me I enjoy having quality time with them. Lucky us, the family even expands to a great group of dear friends, so our life is blessed with lot's of good energy and fine people.

Since we acquired the villa a few years ago, another joy finds its way into our environment; I absolutely love to decorate and interior design spaces. In little steps we've been renovating the house, giving it back it's old beauty. Amazing how it's changing step by step. Sharing it with guests is great. 

I am so curious about life and who we are in ourselves, I love the journey day by day!

name: Villa Allegra 2BR - Bohemian chic in Zurich
description:
Located half way above Zurich in the mansions district, Villa Allegra is an old lady build in 1907 in a typical Swiss mountain chalet style.

It’s situated, not far from the city center by foot, public transport or taxi and yet set in beautiful natural green surroundings with open views.

2BR is a lovely charming 3 room apartment with about 70 sqm of space available that can host up to 4 adults. It has a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher. A table at the entrance with a patio can be used.

The space
The apartment has two bedrooms that each hold double beds, the beds can be separated and rearranged. One of the bedrooms which is bigger, hold two lounge seats and a TV with Apple TV Box incl. Netflix. Please be aware, that there is not a separate living room situation. You will find hang out room within the big bedroom or the live-in kitchen.

A big well equipped kitchen with a table for four together with a bath room with tub and sho
neighborhood_overview:
It is one of the exclusive residential area of Zurich called the "Sonnenberg" (sunny hill) overlooking the city.

A 15 minutes walk will take you to Bellevue, the lake and downtown.

Going up the hill will take you very fast to the lovely city forest and a great view point to even get a better view of our city.

Other then that, around us many old houses, a church nearby - kind of secluded but still in the middle of it. Please be aware, it is a city after all - not New York with crazy noise but not Zen-Silence like in the wilderness either!
host_about:
We are are a young family of four, two school-girls, my husband, me and three bunnies named Frida, Sugar & Armstrong .

We love to travel ourselves and enjoy being adventures and learning about new things, cultures and habits while we are abroad. Biggest love is Paris and New York; Tel Aviv has been a regular and can't be missed at least once a year, the food is divine! Actually bohemian-chic and boutique hotels are the places you would find us most. We appreciate the special gems around the globe.

At our home we are happy to share any inside tips with our guests, but of course are respecting the privacy of your stay. For that reason we're also expecting the privat area of ours to be valued.

My husband and I own a film production company and work with our team from the villa. Our big passion is film, has been always and still fascinates us every day. 

Cooking and hosting is another big love of mine, but the biggest is my family, for me I enjoy having quality time with them. Lucky us, the family even expands to a great group of dear friends, so our life is blessed with lot's of good energy and fine people.

Since we acquired the villa a few years ago, another joy finds its way into our environment; I absolutely love to decorate and interior design spaces. In little steps we've been renovating the house, giving it back it's old beauty. Amazing how it's changing step by step. Sharing it with guests is great. 

I am so curious about life and who we are in ourselves, I love the journey day by day!

name: Downtown Exclusive 2-BR Apartment with Terrace
description:
Just less than 1 km from Bahnhofstrasse and a 12-minute walk from Paradeplatz and featuring free WiFi, this newly refurbished 2BR apartment is centrally located and well connected by public transport.

Charming & safe neighbourhood, with restaurants, bars, swiss bakery, shops and supermarkets all closeby. The apartment has an unblocked view to the park and enjoys full privacy.

A spacious 40 sq. m outdoor terrace (very rare in the city centre) with dining table for 8 & two sun beds awaits you.

The space
The apartment is ideal for up to 5 persons - a double bed plus a sofa bed in the master bedroom and 2 single beds in the second bedroom.

The apartment is modern and comfortable for a family, a couple, group of friends, or business traveller.

Kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, oven, refrigerator, Nespresso coffee maker, electric kettle, microwave, toaster, cooking utensils and a full set of cutlery and plates.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is just round the corner from Stauffacher, and close to Zurich’s vibrant central district. Surrounded by restaurants, shops and services, this neighbourhood is safe and has plenty to offer.

With many popular restaurants just right next door (Samurai II Japanese, Mythos Greek, Molino Italian, Le Cedre Lebanese, St. Jakob Bakery & Café etc.) and a mini supermarket just one minute walk away, you are well served in the area.

For those who like to keep active, NON STOP GYM is right across the road and Hallenbad City Indoor Swimming Pool is within five minutes of the apartment, while nearby Kasernenareal Park is perfect for a lunchtime stroll.

And if you’re keen to soak up some culture, the Kantonspolizei Zürich Kriminalmuseum and Haus Konstruktiv modern art museum are all a short walk away.
host_about: Hi there! I am working in real estate & hospitality businesses and enjoy meeting new people from all over the world. Our company COSMPOPOLITAN APARTMENTS is offering serviced apartments with style. Looking for a fab place to stay? You've found it! :-)

name: 1,5 Zimmer Wohnung in Zh, hell, grün und zentral
description:
Biete schön renovierte 1,5 Zimmerwohnung (35 qm), direkt am Wald und mit Velo/ öffentliche Verkehrsmittel nur 25 min von der Innenstadt und 15 min zu den hippen Stadtteilen Kreis 4 und 5 entfernt. Sie verfügt über einen grosse Terasse und einen eigenen Tiefgaragenparkplatz. Neben der Wohnung befindet sich eine Waschküche zum Wäschewaschen.

The space
Ihr wohnt in einer privaten Wohnung, nämlich in meiner :-). 35 liebevoll eingerichtete qm empfangen euch mitten im Grünen. Wanderweg zum Ütliberg startet fast vor der Tür. Zum Letzistadium ( Konzerte) sind es 10 min mit dem Velo, ca 15 min mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln.

Guest access
Ihr habt meine Wohnung für euch allein. Im Haus ist auch eine Sauna, die über einen Geldautomat beheizt wird. Mit 5 CHF könnt ihr je nach Temperatur zwischen 1-1,5 h die Sauna nutzen. Im Badezimmer im Regal findet ihr Handtücher. Eine Waschküche mit Waschmaschine befindet sich auch im Haus.
Küche: Zum K
neighborhood_overview:
In der Nähe meiner Wohnung ist der Lindenplatz mit vielen Geschäften, Cafes und Restaurants.
Der Wald mit vielen Wanderwegen wie z. B. zum Ütliberg, ist in 2 min zu Fuss erreichbar. Ich wohne direkt an der Sportanlage Buchlern mit Fussballplätzen, Tennisplätzen und vielem mehr. Die Schwimmhalle Altstetten ist ca. 10 min zu Fuss erreichbar. Dort gibt es auch eine Sauna und einen Wellnessbereich. Das Letzi Stadium, wo oft Konzerte stattfinden ist in 10 min mit Velo und ca. 15 min mit dem öffentlichen Verkehr erreichbar. Auch die Werdinsel (Baden in der Limmat) ist ca. 10 min (Velo) / 15 min (öffentlicher Verkehr) erreichbar.
host_about:
Namaste :-). My name is Dani. Currently I live in Zürich, Switzerland, part time in Barcelona. But I was born in the east part of Germany, near Berlin. I m fluent in german and english. At the moment I m learning spanish. 

I m a lifetime student, buddhist, globetrotter, nurse and a health coach. Funny, thoughtful, non-smoker, vegetarian. 

Lover of/ interested in: nature, trekking, swimming (esp open water & long distance) , mountains, meditation, Wim Hof method, urban gardening, tiny house projects, buddhism, cinema, traveling, discover other cultures, photography, sharing economy, effective altruism, phytotherapy, poetry slam...and a lot more. 

Let's share experiences and learn from each other :-).

name: Le Bijou Bahnhofstrasse / Paradeplatz LB18A
description:
Located in the heart of Zurich at the famous Bahnhofstrasse next to the Fraumünster Church and Paradeplatz, Le Bijou presents a Swiss masterpiece in hospitality: Le Bijou Bahnhofstrasse / Paradeplatz Apartment. This is a self check in type of property. There is no reception and no staff on site. You check in by yourself with your personal door code which will be sent to you by James. The apartment is in a residential building so you can immerse yourself into the local Zurich city living.

Other things to note
There is a Sauna inside the apartment which the guests can use.

Start the day by walking through the Niederdorf to explore the small streets, lined with shops and historic buildings. Indulge in retail therapy on Zurich’s most famous shopping street, Bahnhofstrasse which is right on your door step.

description:
Exklusives Design-Studio! Das neue Studio ist ausgestattet mit hochwertigen Komfort-Betten, Badezimmer mit begehbarer Dusche, grosse Spiegelfläche mit edler Beleuchtung, moderne Kochnische mit Essecke, Glaskeramikherd, Kühlschrank, Nespressomaschine, Wasserkocher und Mikrowelle.

Herzlich Willkommen in Zürich!

The space
Die Einrichtung ist mit viel Liebe zum Detail gestaltet. Der Eingangsbereich ist mit einer Garderobe und Einbauschränken ausgestattet – wer gerne Ordnung hat, ist hier gut bedient. Kochnische, Essbereich und Wohnraum sind gegeneinander offen und vermitteln grosszügige Gastlichkeit.

Küchenzeile: voll ausgerüstete Kochnische mit Essecke, Glaskeramikherd, Arbeitsplatte in Naturstein, Kühlschrank, Geschirr, Kaffeemaschine, Wasserkocher und Mikrowelle

neighborhood_overview: Das Studio befindet sich am Fusse des Uetlibergs in einem Naturerholungsgebiet. Ideal um nach der Arbeit oder der Stadterkundung ab zu schalten. Joggen, Wandern, Reiten - alles ist möglich. In Gehdistanz befindet sich eine Wellnessoase (eher teuer). Das Spa Center verfügt über Massagen, Innen- wie auch Aussenpool, Kosmetikangebote wie auch Fitness.
host_about:
Wir sind auf die Vermietung von möblierten Wohnungen in Zürich spezialisiert. Personen und Firmen die eine möblierte Wohnung zwecks Geschäftsreise, Urlaub oder Übersiedlung suchen sind bei uns an der richtigen Adresse.

name: Beautiful, spacious art nuveau flat in the center
description: Beautiful, very spacious 4.5 room apartment in the center of Zurich right above the university area. The apartment has a king size bed, two bathrooms, a large living- and separate dining-room and a big kitchen with a 20sqm terrace. Grocery stores and many restaurants are in walking distance (Coop 50m, Migros/Pharmacy 450m). Public transport stops right in front of the house (station Winkelriedstrasse) and takes you everywhere (Bellevue, the lake and Zurich HB in 8', nonstop to airport in 30').
neighborhood_overview: The other parties in the house are only offices.
host_about:
I was born and raised in Zurich and have been living in this apartment since over 8 years. After it got fully renovated in spring 2019 , I decided to Airbnb it. I'd like to give curious travellers from all over the world the opportunity to explore beautiful Zurich and feel home the same way I do here.

I'm a partner in a creative agency, organising live experiences and events. Therefore I travel  frequently and love to discover new cities, trends and cultures around the world. I'm very clean and respectful of other people's apartments, the same way I want others to treat my home as well. 

I've been in Zurich all my life and very happy to help my guests with any tips and recommendations!

name: Spacious and stylish apartment in a very hip area
description:
This is a homey, clean, quiet apartment in a friendly and very trendy quarter in Zürich. Ideally for two to four people, the flat is a modern 3 room apartment and only 1 min away from one of the most beautiful public squares in Zurich: the Idaplatz.

The master bedroom is next to the quiet courtyard in the back of the building.
The elegant light furnished and light-flooted rooms are all 3m high. The kitchen and living room are modern, charming and very spacious with attached balconies.

The space
The apartment is situated in one of the most trendy quarters of Zurich only 10min from HB with public transport.

Nearyby you will find hip coffees, bars and restaurants. The supermarket, bakery and organic shop are in walking distance.

The nightlife of Zurich is in only 15min walking distance.

For a nice hike we recommend the close mountain Uetliberg, which you reach with public transport in only 10min.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a charming, historical building with a lift, situated in a quiet residential street in the heart of the hip 5th district. The location constitutes an ideal base to discover the urban city life of Zurich. A myriad of restaurants, bars and clubs can be found just around the corner. The hipshopping street “Viadukt” with many small shops and cafes as well as the beautiful green area “Josefwiese” and the Limmat river are just steps away from the property. The tram stop Quellenstrasse and the Hardbrücke railway station are also easily accessible on foot.

name: :) Cozy room near Zurich HB and Airport
description: One room is available in the heart of Zurich. The apartment is 5minutes walking from stop Radiostudio (Tram 11/Bus32) and 10 minutes from Bucheggplatz (Tram11/15 Bus32/69/72). The apartment has 3 bedrooms, kitchen and a living room. We live with my brother (Medicine Student) and my girlfriend (same room)!. host_about:
My name is Francesco. 
MBA grad from California working in New York City and born in Switzerland.
It is a very exciting city to be in as it has a lot to offer. I like to travel, food and sports. My hobby are cars and watches. 

I am a very welcoming host, I like to meet my guests and make sure they are confortable and most importantly I do like to make my guests feel they are at home. 

As a host on Airbnb and traveller I have learned the beauty of hosting people from different parts of the world and provide them with excellent services and very comfortable stay. 

My promise to my guests is: YOU will always have a friend and a good assistant in me if you ever need while you are in New York and after you leave . 

I would like to tell my guest you are welcome to your home away from home. 

Hosting is what I do best, I offer comfort and relaxation, to all our guests and I like to say I have met so many wonderful people during my years of hosting and I am always looking forward to meet more wonderful people and get the pleasure of hosting them. 

My new friendships are one of the biggest reasons why I love to host!

Cheers,
Francesco

name: Tiny studio in Zürich near to the Lake
description:
The flat is a renovated studio located in a 19th century house. The living room area includes a sofa a small table and a double bed.
Other two spaces are available, a kitchenette fully furnished and a bathroom with bathtub.

A bus station located in front of the house.
Tram / Train station 8min walk.

10 min walk / In this area is possible to swim at the lake around Badi Mythenquai and visit the Cultural Center Rote Fabrik with his restaurant on the lake.

Guest access
You can have access to the all surface of the studio, the flat is meant for your own use.
The kitchen is furnished and there is a refrigerator if you need it.

Other things to note
A boiler system warm the water for the house, to be sure to get hot water don't forget to activate the boiler at night time (a button is located in the kitchen, more instruction are given at the check in time).
neighborhood_overview:
The small flat is located in a quiet and green area of the city.
Walking around in the Wollishofen district is not unusual to encounter elegant villas, and historical houses. The lake is just 10 minutes walk distance from the house and in summer the many restaurant and bars facing the lake, the beach at Mythenquai and his green surrounding really worths a visit.
host_about:
The city is beautiful and worth a stop, the lake, the nature surrounding, the small cafés, the many cultural and recreational activities, Zürich has much to offer! 

I love to host people, and I am used to host friends spent time together and organize dinner-  it's a must do! 
My house is tiny but well organized, charming and welcoming. 
It's perfect for friends and couples visiting the city. 

About myself: 

I'm a freelance professional active in the art and cultural field, traveling is part of my life. I moved in Zürich in 2018 where I am currently based. 

I work with in theaters, art galleries and museums. Therefore I am happy to advice you about recent cultural happenings in the city. I have many friends all over the world, that's why it's not unusual to meet me with my luggage on the road! 

Let me know about yourself, I am here to help you organise your trip and glad to answer your questions. I speak IT / FR / ENG / DE

Warmly,

Giulia

neighborhood_overview: This building can be found in the heart of Zurich, in the centre of District 4"s urban bustle. Europaallee and its many shops, restaurants, and offices are just a few steps away, and the city"s main train station including the Shopville centre can be reached in just three minutes on foot. One of the building"s highlights is its open view of the Kasernenareal and the Uetliberg, Zurich"s very own hill. neighborhood_overview: The apartments are located in the lively 4th district which constitutes a great starting point to explore Zurich’s urban charme. Right round the corner there awaits a plethora of various restaurants, cafés, shops and local pubs  all within a walking distance. The legendary Langstrasse, with numerous bars and clubs, is only a few steps away. In the vicinity, there are also some green areas and a small park. Moreover, the location is perfectly connected to the public transport. The tram stop Bezirksgebäude is situated right on its doorstep. A direct connection to the Airport Zurich Kloten is available from the Wiedikon station, situated just a 2-minute walk away. Additionally, the main railway station is approx. 10 minutes away.

The guest can use the full apartment for her/himself.

The street itself is calm, guaranteeing a good sleep.

name: Big room in Wollishofen close to the city & lake
description:
Spacious, veggie-friendly and bright room in Zurich city, close to the lake. Parking available.
Workspace in your room available if you're travelling for work.

The space
I live by myself and I am happy to welcome you to my home!
* You will have a big room available for you with a bed and wardrobe for your use.
* If you need a parking space I am able to provide this.
* You are free to use TV, Netflix and Wi-Fi
* Fridge space and coffee is available for you
* You are allowed to cook in the kitchen (I accept all guests but am more than happy when some veggie comes to stay :)

Guest access
Kitchen, bathroom and living room can be used anytime. You get a spare key to the flat and the building and your room has a key as well.
neighborhood_overview:
My apartment is located in the city zone of Zurich (Wollishofen), few minutes walk to the lake and either bus or tram to take you straight to the main shopping street. Even though those are not far, my apartment is surrounded by green fields and a quiet street.

Just a few minutes away there is small Migros grocery's and bigger Aldi and Coop. Pharmacy and more stores are close by.
host_about: UX Designer living in Zurich City since 2009. I love getting to know different people, I speak 3 languages.

name: Modern 2 rooms apartment in district 4
description:
Das frisch renovierte und luxuriös eingerichtete Apartment befindet sich nur 10-15 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof, Paradeplatz oder von der Europaallee entfernt, inmitten vieler Restaurants und Bars.

Die luxuriöse voll ausgestattete Küche mit Siemens Küchengeräten, digitalem TV/Fotorahmen (für ein eigenes Foto oder Gemälde an der Wand) und eine Glasfaser-Internetverbindung sind nur einige der Highlights der 2-Zimmer-Wohnung.

The space
Handtücher und Bettwäsche sind inklusive. Waschmaschine und Trockner stehen allen Gästen zur Verfügung. Die Vermieterin setzt auf nachhaltiges Wohnen, z. B. durch Ökostrom, umweltfreundliche Pflegeprodukte, Cradle-to-Cradle-Produkte oder Second-Life-Designartikel.

name: Newly renovated apartment in the center of Zurich
description:
This 60m2 apartment has three rooms, a living, a bed and one bathroom. You find all what you need to spend several days in Zurich. This place can host up to 4 persons, where you have one bedroom for 2 and 2 on a sofa-bed.

Additional mattrass are available for CHF50 a night.

You walk 5 min from the train station to the apartment; reach restaurants & bars and the lake in a couple of min.

Local law obligates us to ask our guests to show their passports or sending us a photo of it electronically.

The space
Our place is ideally suited for a couple or a couple with children, who would like to explore Zurich. You find all you need in our apartment for cooking or just relax and sleep after a visit in the Zurich Opera.

Other things to note
we are often asked if we can offer a luggage service. We are able to provide this service for a fee. Please ask.

name: Montmartre Zurich - Room "Joséphine"
description:
spacy ‘joséphine’ allows the night to enter through a starshaped skylight.

take the 27 steps to the 1st floor and discover this room looking out on the (trafic-free) ‘weggengasse’ where a space of 35 m2 awaits you with an oak ‘grand lit’ (180 x 200cm), a settee and a comfortable armchair, set under a starshaped skylight. charming small bathroom with a shower, but where two will not be able to brush their teeth… together :-) !. separate toilet.

The space
spend the night in the heart of zurich’s historic centre as if you were in a french movie. The rooms ‘joséphine’ and ‘maurice’ ensure an unforgettable and unique overnight experience in a charming old town house. with their new oak floors, each room has been furnished and decorated in a stylish, individual and unique way.

their different ground plans and multiple benefits harmonize perfectly with the charm of this ancient building and its exterior frame.

faites-vous plaisir, faites

name: Züri Tip
description: Gemütliches Zimmer in bester Lage Zürichs zu vermieten. Es ist ruhig, sauber, die Matratze ist bequem. Mehrere Kissen zur Auswahl. Feine Decken (es wird euch nicht kalt nachts).Das Zimmer kann nachts verschlossen werden, oder während ihr abwesend seid. Das Ledersofa ist edel und ist ebenfalls zum schlafen gut. Ich liebe Sauberkeit bin ordentlich,  humorvoll und „easy going“ - 38 Jahre, vom Beruf Übersetzerin. Gebe euch gerne Zürich-Tipps. Ihr seid bei mir herzlich willkommen!

name: Hotel Glockenhof Zürich
description:
Herzlich willkommen im Hotel Glockenhof in Zürich. Unser Viersterne-Haus befindet sich in bester Lage im Herzen der Stadt Zürich. Es verfügt über hoteleigene Parkplätze und ist nur drei Gehminuten von der berühmten Bahnhofstrasse entfernt. Ob Sie als Business-Reisender oder Urlauber bei uns weilen – wir sorgen mit persönlichem Service und Engagement dafür, dass Sie sich bei uns sofort wohl fühlen.

The space
Unsere Philosophie…
Der Gast und seine Zufriedenheit stehen bei uns im Mittelpunkt. Wir wollen Genuss und Wohlgefühl bieten. Denn nur ein zufriedener Gast ist auch ein zukünftig wiederkehrender Gast.

Das zeichnet uns aus…
Die Vielfalt und die Differenziertheit unseres Angebotes und unser „Alles-unter-einem-Dach-Konzept“ haben uns zu dem gemacht, was wir heute sind: Eines der führenden Stadthotels Zürichs – ein modernes Viersterne-Haus mit Tradition und Zukunftsperspektiven.

Das bedeutet für Sie als Gast…
Zufriedenheit. Wohl
neighborhood_overview: Das Hotel liegt Mitten im Zentrum nur ein paar Gehminuten von der berühmten Bahnhofstrasse entfernt, welche keine Shoppingwünsche offen lässt. Ebenso sind zahlreiche Restaurants zu Fuss innerhalb weniger Minuten erreichbar.

description:
This cozy studio apartment is located in the center of Zurich: 15 minutes by train from Zurich airport and 5 minutes by train from the main station and city center.
Clean and fully equipped studio apartment with a rooftop terrace. Elevator available. The place can host up to 2 people.

The studio apartment is located in a lively neighbourhood, called Wiedikon, with many restaurants, bars and cafes in walking distance.

Great place for business travellers as well as tourists.

The space
The interior is modern and stylish as well as comfortable. The apartment features a queen-size bed, a flat TV with Netflix access for guests, a bathroom with a shower, and a fully equipped kitchen, including a Nespresso coffee machine and complimentary coffee pads to start your day right.

Guest access
Guest have access to every room.

host_about:
I am Karin, 37 years old,  living together with my partner Tobias and our 2 years old daughter Katelyn in Zürich.  I have been in hospitality for many years- two years at the legendary Badrutt's Palace Hotel in St. Moritz. I remember always been passionated about being a host for other people.

name: Large Fully Equipped Room - Zurich
description:
Large (16.5 sqm) and well-equipped room, designed for business travellers, located in the city of Zurich.
Much care and attention has gone into design of the room to provide guests with a number of key facilities to allow for a comfortable stay. In addition, the location of accommodation provides excellent travel links to reach a number of key destinations.
Given how well equipped the room is, it also provides an excellent platform for a tourist who wants to visit the city at the weekend.

The space
Room Specification
- Literature provided (not to be removed from the property); Monocle guide to Zurich, Latest edition of Monocle magazine, city map, key contact numbers
- 3 Seater green chesterfield sofa
- Cork notice board
- Desk organiser complete with basic office stationery (Pens, post it note and ruler)
- Desk lamp
- 39 inch/ 100 cm Panasonic HDTV
- HDMI cable to link your own media device to the HDTV
- Goog
neighborhood_overview:
- 3 minutes walk to the number 3 tram stop, which stops at; Zurich Main Station and a number of other great eating and drinking destinations in the city (Langstrasee, Wiedikon, Lochergut, Hardbrucke, Letzigrund)
- Number 80 bus which will connect you to Trimelispital, Altstetten Station and Oerlikon
- Number 67 bus which will connect you to Wiedikon (popular night life area)
- Located next to 3 major supermarkets
- Very close to nature and Albisrieden forest and Uetliberg walking trails
- Letzigrund is a short ride on public transport or 15 minute walk
- Close to a number of large businesses (UBS, Siemens, Electrolux, IBM)
- if you are visiting by car and need to arrange parking there are a number of blue zone spots on Altstetterstrasse, close by.
host_about:
Keys'n'Fly - Airbnb Management Solution That Suits You
My name is Marc with Keys'n'Fly Vacation Rentals, a full service property management company based out of Geneva, Switzerland. My team and I strive to make every experience a seamless one, no matter where your trip may take you. As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us. 
Our beloved hosts trust us in managing their properties on their behalf and we hope you will trust us with your stay.
Please let us know how we may help you with your next trip.

name: Modern Bedroom close to City Centre & Airport
description:
The newly built apartment is situated in an urban area and is 15-minutes from the Zurich city centre by train and 10-minutes from the airport. That being said, the apartment is still very quiet, so you will be able to enjoy the tranquillity of having your own room & toilet, with direct access to the balcony.

If you tell us a bit about yourself, we are happy to give you some tips and make your stay as comfortable as possible. We are looking forward to meeting you soon!

Kim & Timo

The space
You have your own bedroom (which you can lock) with an adjustable working desk and own bathroom (toilet & sink). You also have access to the common spaces (living room and shower).

If you would like to warm up some food, you can use our microwave and you can also use our fridge to keep anything that needs to be cooled. Additionally, you are welcome to enjoy a fresh cup of espresso (at a little charge) or some tea.

We share the living s
neighborhood_overview: Large supermarkets are located within a 10-minute walk or a 3-minute bus ride (1 stop). Alternatively, there are many different restaurants in the area. The Hallenstadion is a short bus/tram ride away in case you're in town for a concert or event.
host_about:
I am an open-minded person that loves to travel, explore, sports, adventures, the outdoors and most importantly: food.

I live together with Kim, my girlfriend, who's half Swiss half Singaporean and who's travelled the world her entire life. Together we constantly look to explore remote areas off the beaten track and love meeting new people from all over the world.

We look forward to meeting you soon, either at your place or at ours.

name: Fully Equipped Room - Zurich
description:
Well-equipped room (11sqm), designed for business travellers, located in the city of Zurich.
Much care and attention has gone into design of the room to provide guests with a number of key facilities to allow for a comfortable stay. In addition, the location of accommodation provides excellent travel links to reach a number of key destinations.
Given how well equipped the room is, it also provides an excellent platform for a tourist who wants to visit the city at the weekend.

The space
Room Specification
- Work area including desk and chair and additional stool
- 32 inch/ 81 cm LG Smart HDTV – allows you to connect to your favourite media (ie Netflix, youtube, spotify and more)
- HDMI cable to link your own media device to the HDTV
- Superfast fibre optic WiFi
- USB charging sockets
- Fridge
- Ironing board
- 100% Cotton sheets and towels
- Wardrobe with mirrored door
- Lint roller (to remove hairs/dust
neighborhood_overview:
- 3 minutes walk to the number 3 tram stop, which stops at; Zurich Main Station and a number of other great eating and drinking destinations in the city (Langstrasee, Wiedikon, Lochergut, Hardbrucke, Letzigrund)
- Number 80 bus which will connect you to Trimelispital, Altstetten Station and Oerlikon
- Number 67 bus which will connect you to Wiedikon (popular night life area)
- Located next to 3 major supermarkets
- Very close to nature and Albisrieden forest and Uetliberg walking trails
- Letzigrund is a short ride on public transport or 15 minute walk
- Close to a number of large businesses (UBS, Siemens, Electrolux, IBM)
- if you are visiting by car and need to arrange parking there are a number of blue zone spots on Altstetterstrasse, close by.
host_about:
Keys'n'Fly - Airbnb Management Solution That Suits You
My name is Marc with Keys'n'Fly Vacation Rentals, a full service property management company based out of Geneva, Switzerland. My team and I strive to make every experience a seamless one, no matter where your trip may take you. As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us. 
Our beloved hosts trust us in managing their properties on their behalf and we hope you will trust us with your stay.
Please let us know how we may help you with your next trip.

name: Bright & quiet room with private bathroom Oerlikon
description:
🅑🅡🅘🅖🅗🅣 🅖🅤🅔🅢🅣 🅡🅞🅞🅜 in our spacious flat in Oerlikon, Zurich. You get your own bathroom with shower to use. Perfect for solo travellers, business travellers or students looking for a clean and friendly place to stay.

Quiet area, yet very close to Zurich: in 20min you are at the Lake & in the old town of Zurich, at Bahnhofstrasse for shopping or at Langstrasse for the vibrating night life with bars.

Free parking space right outside our house.

The space
"𝘌𝘯𝘫𝘰𝘺 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘵 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘢 𝘩𝘰𝘵𝘦𝘭 𝘸𝘰𝘶𝘭𝘥 𝘰𝘧𝘧𝘦𝘳 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘣𝘪𝘯𝘦𝘥 𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘩 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘸𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘵𝘩 𝘰𝘧 𝘴𝘵𝘢𝘺𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘵 𝘢 𝘧𝘳𝘪𝘦𝘯𝘥𝘴 𝘱𝘭𝘢𝘤𝘦."

The guest room (13m2) comes with a comfortable 1,20m-Bed with a VERY SOFT mattress and enough storage space for your belongings. Private guest bathroom with a shower and toilet for your personal use.

If there are 2 of you, we can put up a big air mattress (1,20m) for the second person in the same room at CHF 20.- per night.

Guest access
Guests enjoy t
neighborhood_overview:
There is a super market (Migros or Coop) within 10min walking distance and a corner shop less than 5minutes away.

Our accommodation is close to ETH Zurich-​Oerlikon buildings ONA and Octavo (OCT) - literally 5min by foot.

Enjoy the sunset in the summer from the balcony or go for a run in the nearby woods (5min) after work.

You will find an organic farm with fresh milk, dairy and groceries 15mins from our house.

Oerlikon offers lots of restaurants, shops, a huge second-hand shop and public swimming pool.

In 20min you reach the center of Zurich, the lake and the old town.
host_about: Hi, I am Nicole! I have worked in hospitality for over three years and now we are so excited to be able to host people in our own little AirBnB hotel! I live with my boyfriend Livio who studied at ETH and now we are both working. We have a spare room and bathroom that we love to share with travellers from all ages and places. We love good coffee, long walks around our house and good meals in Zurich. On the weekends, we often go hiking or camping around Switzerland. I love to read, so you will also find a selection of books available. We are very happy to share our beautiful country with you!

description:
My name is Enrique and I study law at Fribourg University so I decided to lease my studio in Zurich.

The studio is very quiet and has its own entrance and its own small bathroom (no kitchen). It is therefore very suitable for women traveling alone.
My family lives in the apartment next to it. We are open and sociable, but also respect your privacy.

The space
Mein Name ist Enrique und ich studiere Rechtswissenschaft in Fribourg. Das ist der Grund, weshalb ich mein Studio in Zürich vermiete.
Das Studio ist sehr ruhig gelegen und verfügt über einen eigenen Eingang und ein eigenes kleines Bad (ohne Küche). Es ist deshalb sehr gut geeignet für Frauen, die alleine Reisen.
In der Wohnung daneben wohnt meine Familie. Wir sind offen und kontaktfreudig, respektieren aber auch deine Privatsphäre.

name: Platte200 im Univiertel
description:
In einem Hotel im Herzen von Zürich, mit einer hervorragenden Lage, nur paar Gehminuten von der Universität Zürich oder dem Uni Spital entfernt, gibt es ein kleines, sehr einfaches Einzelzimmer im Obergeschoss, welches für kleines Budget vermietet wird. Man hat eine Privatsphäre und befindet sich Mitten in einem Hotel für kleines Geld.

Unser Hotel verfügt zu dem über ein Restaurant und eine Bar. Man bekommt ein eigenen Schlüssel für den Hoteleingang und das Zimmer und ist somit unabhängig. Das Zentrum ist ist der Nähe. Geeignet auch für langfristige Aufenthalte wie für Studenten oder Wochenarbeiter, aber auch für Touristen, die gerne zentral, für kleines Budget im Hotel wohnen möchten.

Kein WC im Badezimmer! WC liegt 1. Stock.

Aja Hotel is conveniently located to give you easy access to exploring the city. You’ll be nearby favorite destinations for sightseeing, dining, shopping, and more, just minutes from the hotel. Our 24-hour reception can assist with concierge services.

Free WiFi
43” Flat screen TV
Complimentary t

name: BnB Balgrist am Buchenweg
description:
Seit dem 1. November 2019 bieten wir eine grosszügige 1.5 Zimmerwohnung von 45m2 mit separatem Eingang in neu erbautem Mehrfamilienhaus im Balgrist als Bed’n’Breakfast an. Das BnB verfügt auf Anfrage über einen Parkplatz in der Tiefgarage. Ruhige Lage in privatem Garten, Tram in 5 Min., 15 Min. ins Stadtzentrum, See, Parks, Wald, viele Spazier-/Wanderwege in kurzer Gehdistanz. Minibar, Kaffeemaschine, Toaster, reichhaltiges Frühstück 7.30 - 9.00 Uhr. 2 Einzelbetten, oder als Doppelbett (2/2m)

The space
Moderne, begehbare Dusche, tägliche Reinigung
In der Küche können mitgebrachte Fertigmalzeiten aufgewärmt werden.
Bei passendem Wetter kann das Frühstück auf dem Gartensitzplatz eingenommen werden. Natürlich steht Ihnen dieser gemeinsam mit den Hausbewohnern auch tagsüber zur Verfügung. Direkt vor dem Haus beginnt ein Fussweg, der Sie fast autofrei zum See oder in den nahen botanischen Garten führt.

Guest access
Die ganze 1.5 ZI Woh
neighborhood_overview: Das BnB geht mit separatem Eingang nach der strassenabgewandten Seite in den Garten. Mehrere Cafés und Restaurants sind in kurzer Zeit  zu Fuss oder mit dem Ö.V. erreichbar.  Verschiedene  Privatkliniken sowie  Balgristspital sind in 5-10 Min. zu Fuss erreichbar.

name: A green oasis in the middle of Zurich
description:
Are you looking for a beautiful and peaceful place to stay in the middle of Zurich in the coolest area with a huge terrace?

Nice bright furnished cozy room (25m2) in a beautiful newly renovated 3.5 room apartment (90m2).

Bars, restaurants and the hot spots at the river in walking distance.

Very relaxed atmosphere...

The space
It's in a beautiful, newly renovated apartment in Zurich (Wipkingen) with a huge green and peaceful terrace. The terrace is the jewel of the apartment, where you can have BBQ in summer, sunbath and chill…

Very well-equipped open kitchen, with dishwasher, laundry with dryer in the flat

Great location:
8 min to city center (Mainstation, Central, Bahnhofstrasse…) by bus (one busstop)
10 min to most of the hot spots in Zurich
Close to the river where locals like to chill and party.
15 min by train to the airport
neighborhood_overview:
It's the coolest Neighborhood in Zurich.
The area is quite calm but you'll have some very cool bars, restaurants and cafés in walking dinstance (like 2-7min walking).
The coolest thing is the river, where the locals love to hang around, bath, chill and party, which is also only a 5 min walk from the appartment.
Shops for groceries and bakery also within walking distance.
host_about:
Easy going. Open minded. I like to discover what's different. I Love good people. Love to spend good time with good people, enjoying the instant and having interesting discussion about love, life and its meaning. 
Love life with all good things it offers (people, food, art, music, movies...)

Be good and good will come to you. Love and love will come to you. 
I want to have a positive impact on the people I cross during my life.

name: Apartment in the heart of the Old Town
description:
The apartment building is situated in the most ancient part of Zurich Old town, and the heart of the old town. It is calm despite the distance to the shopping street of Bahnhofstrasse. It is a prime neighbourhood with the most attractive hotspots the city can offer. Within only 5 min walk to the main train station, Zurich HB, you can easily take a train and get to all destinations in Switzerland.

The space
The apartment building is from year 1336. It is narrow building and there is no elevator. The building had a major renovation in thirties so many elements are still from that time such as bathtub/shower, kitchen sink, radiators, pipes and doors. You can see the trace of time, wich gives the apartment the charming aspect.
The bathtub is a bit higher than todays standard tubs. The bathroom with a window doesn't have a sink.

Guest access
If you are travelling alone and book the apartment for yourself without the ”extra guest” option. Yo
neighborhood_overview:
There is a multistory car park in the vicinity. The neighbourhood is car free except for the delivery to the shops until noon. Taxis can enter the whole day with a very reduced speed limit.
The tram stop is just down the street and the main train station Zurich HB is 1 stop away or 8 minutes walk distance.
host_about: I do not have any specific hobby/ies but I like to do and have done many things. I can't tell what I am good in. I never do things that I dislike. I am very satisfied with my desicions. Most of them are very spontaneous. I think I am the funniest person I know....that's enough for me as I rarely find a borring moment being alone. I don't know if my friends think the same of me as not everybody understand my jokes :).

name: Grosszügige 1.5 Zimmer Wohnung mit sonnigem Balkon
description:
Diese grosszügige Wohnung mit grossem, sonnigen Balkon befindet sich im Kreis 2. Sowohl das Einkaufszentrum Sihlcity als auch der See sind nur 10 Gehminuten entfernt. Die Nachbarschaft bietet diverse Restaurants, eine Bäckerei sowie einen kleinen Supermarkt. Ein Umfassendes Einkaufs- und Freizeitangebot findet man im Einkaufszentrum Sihlcity.
Öffentliche Verkehrsmittel mit direkter Verbindung ins Zentrum befinden sich in unmittelbarer Nähe und bringen Sie in kurzer Zeit ans gewünschte Ziel!

The space
Das Wohnzimmer bietet eine gemütliches Sofa, einen SMART TV, einen Ess-/Arbeitstisch und auch genügend Platz für ein work-out.
Der Schlafbereich bietet ein komfortables, grosses Bett und diverse Schränke für die Aufbewahrung. Bei schönem Wetter lädt der grosse Balkon zum verweilen ein.

Guest access
Der Waschraum befindet sich im Keller und funktioniert ausschliesslich mit dem elektronischen Waschschlüssel.

Other things
neighborhood_overview:
Die Nachbarschaft bietet unter anderem die grosszügige Allmend, wo man ausgedehnte Spaziergänge oder Joggingrouten entlang des Flusses laufen kann. Hier gibt es auch einen Wanderweg auf den Üetliberg, für diejenigen, die hoch hinaus wollen. Richtung See geht man über den Hügel, wo sich das Museum und der Park Rietberg befinden. Man hat einen tollen Ausblick über den See bis hin zu den Bergen!
Einkäufe erledigen Sie ganz nahe im Sihlcity oder beim kleinen Supermarkt um die Ecke.
Es warten auch diverse Restaurants und Bars, welche sich in 10 Minuten Gehdistanz befinden, Google kennt die genauen Adressen!

name: ZÜRICH City (K4)  Städte-Trip  (1 Zimmerwohnung)
description:
Die Wohnung ist in der City von Zürich im Langstrass Quartier, ideal für City Trip oder kurz Aufenthalt Beruflicher Hinsicht.
2 Minuten zu Fuss von der Langstrasse, und 5 zum Einkauf (Migros bis 21 Uhr, Coop bis 22 Uhr & Quartier Shops 24h)
Mit dem Öffentlichen Verkehr, wo Tram und Busstation unmittelbar beim Haus sind, erreichen sie Hauptbahnhof, Bahnhofstrasse, Löwenstrasse, Bellevue, See, Museen, Altstadt und Zoo in wenigen Minuten. Öffentliche Pay-Parkplätze gibt es im Quartier viele.

The space
Die Wohnung ist eine Typische Zürcher City 1 Zimmerwohnung.
Wohn/Schlafzimmer mit grossem Bett, grossem Sofa, 59 Zoll TV, einer Büro ecke inkl. PC, und einem Balkon (mit zwei Stühlen und einem kleinen Tisch) mit Weitsicht.
Bad mit Wanne/Dusche, und WC mit Thailändischen Po-Duschpistole.
Küche, alt aber komplett Ausgerüstet mit 4 Elektroherdplatten Backofen, Mikrowelle sowie alles um zu Kochen und Essen vorhanden.
Eingangsbereich mit Kle

host_about:
Welcome to Switzerland and Zurich first of all!

And to the fantastic lake, rivers, and the most charming city of the world in my eyes.

Dont miss to stay in a top located property where you can explore or work from and could enjoy all the things this city is offering to you.

Train station, access to airport, mountains, rivers and lake are all just a footprint away. Also groceries, free washing in the house and wifi
 I am happy to give you all informations about and around Zurich ;o)

And to give tyou th eopportunity staying like a local in its best location that will impress!

name: One bedroom , furnished with designer furniture
description:
Modern fully furnished designer flat,in a perfect location between airport and main train station zurich. Bus Stop just in front of the building takes you in max 7min to Zurich Oerlikon station where you either can reach the airport in 7min or the Bahnhofstrasse, main Zurich shopping street in 8min.by public transport. Very clean and friendly home waiting to make your stay the most pleasant experience.
Breakefast could be arranged upon request;

The space
Quiet apartment in the beautiful Affoltern Zurich.Close to main Oerlikon train station. MIGROS OR COOP and Denner supermarkets just 5 min away. Post office,parks, public transportation nearby.also ideal for ETH students/workers

Guest access
Living room shared when free, Terrasse shared. Access to a fully equiped kitchen

Other things to note
For the check out, when I'm not in the house, please leave the key in the upper part of the mailbox. Lost key is 500.00
neighborhood_overview: plenty of groceries stores ,migros,coop,denner,post office, gym,super well connected by bus or train ..all these in walking distance. airport or city centre is just 15 min ride

Public transport and supermarkets are just minutes away. To the airport it takes you 15 minutes by tram.
To the park it is a four minutes walk, plenty of restaurants can be found in walking distance.

name: 2 Bedroom Apartment Junior
description:
These fully serviced & styled apartments offer you a unique experience & a comfortable feeling "home away from home"! Our apartments are exclusively operated by VISIONAPARTMENTS.

If you need another/smaller/bigger apartment, please have a look at our profile!

The space
2 Bedroom Apartment Junior - size 49 m²

This charming penthouse apartment with a balcony and a view overlooking the city is a perfect place to unwind after a stressful day. White marble flooring, chic glass elements, bright designer furniture and sand-colored hues give the apartment an elegant touch. The open living and dining area features a snug sitting corner, flat screen TV and a large dining table. The well-lit, modern kitchen is fully fitted offering a glass ceramic stove, microwave with baking and grill function, coffee maker, as well as pans, crockery and cutlery. Both bedrooms tempt with a comfortable double bed and offer sufficient space to relax. The high quality b
neighborhood_overview: The residence is situated in a central and yet very quiet area in the trendy Wiedikon district. Thanks to many parks and green areas guests will be able to escape the urban hustle and bustle in no time. The location constitutes a perfect base for those who want to enjoy all benefits of a central location and still stay close to the nature.
host_about: VISIONAPARTMENTS specializes in renting out stylish and furnished serviced apartments all around the world. Established in Switzerland in 1999, the company quickly grew from a start-up to Switzerland’s market leader with a global presence. Today, VISIONAPARTMENTS offers tailored temporary living solutions in over 850 business locations worldwide.

name: Stay on top of Zürich on the 16th floor
description:
New urban highrise space on the 16th floor. There are only 4 highrise appartment buildings in Zürich. This is your rare chance to stay in one.
I live here usually, so all you need is there.

The space
Perfect for couples or individual travellers that are looking for a special place far above the roofs of Zürich
neighborhood_overview:
My place is in the hip Kreis 5. Formerly an industrial area, now a cool combination of new and old. Cool restaurants and clubs just 5min walk away.
The tram station is just downstairs as well as two restaurants inside my building and another 5 just next door.
host_about:
After 8 years in the US, I decided to move back to Switzerland in 2009 and start my own company Supertext AG with two friends.
But having been abroad so long, it always pulls me back out into the world.

description: Das neue Hotel Züri by Fassbind wurde 2017 gebaut. Das Haus mit 167 Zimmer zeigt einen zeitgenössischen „Zürich Touch“. Das „Boutique Hotel“ wurde von den Stararchitekten Gigon & Guyer konzipiert welches mehrere Zürcher Wahrzeichen geplant hat. name: *9MINUTES FROM ZH MAIN STATION* / *SPACIOUS* / *MODERN* / *SURROUNDED BY RESTAURANTS & COFFEES* (A)
description:
***VIEW NOW IN 360° MODE / COPY THE LINK BELOW***

https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=Pd6xw8XtdAn

A wonderful spacious apartment, well furnished offering all amenities you need during your stay in Zurich for 1-5 guests. A supermarket is located in the same building and the tram stop "hottingerplatz" from where you are just minutes away from "kunsthaus/museum of arts" is litterally in front of the house. Bakeries, coffee, restaurants and pharmacy are across the street. The apartment is located in one of the posh areas of Zurich and surrounded by many old and nice townhouses great for nice walks.

The space
As you enter the house there is a big elevator to get to the apartment. Opening the apartments door you will have a entry area, the dining area and couch/tv area in front of you in an open space. There are big windows and a nice view. A balcony invites for a glas of wine or a cold beer during the warmer month. The bedrooms are in the back fro
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in a wealthy area of Zurich. The apartment is located to the small ancient "village center" which offers all daily supplies you need. On foot you are in "niederdorf/old town zurich" in about 10min/1km). Museums like the museum of art or Kulturama (museum of culture) are in walking distance. Also theaters and the lake of zurich are just a walk away. I strongly recommend to have a walk to Kafi Paradiesli, Hofstrasse 19, 8032 Zürich, a very nice sweet little hidden coffee place with a small but good menu.
host_about:
Hi I'm Alex. I was born in Zurich, studied economics in Berlin and Dubai and am now back in Zurich were I am running a company in the real estate business.  

I like doing sports like tennis, sailing, volley etc but enjoy going out in Zurichs nightlife as well. I would describe myself as very open and spontaneous and love showing people what the city has to offer. 

As son of a family working mainly in the tourism branch i had many chances to visit many countries in the world and get to know a lot of different cultures which i think is very interesting and helpful in life. The good side effect is, that I enjoy showing guest around in Zurich and "share" what our City offers! 

Having into depth discussions suit me as much as going out and having fun.

hope to see you soon.

alex

name: Central city-view penthouse
description:
Our apartment is in one of the best locations in Zurich; central, but not in touristic areas, quiet but there’s life surrounding it, cosy but spirited.

It's very easy to get around to wherever you want to get to - either on foot or by public transport. It's in a residential block, so you'll get to experience living of living amongst the locals. We chose unique items to decorate our home with, our pieces are special but familiar.

The space
We are very happy with our apartment’s open space and French windows, and since it’s a penthouse apartment, there’s never a dull moment if you choose to stay in. A flat screen TV, a good sound system, more than enough kitchen appliances to cook a delicious dinner are available. You can enjoy a cosy evening eating next to the artwork that is the view of the city of Zurich, or outside on the balcony with the chitter-chatter and buzzing of the surrounding neighbours doing the same.

Guest access
Yo
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is on the top floor, our neighbours are young couples and families who equally enjoy the one-minute walk to the park next to the house, a 15-minute walk to the main train station and a 20 minute tram-ride to Bellevue (one of the busiest plazas in Zurich).

Boutique shops, supermarkets, bars and restaurants are just around the corner on the main road.

name: Double Room with shared bathroom in a pop-up hotel
description:
Unser Pop Up Hotel liegt an bester Lage in Zürich, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen der Zürcher Altstadt. Wir bieten frisch renovierte und möblierte Zimmer mit allem was nötig ist, aber ohne viel Schnickschnack. Die Bäder befinden sich auf der Etage und werden geteilt. In unserem unkomplizierten und familiären Umfeld wirst du herzlich empfangen und dich wohlfühlen.

The space
Das Haus ist bald 500-jährig und liegt gehört zum Denkmal-geschützten Teil der Zürcher Altstadt.

Other things to note
Dieses Inserat ist zur Anfrage eines Langzeitaufenthalts in unserem Hotel (ab 7 Nächte) Bettwäschewechsel und Zwischenreinigungen sind nicht inklusive in den Preisen für Langzeitaufenthalte und können nach Bedarf angefragt werden. Zimmer mit Flusssicht können nicht garantiert werden.
neighborhood_overview: Direkt an der Limmat, 5 Minuten zu Grossmünster, Fraumünster & Wasserkirche/Helmhaus , 2 Minuten zur Predigerkirche, 7 Minuten zum Hauptbahnhof. Diverse Bars und Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe.
host_about:
Unique location, directly on Limmatquai in the heart of Zurich's old town. Only 7 minutes by foot to the train station, a tram stop is just outside the building (»Rudolf-Brun-Brücke»). 
The rooms are newly renovated, they all have a sink in the room, toilets and showers are shared.
It's an almost 500-year-old building with a lot of charm. 
***
Einmalige Lage, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen von Zürich. Nur 7 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt, Tramhaltestelle »Rudolf-Brun-Brücke» direkt vor dem Haus.
Frisch renovierte und neu eingerichtete Zimmer, alle mit Lavabo im Zimmer, Duschen/Toiletten auf dem Gang. 
Schöner Aufenthaltsraum mit Blick auf die Limmat. Ein 500-jähriges Haus mit viel Charme!

Stylishly decorated small studio apartment. Approx. 30sqm, located on a 2nd floor of an old building, only a jump away from the lake of Zurich. Centrally located, perfectly connected to public transport, and situated in Zurich’s popular Seefeld district, on the lakeside.

Good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
A single room that features a kitchen and a bathroom. It is a self-contained unit and houses everything in the single room space except the bathroom, to which is connected through a corridor. The different areas of the single room are employed for varied uses: a corner of the room is used as sleeping area, another corner designed as a kitchen, and the space in between is designed as a living/working room. In addition, the space has a partial wall
neighborhood_overview:
It is only a jump away from the lake of Zurich, next to the train station of “Tiefenbrunnen" and tram station “Wildbachstrasse”, offering perfect connectivity to the Main Train Station as well as the Airport.

Other areas of the city center and the lake of Zurich are only few minutes walk away. Surrounded by numerous restaurants, bars, supermarkets, parks & cafés, the studio is amid one of the most beautiful, hip and vital areas in Zurich.

Das zu vermietende Zimmer kann nach Wunsch möbiliert gemietet werden und verfügt über ein separates WC/Bad. Wohn/Esszimmer und Küche sind vollständig eingerichtet und zur Mitbenutzung. Geschirrspüler, Waschturm, WLAN und TV sind vorhanden.

The space
Der/Die Mieter/in sollte sauber & zuverlässig sein.

name: Central-Private Flat-70m2-Zurich-Sunny-3 Big Beds
description:
Nice apartment with 70m2 in Zurich, right on the 11 tram. Just renovated. Bedroom with a 180x200m bed, as well as a large living room with kitchen, a 180x200m sofa bed and a 140x200m mattress. 11min to Zurich main station, 10 minute walk to all important shops in Oerlikon. Quiet and completey private.

The space
A lot of sunshine and light with a lot of plants directly under the roof, quiet and relaxed vibe.

Guest access
You will have access to all rooms!

Other things to note
Quiet neighbours, mostly you won't meet them.
neighborhood_overview: We are right next to a train that connects you with many parts of the city. In Oerlikon you can find anything you need, the Main Station is just 14min away by train.
host_about: I am a German doctor, 30 years old, and I currently live in Zurich, Switzerland. I have been travelling a lot around the world and always used AirBNB as a guest in many parts of the world. I love to experience different cultures and practise my Spanish and Portuguese skills, so don't hesitate to write me in your mother-tongue :)

name: aja Hotel Zürich, Superior room-Early booking rate
description:
Your body and soul deserve a well-earned break so treat them to a vacation at Aja Hotel. Our focus is on your well being during your time here. We’ll be your urban retreat for relaxing and rejuvenating before exploring the city. You will have comfortable accommodations serviced with spa amenities.

Book your stay up to 3 days prior to your date of arrival and get a 15% discount per room/night on our a-ja Flex Rate.

The space
Comfortable rooms give you the benefits of spa amenities. Rooms have modern furnishings with attention to detail to give you the best stay. Our high quality beds have back-friendly mattresses and covered with allergy-friendly linens. The comfort and superior style rooms have modern bathrooms with walk-in showers.
host_about: We are bringing wellness to the city. At our urban resort, we want you to enjoy a good night’s sleep and, most importantly, all-round well-being. With a wellness area with rooftop terrace, a selection of saunas, 24-hour fitness and culinary delights in DELI Restaurant – our first resort in Switzerland offers every guest the opportunity to enjoy their own personal time out. Whether travelling for business or pleasure, our resort is just the spot for some rest and relaxation.

The space
balcony

name: Penthouse with unique Zürich view
description:
Penthouse with unique view over Zürich city and the Swiss Alps welcomes you right in front of the Toni-Areal tram station, in the heart of the modern, urban District 5 (Zürich West).

Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and on site parking is available subject to charge.

Any enquiries communicated before the arrival can be arranged.

The space
The apartment has 1 bedroom with plenty of storage space for your luggage.
The modern kitchen features a coffee machine and kettle, a fridge, an oven and a dishwasher.
A flat screen TV incl. Apple TV is provided in the spacious living room.
The well equipped bathroom has a washing machine and dryer. Toiletries, towels and hair drier are also provided.

Guest access
Complete access to entire apartment.
neighborhood_overview: The proximity to the Limmat river makes it an ideal location for all travelers interested in nature walks and clean air.  Walking along the Limmat, you will arrive to the Zürich lake in the heart of the city within 30 minutes. During summer time, you can enjoy all swimming opportunities as well as clubs and bars/terraces on this route.

name: Tiny bright apartment 8 min from Hb Zürich
description:
This beautiful tiny apartment is all yours and has two balconys, so it s very bright from the morning (eastbalcony) to the evening (westbalcony). There is an elevator brining you directly to the entrance door of your floor. It has a sleeping room in japanese style with a king size bed, a living room with lots of space to relax, read and two optional extra beds for familys or travelling groups. It s a beauty of a antik double house in green & yellow with five floors brand new renovated.

The space
It s only 7 min from HB Zürich with S4, 1 min to a nice shopping area with restaurants and cinema and close to the lake side.
neighborhood_overview: The street is quiet with nice colourful houses and just around the corner of Sihlcity, one of Zürichs nicest shopping malls just at the riverside. From here you can reach easily the city center with public transportation in 10 Minutes. If you love to try out a really good swiss restaurant, "Zur Au" is just around the corner. One of my favourite places is Museum Rietberg with a big park with big old trees and view to the lakeside & swiss mountains just 200 meters away.
host_about:
Hi there it s me, Karen, Soundartist.
I love raw food, sushi and all kinds of fruits and nuts.
I was crossing the Atlantic with an vessel boat, crossing the United States by train and I love travelling. Now I have a little son, so it s great for me to host people from around the world and hear their stories !!

name: Single Room with shared bath in a hotel
description:
Unser Pop Up Hotel liegt an bester Lage in Zürich, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen der Zürcher Altstadt. Wir bieten frisch renovierte und möblierte Zimmer mit allem was nötig ist, aber ohne viel Schnickschnack. Die Bäder befinden sich auf der Etage und werden geteilt. In unserem unkomplizierten und familiären Umfeld wirst du herzlich empfangen und dich wohlfühlen.

The space
Das Haus ist bald 500-jährig und liegt gehört zum Denkmal-geschützten Teil der Zürcher Altstadt.

Other things to note
Dieses Angebot ist zur Anfrage von Langzeitaufenthalten gedacht. Bettwäschewechsel und Zwischenreinigungen sind nicht inkludiert, können aber je nach Bedarf bei uns angefragt werden.
neighborhood_overview: Direkt an der Limmat, 5 Minuten zu Grossmünster, Fraumünster & Wasserkirche/Helmhaus , 2 Minuten zur Predigerkirche, 7 Minuten zum Hauptbahnhof. Diverse Bars und Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe.
host_about:
Unique location, directly on Limmatquai in the heart of Zurich's old town. Only 7 minutes by foot to the train station, a tram stop is just outside the building (»Rudolf-Brun-Brücke»). 
The rooms are newly renovated, they all have a sink in the room, toilets and showers are shared.
It's an almost 500-year-old building with a lot of charm. 
***

Frisch renovierte und neu eingerichtete Zimmer, alle mit Lavabo im Zimmer, Duschen/Toiletten auf dem Gang. 
Schöner Aufenthaltsraum mit Blick auf die Limmat. Ein 500-jähriges Haus mit viel Charme!

name: Charming Popup Hotel-Double Room (shared bathroom)
description:
Our pop-up hotel is located in the heart of Zurich's Old Town and is giving new life to a hotel in a house which has a 500-years history. All rooms have an individual layout and might vary from what you can see in the pictures. Our double rooms are ideal for travellers who are looking for a central but affordable stay, that offers a glimpse into the history of a temporarily used hotel and are not afraid to share our communal bathrooms with other guests.

The space

name: Penthouse above the clouds (126 m2 / 14. floor)
description:
Das Penthouse im 14. Obergeschoss, 50 m über Zürich Oerlikon, ist verkehrstechnisch optimal erschlossen. Das Penthouse bietet neben einer grossartigen Aussicht über die Stadt Zürich bis hin zu den Schweizer Alpen, ruhe und viel privacy und Luxus auf 126m2.

The space
Das Penthouse verfügt über zwei grosszügige und komfortable Schlafzimmer, welche mit hochwertigen, grossen Boxspringbetten sowie einem Flat Screen TV pro Zimmer ausgestattet sind. Angrenzend an die Schlafzimmer befinden sich zwei edle Badezimmer. Das Eine mit Lavabo und Badewanne, das Andere verfügt über Lavabo, WC und einer begebbaren Regendusche. Das Penthouse verfügt zudem über ein separates Gäste WC.

Das Sofa im Livingroom kann bei Bedarf für zwei zusätzliche Gäste, zu einem vollwertigen Bett umgebaut werden. Wie in den Schlafzimmern hat es einen Flat Screen TV im Livingroom. Ein Kleinkinderbett kann bei Bedarf zusätzlich aufgestellt werden. Der Wirtschaftsraum im Penthouse verfügt übe
neighborhood_overview: Im EG des Gebäudes befindet sich ein Tankstellen-Shop mit Caffeteria, welcher Artikel des Täglichenbedarfs und frisches Brot von 06:00 Uhr - 22:00 Uhr anbietet.

name: Adios boredom! High quality Studio apartment
description:
The newly renovated & high quality completed property on 5 floors with elevator is located on an almost traffic-free one-way street and each apartment is accessible via a charming passageway with a view of an unobstructable green meadow.
These 23 apartments will amaze you. From large studios to exclusive 1-bed-apartments a "WOW" is written on your forehead.

This unit is offered in two different interior designs; "Park Avenue" or " Mexican South"

The space
NEW OPENING!
Not too much and not too little: Just right with more space.

Open floor plan with lots of well thought-out details and an extra portion of comfort.

The designer kitchens, which are angled at the entrance, are fully equipped with a large refrigerator, oven and dishwasher. Their clever arrangement gives the impression of an apartment rather than a studio. The combined living & sleeping area with real parquet flooring offers plenty of space to live, work, r
neighborhood_overview:
The apartments are located in the heart of the metropole of Zurich and in attractive proximity to the shore of Lake Zurich.

The "Seefeld" district is attractive for people who love city life, nature and the lake and is ideally located in Zurich's central banking and administrative district - just a few minutes' walk from the lake. As the most popular district for living and working, for leisure, culture and recreation, Seefeld is at the top of the agenda. name: THE FLAG Zürich - Comfort Apartment in Altstetten
description:
Large Room (24 sqm) with king size or queen size double bed, shower/toilette, hair dryer
fully equipped kitchenette (without hob), fridge, Nespresso machine including initial equipment of coffee and tea capsules, kettle
small seating area, safe, flatscreen TV, ironing station
free W-Lan, digital E-Concierge, free access to digital newspapers, USB ports
on request breakfast buffet (CHF 15 per person) or snacks for on the go in the restaurant

Guest access
free access to fitness room and public terrace

Other things to note
From June 1st, 2021 we will be offering breakfast to go (CHF 15 per person).
Choose from: croissants or corn flakes, rolls with 3 different cold cuts or spreads, a fruit of your choice, yoghurt and a juice.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to the Zurich West business district. Many larger companies and bank office buildings are in the immediate vicinity. Altstetten train station can be reached on foot in six minutes. Various tram and bus lines connect the apartment house with the city center of Zurich in 10 minutes. Zurich Airport can be reached by car in 20 minutes via the Zurich-Altstetten motorway junction. The Letzipark shopping center is 500 meters away, and the Letzigrund football stadium is right next to it. Bars and art galleries are within walking distance of our hotel in Zurich West and the local recreation area of ​​the Uetliberg is ideal for long walks.

Our guests enjoy 48 special conditions in the nearby david gym fitness center. Letzigrund, the home stadium of the FC Zürich and GC Zürich football clubs, hosts many interesting matches. The stadium is also used as the annual venue for the world-class athletics meeting in Zurich, as well as regularly for large open-air concert
host_about:
Lieber Gast,

herzlichen Dank für Ihr Interesse an unserem Unternehmen THE FLAG Zürich. Damit Sie sich auch in Zeiten von Corona sicher und wohl während Ihres Aufenthalts bei uns fühlen, möchten wir Ihnen im Folgenden einige Hinweise geben.
Wir möchten Sie darauf aufmerksam machen, dass aufgrund der aktuellen Coronapandemie in unserem Hotel eine strenge Maskenpflicht gilt. Bitte Tragen Sie eine Maske, sobald Sie Ihr Hotelzimmer verlassen und sich in öffentlichen Bereichen (Lobby, Flur, Aufzug, Tiefgarage etc.) aufhalten. Die Maske muss immer die Nase und den Mund bedecken.

Darüber hinaus möchten wir Sie darauf hinweisen, dass sich stets nur die bei der Buchung angegebene Anzahl an Personen in den Hotelzimmern aufhalten darf. Der Aufenthalt von weiteren Personen, Besuch oder Ähnlichem ist nicht gestattet. Wir behalten uns vor, unser Hausrecht bei Zuwiderhandlung (notfalls polizeilich) geltend zu machen. Feiern, Partys oder ähnliche Ansammlungen in den Hotelzimmern sind strengstens verboten. 

Sicherheitskaution:
Bei Check-In benötigen wir eine Garantie über die Summe Ihres Aufenthaltes sowie CHF 200.00 für mögliche Extras als Sicherheitskaution. Diese kann bei Anreise in Form von Bargeld, EC- oder Kreditkarte hinterlegt werden. Eine Rückerstattung erfolgt unmittelbar nach Ihrer Abreise. Das Hotel kann zudem eine Kopie Ihres Ausweises anfertigen.

Nichtraucherhotel:
Das Rauchen ist in all unseren Hotelzimmern sowie in den öffentlichen Bereichen von THE FLAG Zürich strengstens untersagt. THE FLAG ist ein reines Nichtraucherhotel. Bei Verstoß gegen das Rauchverbot behalten wir uns vor, die Reinigungskosten (bis zu CHF 500.00) in Rechnung zu stellen bzw. mit der Sicherheitskaution zu verrechnen. Das Rauchen ist nur auf Balkonen und Terrassen erlaubt.

Sachbeschädigung und Haftung:
Hotel- und Übernachtungsgäste haften für Schäden oder übermäßige Verschmutzung, welche sie am Eigentum von THE FLAG verursachen. Schadensersatzzahlungen werden mit der Sicherheitskaution verrechnet bzw. gesondert in Rechnung gestellt. 

Nachtruhe:
Zwischen 22.00 und 07.00 Uhr bitten wir Sie, die Nachtruhe zu respektieren und andere Gäste nicht zu stören. Personen, die gegen die Hausruhe verstoßen, kann ein weiterer Aufenthalt im THE FLAG Zürich verweigert werden. Ebenfalls kann ein Hausverbot ausgesprochen werden.


Zuwiderhandlungen gegen die vorgenannten Regeln werden mit bis zu CHF 500.00 geahndet.

Vielen Dank für die Beachtung der Regeln. Sollten Sie Fragen zu Ihrem Aufenthalt haben, stehen wir Ihnen jederzeit gerne zur Verfügung.

Wir würden uns freuen, Sie bald als Gast begrüßen zu dürfen und wünschen Ihnen bis dahin noch eine schöne Zeit!  

Herzlichst,
Ihr THE FLAG Zürich Team

neighborhood_overview:
The apartments are located in the heart of the metropole of Zurich and in attractive proximity to the shore of Lake Zurich.

The "Seefeld" district is attractive for people who love city life, nature and the lake and is ideally located in Zurich's central banking and administrative district - just a few minutes' walk from the lake. As the most popular district for living and working, for leisure, culture and recreation, Seefeld is at the top of the agenda. Here you will find numerous neighbourhood shops, a wide range of restaurants from trendy to gourmet, fashionable boutiques, galleries and countless local recreational opportunities.

neighborhood_overview: The area around "hegibachplatz" is know for its calm wonderful neighbourhoods with big old townhouses and many parks, smaller coffees and shops. Yet it is very well connected and offers it self for nice exploration walks to "villa Patumbah", the botanic garden, the lake or the "neumünsteranlage" around the corner. Right next to the apartment you will find the restaurant "Butchers Table" which is well known for its outstanding meat dishes, and the restaurant "Misoga" which offers modern asian fusion kitchen.
host_about:
Hi I'm Alex. I was born in Zurich, studied economics in Berlin and Dubai and am now back in Zurich were I am running a company in the real estate business.  

I like doing sports like tennis, sailing, volley etc but enjoy going out in Zurichs nightlife as well. I would describe myself as very open and spontaneous and love showing people what the city has to offer. 

As son of a family working mainly in the tourism branch i had many chances to visit many countries in the world and get to know a lot of different cultures which i think is very interesting and helpful in life. The good side effect is, that I enjoy showing guest around in Zurich and "share" what our City offers! 

Having into depth discussions suit me as much as going out and having fun.

hope to see you soon.

alex

name: Zimmer im Zentrum von Zürich!
description:
Du hast ein Zimmer mit einem 1.8 x 2 Meter Bett. Die Wohnung hat 6.5 Zimmer, ist also ziemlich gross, hat einen grossen Balkon mit Blick auf das Wahrzeichen des Quartiers, die Kirche Enge. In der Wohnung hat es alles was du brauchst, inklusive Waschmaschine und Tumbler direkt in der Wohnung! Die Tramhaltestelle ist direkt vor der Haustür, von dort aus erreichst du fast alle wichtigen Orte in Zürich in wenigen Minuten, auch den See.

The space
Du teilst dir die Wohnung mit meinen super netten Mitbewohnern, also sei bitte auch nett zu ihnen. Wenn du Tipps und Hilfe von ihnen brauchst, frag sie, sie werden dir gerne helfen. Verlasse die gemeinsamen Räume einfach so, wie du sie angetroffen hast. Sprich nutzt du die Küche, bitte mach sie danach wieder sauber, genau so das Badezimmer.

Guest access
Du hast Zugang zum Wohnzimmer, zur Küche, zum Bad und zum Balkon. Tabu sind eigentlich nur die Zimmer meiner Mitbewohner.
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung liegt super Zentral. Es gibt in der direkten Nachbarschaft viele kleine Cafes und Restaurants. Direkt auf der anderen Strassenseite findest du zum Beispiel die gemütliche Bederbar. In wenigen Minuten erreichst du das Zürcher Seebecken, du kannst Abends zum Beispiel für einen Drink ins Seebad Enge um deinen Tag ausklingen zu lassen oder einfach am See entlang spazieren und den Blick in die Alpen geniessen.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Nico. I live in beautyful Switzerland and love to host and meet people and of course also to travel. 

See you soon ;-)

Public transport (train station Brunau and bus stop) - is only 100 meters away and you reach the city center in 9 minutes. The shore of lake Zurich with a large public park (Landiwiese) and the famous Rietberg Museum are within walking distance.

The kitchen is fully equipped including dishwasher, microwave, Nespresso coffee machine, water heater etc. Free internet WLAN and cable TV is available. Smoking is only permitted on the balcony.
