name: Auszeit mit Alpenblick
description:
Höngg ist ein am Hang gelegener Stadtteil, der einen unglaublichen Blick über die Stadt, die Limmmat und die Alpen bietet. Die Wohnung liegt in einer schönen, verkehrsberuhigten Lage Nahe des Zentrums von Höngg und ist gut an den öffentlichen Verkehr in die Stadt angeschlossen. Ohne umzusteigen fährt das Tram zu Hauptbahnhof, See und ins Einkaufszentrum Sihlcity. Vom Balkon aus kann in der Abendsonne der Blick bis zu den Schneebergen genossen werden.

The space
Der besondere Charme dieser Wohnung ist: Wir sind die neuen Mieter und leben noch nicht in der Wohnung, d.h. die Wände sind frisch gestrichen, der schöne Holzboden abgeschliffen und die Wohnung besticht durch frische Renovation, Sauberkeit und Einfachheit- wenige Möbel, Glühlampen und ein paar ausgesuchte Accesoires.
Sie verfügt über eine gut ausgestattete Küche, TL-Bad mit Dusche und Badewanne, ein Schlafzimmer nach hinten in den ruhigen Garten hinaus und ein grosses Wohnzimmer mit urbanem Blick über

The space
The space

description:

description:
This very special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. It is located at the heart of the Altstadt Zurich. The building is from 1249AD and under monumental protection. You could not be more in the center of Zurich.

The apartment has two very spacious loft-like rooms, a shared kitchen, and a shared bathroom. My roommate David lives in the other room. He is very friendly, respectful, and quiet. My beautiful room has a window to the kitchen (was a medieval fireplace).
host_about:
Hi there! I am a PhD student at Columbia University, but originally from Switzerland. I have two rooms in shared apartments because I need to travel frequently and switch between Zurich and New York. 

I currently want to sublet my place in Zurich for a few weeks. My apartment is in a historic medieval building (from 1249AD) and I am looking for someone with a sense for the particular cache of this place.

You will find a large, bright and nicely furnished room with private bathroom/WC in an exceptional, three-storey flat in a quiet neighbourhood street with lots of greenery. In addition to the kitchen and 2 balconies, you can also share a living/dining room and a study.

The flat is centrally located, close to the lake and at the same time quietly situated in a side street directly next to Rieterpark in Zurich Enge. The lake, museums, shopping facilities and public transport are all close by.

name: Exclusive appartement with rooftop terrace
description:
This exclusive apartment with rooftop terrace has three floors and is next to the Kunsthaus Zurich. The lake, the famous Bahnhofstrasse and the Bellevue are very close.
The apartment has two bedrooms and is for maximum 4 people.

The space
2 bedrooms with double beds 160x 200cm, sustainable bedding by LAVIE, dresser and towels in organic cotton.
1 bathroom with toilet, shower and bathtub, separate toilet with washing machine.
Spacious and bright living and dining room.
Fully equipped kitchen with seating corner for 2 people.

Guest access
Tramway 3, 5 and 9 to the station "Kunsthaus".
Paid parking next to the house.

name: 1BR Appartment "dihei" in Zürich-City
description:
Schöne Wohnung inmitten von Zürich mit Blick auf den Uetliberg

The space
Diese 2-Zimmer-Wohnung im 3. Stock in Zürich-Wiedikon hat alles, was es für einen Kurztrip nach Zürich benötigt. Die Wohnung bietet ein Schlafzimmer mit einem Doppelbett, ein Wohnzimmer mit einem Sofa, auf welchem eine Person schlafen kann, einen Balkon mit Blick auf den Uetliberg, eine Küche und ein Bad mit Badewanne und Dusche. Die Wohnung befindet sich in einem charmanten Altbau, welcher jedoch etwas hellhörig ist, daher muss besonders auf die Nachbarn Rücksicht genommen werden. Vor dem Haus stehen Parkplätze der blauen Zone zur Verfügung, gerne unterstütze ich beim Erwerb einer Tageskarte für die Parkplätze. Die Wohnung ist in 20 Minuten vom Zürcher Hauptbahnhof und in 3 Minuten zu Fuss von der Bus- oder Tramstation erreichbar. In der Nähe befinden sich das Letzigrund Stadion, der Idaplatz, welcher zum Verweilen einlädt sowie die Zürcher Langstrasse mit vielen Bars und Clubs. Einkaufsmög

name: Beautiful flat by the lake and in center of Zurich
description:
Hello, I am renting out my amazing apartment located right at the Zurich lake.

Very central location for exploring the city and enjoying summer/winter days in one of the many nearby leisure spots. The lake is 2min walk.

There are plenty of cafes, restaurants and bars within short walking distance (1 - 3min walk).

The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful at night, so if you're looking for a perfect spot to relax in the most beautiful area of Zurich you won't find anyting much better than this.

The space
The flat is located in the high-end area of Zurich.
The view from the window are directed towards an old castle and feels like in a Disneyland movie :)

There is also a fireplace and a cozy space to rest and read books on a hamac.

Kitchen is fully equipped with a glass door.

Guest access
A few grocerie stores are conveniently avaliable in the nearest surroundings.

As f

The lake is within 2min walk.

There are plenty of cafes, restaurants and bars within short walking distance too (1-3min walk) and for those looking for shopping experience the nearby Bahnhofstrasse offers more than enough occasions to splurge on luxury goods.

The tram stop of every major line can be found in the direct vicinity (3min walk) and the main train station is just a 15 - minute walk away.

A few grocerie stores are conveniently avaliable in the nearest surroundings (3min walk)

The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful at night, so if you're looking for a perfect spot to relax in the most beautiful area in Zurich you won't find anyting much better than this.

Die frisch durch ARTEL APARTMENTS renovierte, mit luxuriösen Design-Möbeln und phänomenaler Fotokunst ausgestattete Wohnung befindet sich nur 10-15 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof, Paradeplatz oder von der Europaallee entfernt; inmitten vieler Restaurants & Bars.

This apartment has roughly 50 square meters and is split into a hallway leading straight into the living room. The living room is integrated with the dining area and followed by a fully equipped kitchen.
The bedroom provides a comfortable queen sized bed for 2 and the couch in the living room folds out and creates another queen size bed for 2 if needed.
This is the perfect place to stay for a few weeks during summer while we, the owners, will be travelling too

name: City Center / Altstetten - 1 BR, own Parking
description:
The apartment is located in Zurich Altstetten in a small lovely building with parking spots in front of the house. The train station Zurich Altstetten with frequent trains to Zurich main station is only 300 meters away. Within walking distance you have many popular restaurants, cafés, bars and grocery stores. The key is located in a key box outside of the building and you can check-in and check-out yourself.

The space
The apartment is on the second floor and offers a separate bedroom, a living room with two single beds and a bed-sofa, a separate kitchen with dining table and a bathroom. The master bedroom offers a double bed (with two separate matresses). Bed linen and towels are provided.

The kitchen is fully equipped including microwave, Nespresso coffee machine, water heater etc.

Free internet WLAN and cable TV is available. Smoking is not permitted.
neighborhood_overview: Zurich Altstetten is a growing and increasingly popular part of Zurich. You have a lot of existing but also new restaurants, bars and shops in walking distance.
host_about: Vivimos en Zurich. Nos encanta viajar y conocer gente de todo el mundo.

name: Ruhige, helle 2-Zimmer Wohnung in Zürich-Witikon
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is a really calm area with not so much traffic or outside noise. 5 min walk distance there is Witikon Center: Big supermarket like Migros, but also Aldi or Denner, pharmacies, bakery. There is also a bus-Stop with 4 bus-lines. To the tram line 8+3 it's only 5 min by bus.
On the other side you have 2 min walk distance a beatiful path to walk with view over Zurich, with the best sunset, and access to forest with a brook and little creeks. Really nice to go for running, a walk or bbq.
host_about: Hello I am Selin, I live in Zurich for 2 years now. I hosted through AirBnB in Paris and Cologne before. Now for the first time in Zurich. I work as a dance and yoga teacher and will be gone from 21 July - 30 August to a meditation retreat and yoga formation. That's why my flat is available for a lovely person or couple to spend their summer in Zurich. My adorable cat Ninja (3 years old) stays in the flat. He is an outdoor cat, uses no litter in the flat, is a lot around & really super easy-going cat. Loves to be feeded in the morning and evening (packed wet food). If you give him sometimes treats he will for sure love you and cuddle a lot.

name: Private doubleroom with singlebeds in shared flat
description:
Near from the center of Zurich you'll have a private room in an unique house full of art, inspiring and calm.
2minutes walk to public transport. 7minutes walk to the supermarket. 10minutes to the center by public transport. 15 minutes walk to the lake of zurich. 20 minutes to the mainstation by public transport.

The space
The house is a big artistic villa. 4 people live and work here. We do events and workshops and rent some of our rooms for airbnb-guests. For our guests we have an extra kitchen, living room and terrasse. We use our private kitchen and living room, so our ways wont cross a lot.

Guest access
For our guests there is an extra kitchen, living room and terrasse you are welcome in.

The colorful living room invites to just chill, read a book or work. As well youre welcome on the terrasse to enjoy the view and the nice weather, you can cook in the guest kitchen and have a look at our artists gallery.

O

name: Private room between river & forest in shared flat
description:
Our lovely home provides all the comfort (and maybe even more) you might need. There is a fireplace in the living room, a sauna (extra cost) upstairs, a wonderful open balcony/terrace on the second floor with a bbq and a small outdoor kitchen/sink. We do some vegetable gardening and there is a worm composter. In the kitchen we have high standard equipment like a Vitamix A3500i, a kitchen processor Magimix CS 5200XL. There is also Bialetti Coffemaker.

The space
Officially we are 3 people and a dog living permanently in the aparment but as 2 of us (and our doggy) are travelling often and also live & work from time to time in Berlin, we would love to share our home with other humans who might need a bed or just enjoy a cozy home. name: Airy, bright  "Chalet" like flat above Zurich
description:
beautiful, light and cozy apartment, high and spacious ceiling.
quiet, peaceful neighborhood and centrally located. only 5min from the main station by tram. river swimming + busses + tram + grocery shopping all within 5min walking distance.
I'm in love with my apartment because it gives a "chalet" like feeling right in the middle of Zurich. it is under the roof and provides a great outlook over the city. as it's well isolated it stays nice at temperature even on hotter days.

The space
The apartment is on the top floor of the highest located house on a small hill which gives a really nice view and a feeling of "nesting" over the city. I cherish natural materials and do almost have no electronic devices - which can give you an easy atmosphere for meditation, yoga or reading.

As I read a lot myself, so there is also a reading light placed behind the bath tub so you can soak on rainy day enjoying reading.
neighborhood_overview:
Our street has many high trees which reach partially up to the windows of the flat. So you see quite some green when you look down and you hear a lot birds singing. The street itself is narrow one-way street with little traffic in a residential area.

Within 5min walking you have 3 bakeries to choose from and several cafés. Also the public swimming areas of the river Limmat are just down the hill (8min walk) with a lot to explore and with further small restaurant/bar/coffee/wine places all along the river. Additionally to the "regular" food supermarkets close by there is also an organic food shop and a no-waste (packging free) organic shop within 15min walk away. The Farmers market (Tuesday+Friday) and the Fleamarket (Saturday) is 25min walk or 5min with the bus.

--> A list of my favorites you will find in the flat waiting for you :)

name: Schöne Wohnung in Wipkingen
description:
Genieße das einfache Leben in dieser ruhigen und zentral gelegenen Unterkunft. In 3 Gehminuten zum
Wipkingen und Letten. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in unmittelbarer Nähe. Sehr ruhige und lichtdurchflutete Wohnung.
amenities: ["Kitchen", "Long term stays allowed", "Washer"]

name: Modern and cozy flat in central Zurich
description: Our lovely flat is located two tram stops or a 8min walk from Zurich HB, it can't get much more central than this! We offer you a spacious bedroom, two bath rooms, a super cozy living room area, open kitchen and a cute little balcony for you to enjoy lovely summer evenings. There are countless restaurants and bars, supermarkets and stores nearby and a jump into the refreshing Limmat river is just a stone's throw away. Welcome in your home away from home!
host_about:
Ever since I was a little girl, our parents would take my sister and me on backpacking trips across the world - I was practically raised to be a globetrotter! 
At 30 years I have been to more than 30 different countries, just to travel but sometimes also to work or study.
I think airbnb is a great way to travel because you get to know so many amazing people and also get to see how they live. My mum has been hosting guests for a long time and we have had such enriching experiences! After having been an airbnb guest for a few years my boyfriend and I now finally have our own apartment to share with airbnb.

name: Single Room with shared bathroom in a hotel
description:
Unser Pop Up Hotel liegt an bester Lage in Zürich, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen der Zürcher Altstadt. Wir bieten frisch renovierte und möblierte Zimmer mit allem was nötig ist, aber ohne viel Schnickschnack. Die Bäder befinden sich auf der Etage und werden geteilt. In unserem unkomplizierten und familiären Umfeld wirst du herzlich empfangen und dich wohlfühlen.

The space
Das Haus ist bald 500-jährig und liegt gehört zum Denkmal-geschützten Teil der Zürcher Altstadt.
neighborhood_overview: Direkt an der Limmat, 5 Minuten zu Grossmünster, Fraumünster & Wasserkirche/Helmhaus , 2 Minuten zur Predigerkirche, 7 Minuten zum Hauptbahnhof. Diverse Bars und Restaurants in unmittelbarer Nähe.
host_about:
Unique location, directly on Limmatquai in the heart of Zurich's old town. Only 7 minutes by foot to the train station, a tram stop is just outside the building (»Rudolf-Brun-Brücke»). 
The rooms are newly renovated, they all have a sink in the room, toilets and showers are shared.
It's an almost 500-year-old building with a lot of charm. 
***
Einmalige Lage, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen von Zürich. Nur 7 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt, Tramhaltestelle »Rudolf-Brun-Brücke» direkt vor dem Haus.
Frisch renovierte und neu eingerichtete Zimmer, alle mit Lavabo im Zimmer, Duschen/Toiletten auf dem Gang. 
Schöner Aufenthaltsraum mit Blick auf die Limmat. Ein 500-jähriges Haus mit viel Charme!

Tram and bus station 5 minutes walk and train station Oerlikon 10 minutes walk. Restaurant in the same building and shopping possibilities 10 to 15 minutes walk.

name: Stylish luxury studio APT, quiet with garden view
description:
Elegant and comfortable studio apartment with a lovely garden view into the greens. The location is very tranquil and quiet, yet incredibly central with excellent transport links. A variety of shops and restaurants are nearby​. The apartment is newly renovated and re-furnished it includes high-speed wifi, dishwasher and a fully equipped kitchen. It's on the first floor (no elevator).

The space
The spacious apartment features a bed-/living room with a comfortable double bed, a cozy Lloyd Lloyd Loom sofa, large drawer chest and flat screen TV. The separate brand new kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, ceramic hob, oven and microwave.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located on a quiet street in Wollishofen, yet very central. The closest tram station is called "Wollishoferplatz", about 5 min walking distance. To reach Zurich main station (HB) there is a direct tram (nr.7), that leaves every 8 minutes.  The closest Supermarket is just 7 minutes walking distance. The lake is only 12 min away for a refreshing swim during the summer month or a beautiful walk alongside in the cooler times of the year.

name: Charming room minutes away from Main Station (HB)
description:
Minimalist vintage style room with sunlight in the morning, but has a metal shade if you want to sleep in. We're on the ground floor but have frosted privacy stickers on the widow. The room will have one closet empty and ready for your use.

The space
Living room, hallway, kitchen, and bathroom are all common areas. Make yourself at home but also please tidy up after yourself. Washer and dryer are in the basement, free of charge.

Guest access
There is free street parking if you can get it, or a parking garage two blocks away. Public transit is the easiest with the 4 tram about 3 minutes away or HB station less than five minutes walking.

Other things to note
My flatmate will come into the room occasionally to water the plants unless you feel comfortable taking responsibility for them.
neighborhood_overview:
The street is a little quiet at night, but a few blocks away in different directions you can find bars, restaurants, and cafes (including a daytime cafe across the street). There's a Coop supermarket one block away, and an Aldi and Migros 3-4 blocks away.

The Limmat river is only two blocks away for running paths and places to swim and sunbathe.
host_about: I'm a writer and artist who loves to travel. I work in a variety of media including photography and oil painting.

name: Eigentums Stadtwohnung im urbanen Zürich West.
description:
Genieße ein stilvolles Erlebnis in dieser zentral gelegenen Unterkunft. Im Herzen des urbanen Zürich West, 5 Minuten von der schönen Limmat entfernt, 2 Minuten zum Tram, 5 Minuten zu tollen Restaurants und Bars, 2 Minuten zum Coop, mehr geht nicht :-)

The space
Grosser, lichtdurchfluteter Raum bestehend aus vielen, bodenlangen-grossen Fenstern mit Blick direkt in die Grünoase und zum Sheraton Hotel.
SONOS App runterladen um zu jeder Zeit in angemessener Lautstärke Musik der Extraklasse geniessen zu können!

Other things to note
Heikle Weisse Wände, keine Taschen oder Rucksäcke an die Wände stellen oder anlehnen.
Immer 2x Türe abschliessen- Sicherheitsschloss.
Ganze Wohnung hat automatische Aussenstoren zur Abdunkelung.
Rauchen NUR draussen oder auf der Terrasse.
neighborhood_overview:
Sehr ruhige, internationale und hundefreundliche Gegend mitten in einer Grünoase im urbanen und beliebten Stadtteil Zürichs nämlich dem aufstrebenden und trendigen Zürich West.
Direkt Via a Vis vom Airbnb: Sheraton Hotel + 25hours Hotel für Spa, Fitness, Dinning, Drinks und mehr und 5 Minuten zur Autobahn, Richtung Bern, Basel, Luzern, Chur und St Gallen.

name: Exceptional three-storey apartment by the park
description:
This exceptional, large flat offers plenty of space on three floors, generous facilities and tasteful furnishings. It is ideal for a larger family or a group. The feel-good oasis has a modern kitchen, dining/living room, bathroom and WC on two levels.

The flat is centrally located, close to the lake and at the same time beautifully quiet in a side street directly next to Rieterpark in Zurich Enge. Lake Zurich, museums, shopping facilities and public transport are in the immediate vicinity.

The space
The house, built in 1914, was modernised a few years ago and the attic was converted into a living room. You can reach the upper floors via a spiral staircase or via the staircase. Some rooms have a beautiful parquet floor. The flat is bright and offers beautiful views.

Other things to note
The flat has two entrances: a lower one on the 3rd floor of the house and an upper one on the 4th floor. There is no elevator.

Cosy and smart! – Compact but not petty.

neighborhood_overview:
The lake is just 3 mins away!

The "Seefeld" district is attractive for people who love city life, nature and the lake and is ideally located in Zurich's central banking and administrative district - just a few minutes' walk from the lake. As the most popular district for living and working, for leisure, culture and recreation, Seefeld is at the top of the agenda. Here you will find numerous neighbourhood shops, a wide range of restaurants from trendy to gourmet, fashionable boutiques, galleries and countless local recreational opportunities.

name: - BRIGHT AND MINIMALIST ROOM -
description:
We would like to offer you the guest-room in our beautiful, bright, minimalist three room apartment. The bedroom has a queen size bed, perfect for one person or a couple.

You are welcome to use our kitchen as well as our Jade yoga mats and hula hoops and explore the lake of Zürich on our stand-up-paddle boards!

Other things to note
Clean towels and bedsheets are provided.

There is a possibility to do laundry for CHF 6 per load in a laundry room shared with the whole building. Please let us know at least a week in advance if you want to do laundry so that we can reserve the room.

We only use eco-friendly detergents for cleaning, laundry and dishwasher.

Please note we have NO wi-fi at home.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located on the fourth floor of a tidy tenement house on the upper edge of the elegant and laid-back Seefeld quarter. The lake with a wonderful swimming location is twenty minutes walk from the house. The Stadelhofen train station is seven minutes away by public transport. The house is next to a busy street, so during the day on the southern side you will hear cars and trams but at night it is normally quiet. The botanical garden is just across the street (entrance is free of charge). There are also some beautiful parks and forests in the neighbourhood.
host_about:
I am a 31 years old female visual and performance artist. I usually travel alone or with my partner. We are both interested in design, photography and urban gardening and try to live healthy, minimalist and sustainable lifestyle.

See some of our pictures at IG: maja.renn

The apartment has a cozy Swiss chalet feeling to it with the wooden ceilings and beams and a nice fireplace in the living room. The flat also has an office room with dedicated working space for 2 people, 2 bathrooms, 2 bed rooms and more!

description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for couple trips, solo adventurers, and business travelers. My place is close to restaurants and dining and family-friendly activities.

The space
This apartment is newly renovated. The apartment is located 19 min away by bus to Zürich HB or 10 mins walk to the Altstetten train station and from there 5 min fast train to Zürich HB. It is situated in the city, shopping and going out possibilities and very sunny all day long. The apartment is totally furnished.
Bathroom: Bath and shower.
You are welcome to use of course the fully equipped kitchen. You may place things in the fridge too and if you feel like cooking something: No problem as long you tidy up again. My hair dryer is also included. If you need anything else I will try to provide it, please don't hesitate to ask.:)

-keep order
-no smoking in the flat
-clean dishes after use
-no parties
- no pets
- no sma

name: Urbanes Wohnen im Zürcher Altbau
description:
Diese Wohnung besticht ...

... durch die super zentrale Lage: Zu Fuss erreichst du Restaurants, Bars, den Hauptbahnhof, den Fluss, Museen und vieles mehr in wenigen Minuten.

... durch die urbane Lage mitten im Kreis 4: Dieses Stadtviertel pulsiert und hat tags wie nachts sehr viel zu bieten.

... durch die ruhige Lage in einer Seitenstrasse: Obwohl dir die Stadt zu Füssen liegt, ist es in der Nacht ruhig wie auf dem Lande.

The space
Diese Wohnung besticht vorallem ...

... durch einen kleinen, aber feinen Balkon mit Blick auf das wunderbare Kasernenareal und zeitgleich das Wahrzeichen Zürichs, nämlich den Uetliberg.

... durch den 4-Zimmer-Altbaucharme mit hohen Decken und geölten Holzböden.

... durch eine liebevolle Einrichtung.

... und durch eine lustige Dusche in der Küche.

Und nicht zu vergessen: Viele Insider-Tipps inklusive!

name: kleines Bijou um Zürich günstig zu entdecken!
description:
Die charmante Altbauwohnung bietet alles um die Stadt Zürich zu erkunden.

Es gibt eine einfache, gutausgestattet Küche. Ein grosses Zimmer mit Doppelbett (2x90x200cm) sowie ein kleineres Zimmer mit Schreibtisch und Sofabett (!120x180cm!). Ein kleines, zweckmässiges Bad runden das Angebot ab.

In wenigen Gehminuten erreichen Sie Bahn und Tram, welche Sie direkt in das Stadtzentrum von Zürich bringt.

Ein weiteres Zimmer der Wohnung ist für die Besucher nicht zugänglich und abgeschlossen.

The space
Kleines Bijou am Fusse des Üetliberg und Zentrumsnahe

Other things to note
Das Haus wird im März 2022 abgerissen. Aus diesem Grund haben wir für diese kurze Zeit KEIN WLand in der Gästewohnung eingerichtet.
host_about:
We are a family of fore and we love to travel. First is was only my husband and me. Since a few years we travel together with our little daughters. We love to meet new people and discover a new country. Try new food and drink a good glas of wine.

Living in Zurich we love the fact that everything is close by in a big city. But the weekend we like to spend in the Swiss mountains where we go for a hike.

N.

The appartement is very well located, 5 minutes walking distance from the main train station and 5 minutes walking distance from Limatplatz where you have access to the tram 4, 6, 13 and 17, 5.

Guest access

Guest access

neighborhood_overview: Very good residential area in Zurich, quiet, nice neighbors and you can find everything you need to shop in 5-10 minutes away. name: *my home your home* down town
description:
This unique cityapartment in Zurich is located in the pulsating center in Wiedikon district (Kreis 4) and is stylishly furnished for a perfect stay in the city.
Equipped with two balconies and an open kitchen, it's a good place to linger in the cozy apartment.
Once ventured out of the apartment, you can find trendy bars, top local restaurants or the coffee to go for a walk in the exciting and diverse city just front door.
The main trainstation is just a fiew steps away by foot.

The space
The apartment is very bright. All rooms are connected through huge doors which gives a feeling of one big room! You can close the doors anytime.

The living room is euquiped with a cozy sofa, a small table and a TV.

Your bedroom has a balcony with a city view, the open kitchen has a bigger balcony with view to the beautiful green courtyard. There is a big table in the kitchen where you can eat, work or just spend a nice evening with a glas
neighborhood_overview:
The flat is situated in a quiet and safe side street! You enter through a beautiful courtyard, where one of Zurich's top restaurants is located. The vibrant Langstrasse is just a few steps away, where you find international cuisine, street food, bars and clubs.
Take the opposite road away from Langstrasse and you'll get the opposite vibe:
You find shops, restaurants, fancy caffee's, libraries and modern architecture at Europaallee.

You are in the middle of all this - and more:

Zurich mainstation, grocery stores, co-working spaces, the Limmat river - everything is just a few steps away!
host_about: I am 33 years old, working in real estate switzerland. love to visit new citys and very communicative.

Unique location, directly on Limmatquai in the heart of Zurich's old town. Only 7 minutes by foot to the train station, a tram stop is just outside the building (»Rudolf-Brun-Brücke»).

It's an almost 500-year-old building with a lot of charm.

Einmalige Lage, direkt am Limmatquai im Herzen von Zürich. Nur 7 Gehminuten vom Hauptbahnhof entfernt, Tramhaltestelle »Rudolf-Brun-Brücke» direkt vor dem Haus.
Frisch renovierte und neu eingerichtete Zimmer, alle mit Lavabo im Zimmer, Duschen/Toiletten auf dem Gang. 
Schöner Aufenthaltsraum mit Blick auf die Limmat. Ein 500-jähriges Haus mit viel Charme!

It's truly an oasis to enjoy Zurich to the fullest.

name: Urban Loft in the heart of Zurich - 10th floor
description:
This modern and well equipped 2.5 room loft style apartment is located 3 walking minutes from Zurich main station (Hauptbahnhof) in the lively Europaallee. The unique view from the 10th floor over Zurich gives the new building a noble urban flair. It has a very spacious living room, 2 modern bathrooms, a loggia (balcony), and big windows for a lot of sunshine (total area 98 m2).

The apartment is actually lived in when not rented out, so you may see a few personal items during your stay... :)

The space
The bedroom features a queen size bed with a breathtaking wake-up view over Zurich directly from the bed. The very spacious living room has high windows, a 3m dining table, a comfy sofa and a Geneva sound system for a chill atmosphere. The kitchen is fully equipped with dish washer, stove, coffee maker, toaster, a nutribullet (if you like to live healthy...), and much more. The loggia has a comfortable hanging chair and a grill for BBQs (also useable in w
neighborhood_overview: The apartment couldn't be more centrally located and is part of Europaallee in Zurich's district 4. This new neighbourhood in the heart of Zurich is located right next to Zurich main station and offers a wide range of restaurants of all price levels, shopping oportunities, services, food and leisure, which all contribute to the liveliness of the area. Langstrasse, one of Zurich's best areas to go out, is just around the corner. A new bridge for pedestrians a bicycles provides a shortcout over the train tracks and a direct connection to district 5.

name: Gesamte Wohnung im Zentrum von Zürich
host_about:
Herzlich Willkommen in Zürich! 

Wir sind Simone (37) und Marc (43) und freuen uns sehr Touristen & Backpackers aus aller Welt hier in unserer hübschen Wohnung im Zentrum von Zürich begrüssen zu dürfen. 

In unserer Freizeit sind wir am liebsten in der Natur, lieben es zu Reisen und neue Kulturendas mit gutem Essen kennenzulernen.

Da wir aktuell ausserhalb Zürich‘s wohnen und unsere Stadtwohnung erst in einigen Monaten untervermietet wird, werden wir diese sehr-zentralgelegene und gemütliche Wohnung zur Verfügung stellen.

Wir wünschen uns Gäste, die unserer - am Herzen liegenden Wohnung - acht geben, sich anständig und ordentlich verhalten und eine schöne Zeit in Zürich verbringen möchten :-D

Wir freuen uns auf euch!
